Baystation 12 / Aurorastation Credit List
Current Project Maintainers: -Click Here-
 Currently Active GitHub contributor list: -Click Here-
 Code: Abi79, Aryn, Cael_Aislinn, Ccomp5950, Chinsky, cib, CompactNinja, DopeGhoti, Erthilo, Hawk_v3, Head, Ispil, JoeyJo0, Lexusjjss, Melonstorm, Miniature, Mloc, NerdyBoy1104, PsiOmegaDelta, SkyMarshal, Snapshot, Spectre, Strumpetplaya, Sunfall, Tastyfish, Uristqwerty
 Sprites: Apple_Master, Arcalane, Chinsky, CompactNinja, Deus Dactyl, Erthilo, Flashkirby, JoeyJo0, Miniature, Searif, Xenone, faux
 Sounds: Aryn
 Main Testers: Anyone who has submitted a bug to the issue tracker
 Thanks to: /tg/ station, /vg/station, GoonStation devs, Baystation 12 devs, the original SpaceStation developers and FFrances for the title image.
Also a thanks to anybody who has contributed who is not listed here :( Ask to be added here on irc.
Have a bug to report? Visit our Issue Tracker.

16 May 2023

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Third deck starboard hallway remap, adding a bit of verticality between it and the ops lobby hallway.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Adds an Unathi Miners' Guild station with a shuttle and four ghostroles.
  • Allows Unathi to correctly select the Mictlan accent, and removes Sol citizenship as an option from the species.

kermit updated:

  • Added a Chemical, Biological & Radiological Weapons tab on the Traitor Uplink
  • Adds a 2 different parasitic worm kits: Nerve Flukes (3TC) which are non-lethal, incapacitating; Heart Flukes (5TC) which are lethal if left untreated.
  • Adds Helmizole (1u Dylovene, 1u Fluvectionem, 1u Leporazine) which is used to treat parasitic infections (does not treat k'ois mycosis parasites). 2x syringes spawn in the Medications Cabinet. ODing will make the parasite drug resistant, forcing surgical extraction.
  • Garlic(juice/sauce) also has weak antiparasitic properties. Only enough to slow progression.
  • Adds Greimorian Eggs (4TC) which are planted on the ground on-purchase.
  • Adds a Dirty Bomb (4TC). It functions like a plastic explosive but irradiates the room it detonates in for ~10 minutes. It has a minimum timer of 5 minutes. This is alongside a Radiation Suit Kit (1TC)
  • Adds a Syringe Gun Kit (3TC) to the CBR tab with the components for 3 darts.
  • The Random Toxin Kit is under the new CBR tab.
  • Pill bottle naming consistency.
  • Asinodryl now works properly. In addition to actually preventing vomiting, it now prevents dizziness (screen wobbling) and confusion (random step direction).
  • Updated the warehouse/strange crate spawns to include more recently added medical items/drugs (coagzolug, helmizole, pill bottles of x, stabiliser harnesses).

14 May 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Fixes unit tests not running successfully because libgcc-s1 was not being installed.

Geeves updated:

  • Tweaked how disarm costs are calculated, IPCs should no longer gain charge from disarming.
  • Farseer eyes no longer mention the user peering down them.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Fixes the Assunzione Amulet so that the side sprite does not clip into the chest. It now rests on the front pixel of the sprite.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Adds Zeng-Hu softcaps to the loadout selection.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • The Visegrad banner is now available in the loadout.

kermit updated:

  • Makes the heavy armour used by antagonists black instead of brown.

13 May 2023

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Adds several of the new Unathi plants, as well as meals based on them.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • The Adhomian circus clown role now requires a Tajara whitelist.

12 May 2023

Geeves updated:

  • Mapped in two always-active lower maneuvering thrusters for the Horizon, which allows it to move around slowly.
  • Added layering to the overmap, which sectors being on the bottom, ships in the middle, and shuttles on top.
  • Added landing indicators to shuttles.

Pirouette updated:

  • Fixed a typo in the description of the Gadpathurian flag.

Ramke updated:

  • Reduced tech level requirement for the ISS hardsuit module.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Fixes assisted organs being turned into mechanical variants.

11 May 2023

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Various fixes to access requirements on the Hegemony Corvette, as well as fixing several other miscellaneous bugs I noticed.
  • Adds missing airlock and engine console to the Hegemony Shuttle, as well as fixing power issues with the SMES

Sniblet updated:

  • Adjusted values for height comparison threshholds, and added more of them: slightly/significantly taller/shorter.

kyres1 updated:

  • Resprited all IFF beacons and sensor machinery icons.
  • Remapped the Horizon's Venator-class sensors to be much more prominent, located outside the bridge conference room on the hull.

08 May 2023

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Name and description of ghost role is written to chat on spawn.
  • Srom tweaks.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Adds a Tarwa Conglomerate ship, with ghostroles

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Ballistic firerates have been changed across the board. Most guns will shoot more quickly, making combat much more fast-paced and hazardous.

kyres1 updated:

  • Fixed the scan readout for asteroids having the wrong readout for its mass, volume and gravity.

07 May 2023

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the adhomian circus roles being whitelisted when they should not.
  • Moved the circus shuttle landing spot, so it does not crush stuffs.
  • Made the circus shuttle smaller.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Removes secret bar from maint tunnels near sec.
  • Adds secret bar to maint tunnels near ops.

FlamingLily updated:

  • Fixed a few inadvertent misgenderings.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Adds the Hegemony Corvette, an Izweski military vessel found in the Badlands.
  • Adds Izweski Hegemony voidsuits and military weapons - an energy rifle and a variant energy glaive.
  • Fixes the accessory icons for the new guild mantles.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The filing cabinet in the southern holodeck shouldn't have the records of the entire crew anymore.

niennab updated:

  • Tweaked the black double breasted konyang jacket and Provenance custom item to be darker. Item was more grey.

05 May 2023

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes flags on windows.

04 May 2023

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Adds new origins and accents for the Tza Prairie, Southlands, Broken Coalition, Ha'zana, Spacers and Mictlan Unathi
  • Adds guild mantles for major Unathi guilds.

01 May 2023

FlamingLily updated:

  • Added a mechanical height system that adds additional flavour to a character's examine text. Remember to update your character sheets!

Geeves updated:

  • Added colorable glasses to the loadout.

Wowzewow (Wezzy), NiennaB updated:

  • New flag sprites, by NiennaB.
  • Ripping up flags gives you cloth now.
  • Adds more flags, namely, PMCG, New Gibson, Himeo flags to the loadout.
  • Banners (one tile flags) can be deployed on turfs as well now.

30 April 2023

Alberyk, Happy_fox updated:

  • Added an adhomian traveling circus ship.

Captain Gecko, Triogenix, Geeves updated:

  • Added a Queendom origin and Accent.

Geeves updated:

  • Added footprints to exoplanet turfs that would make sense to have footprints.
  • You can now click on the background of an item inside a box/backpack to pick it up. This only affects storages that don't use the square slots for now.

harryob updated:

  • Removed all instances of relative pathing, and lints against it.

29 April 2023

Alberyk updated:

  • Barren and lava planets no longer have asteroid mobs.

Captain Gecko, Geeves updated:

  • Added Unathi, Tajara, and Skrell specific sprites for the Anomaly Suit, Softsuit, and Emergency Softsuit.

Huntime updated:

  • Resolves missing lights in new atmospherics locker room.

N8-Toe updated:

  • Added a bridge crew cap to their locker to cover their bald heads.

William Murdoch updated:

  • Fixes the alarm monitor screen from not showing up on wristbounds.

kyres1 updated:

  • Updated Akinyi's custom item sprites and path to be a functioning instrument.

meep109 updated:

  • Fixes minor typos in Vaurcae accent descriptions.

27 April 2023

Sheeplets updated:

  • Replaced the power cells in stabilizer harnesses with regular power cells, raising the charge from 100w to 1000w. Back to their original value.

25 April 2023

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Complete overhaul of exoplanet generation, with updated themes for asteroids, barren, desert, grove, and lava planets.
  • Implemented grass and snow planet generation.
  • Added two new planet types: crystalline and swampland/marshland.
  • In general, mineral walls are far less frequent on mineral poor worlds, namely grove/grass/snow planets (except Adhomai).
  • Updated rust-g to latest version, including new methods of noise generation.
  • Replaced the random_map system with exoplanet themes and biomes, all now located within overmap/exoplanets.
  • Several performance tweaks in ChangeTurf and turf init/destroy to increase mapgen performance.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Added 2 new eyebrow styles to bodymarkings.

meep109 updated:

  • Fixes a typo in a Nralakk Federation uniform.

24 April 2023

GeneralCamo updated:

  • Added a new double-breasted Konyanger jacket, with minor heat protection. Sprites by Niennab.

meep109 updated:

  • Added Diulszi as an option to the Nralakk projector.

23 April 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Added a rack with the Grauwolf probes in the Grauwolf room. There are ten probes on it.

Sniblet updated:

  • Removed an incorrect apostrophe from the kitten plushie's description.

22 April 2023

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Ghost roles listing in lobby tweak.

19 April 2023

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Expands third deck aft starboard maintenance tunnels. Also with an airlock and a ladder connecting it to second deck.
  • Minor OM office remap.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Increase init speed by removing the global turfs list and reverting to turf in world loops.

18 April 2023

FlamingLily updated:

  • Replaced the generic EFTPOS device in Operations with an Operations-set Quikpay, allowing transactions without an OM present.

17 April 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Added a DMM (map) inclusion guard in the code_check for the CI.

16 April 2023

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added three more adhomian animals: the climber, the snow strider and the nose-horn.
  • You can ride the climber if you use a saddle on it.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed rock nomads spawning outside Adhomai, causing (among other things) unit test failures.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Adds a Vaurca version of the combitool augment, available from loadout for Bulwarks and Workers.

15 April 2023

Ben10083 updated:

  • Exosuit laser now considered a heavy laser, damage buffed to 35 per shot from 25 (less than usual heavy laser)
  • Exosuit mounted smg can now switch firemodes from semiauto to 3-shot burst with alt click
  • Exosuit mounted smg capacity increased to 30 bullets to allow for 10 3-shot bursts

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Adds missing cameras to CIC, locker room, and holodecks.

FluffyGhost updated:

  • Added a grauwolf probe projectile, can reveal things in a radius, does not hit anything and possess no damage, basically a minigame to extend sensor range.

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Use stack_trace when addtimer fails for QDEL'd or negative timers.

Huntime updated:

  • Modified the starboard & port thrusters, adding a Hydrogen line for new combustion/burn opportunities; modifies the atmospherics locker room, adds additional scrubber/pump connectors.

Lancer, NiennaB, Stryker, Kyres1, Geeves updated:

  • Added an IPC overloader vendor to the bar lounge. Overloaders are legal luxury items that contain software that act like drugs for IPCs.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Adds new colors for the mogazali attire, jizixi dress and straw hat. Also adds a Hephaestus Industries Unathi mantle, available in loadout

Ryverstyx updated:

  • Adds two more Skrell tuux styles.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • The description for the sensor relay has been changed.

14 April 2023

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Goonchat cookie namespacing.
  • Tweaks and rearranges the CIC/bunker.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Hostile mobs no longer target players that have logged out.

13 April 2023

Yonnimer updated:

  • Adds the ct-eum flag to the loadout.
  • Fixes the narrows jumpsuit to be for the the narrows origin, not eum.

12 April 2023

Geeves updated:

  • Exosuits are now more responsive when moving, they turn and take a step as one action, they turn when the facedir command is used, and will permanently face a direction if you lock yourself to one direction.

kyres1 updated:

  • Fixed a duplicate air alarm in Holodeck Beta.
  • Fixed some catwalks being the wrong type and thus invisible on Deck 3 exterior.
  • Re-added a ball to the holodeck basketball court.

11 April 2023

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Slightly reduced init time required to build vending UI spritesheets.

10 April 2023

GeneralCamo updated:

  • Simplified screen overlay/bloom code.
  • Added fuel pipes. Fuel pipes are intended to carry fuel for vessels, and have their own dedicated pump and connector for this.
  • Added auxiliary pipes. Auxiliary pipes are intended primarily for airlocks, but can be used in other various means. They have their own dedicated pump, connector, and vent.
  • Added a mode to airlock controllers to cycle air externally. This prevents external, potentially poisonous air from mixing with clean air.
  • Thrusters can now attach directly to fuel pipes.
  • Pressure tanks can now attach directly to all pipes.
  • The Intrepid now has externally cycled airlocks, and utilizes the new pipes.
  • Added a scrubber to the Spark, which is directly vented out into space.
  • Ported Keekenox#1337's vents and scrubbers.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed several hard-deletion issues that were causing a severe performance impact.
  • Fixed mobs not being removed from AI targeting spatial grid cells when they moved to a new cell.
  • Fixed valves not properly disconnecting, leading to a hanging hardref.
  • Added several procs to allow removing body parts from mechs, and fixed mech wreckage deleting contained parts.
  • Adjusted SSatoms init loops to be slightly more performant.
  • Changed failsafe messages to a more visible color.
  • Ported an updated version of reference tracking from tgstation; included optional debug flags to track down hardref issues.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Speech bubble prefs now persist on the character even after changing the pref in round.
  • Holopads now properly convey accents.
  • Fixed wheelchairs causing double teleportation on stairs.
  • Fixed the old military jackets not having an open sprite. They will also work on coat racks now.
  • Autolathes now properly update icons when printing things.
  • Silencing humans (through the silent sting, covering mouth, etc) now works again. How long was that broken for...?
  • Added some helpful text on how to actually use changeling stings.
  • Atmospheric control computers can no longer use bluespace to interact with air alarms outside of the Horizon.
  • Navigation and targeting systems consoles can now actually be repaired.
  • Fixed changeling fake death not actually faking death.
  • Fixed the tie hair verb not respecting consciousness.
  • Fixed adrenaline jittering not stopping once dead or faking death.
  • Fixed vacuum fizz taste description.
  • Adrenaline sacs now actually create reagents, meaning that lings can now actually benefit from synaptizine/hyperzine/oxycomorphine, thus massively helping lings against stuns. Use it!
  • Fixed IPC blood being red in some cases.
  • Fixed oil-stained clothes sometimes showing up as blood-stained.
  • Fixed simple mobs being permanently sleepy and falling asleep when they actually want to wake up. The horror.
  • Fixed the secure ammunition storage turrets not being linked to the turret control.
  • Fixed robotic organ repair with nanopaste not working.
  • Fixes D3 wiring.

MattAtlas (porting), Spookerton (original author) updated:

  • Added a new subsystem to handle speech bubbles.
  • Fixed speech bubbles persisting when they shouldn't.
  • Added different styles of speech bubbles for ghosts, animals, machines.
  • Speech indicators now work with the command bar.
  • Added a speech bubble type preference to character setup. Your choices depend on the species' list of possible speech bubble types.

ReadThisNamePlz updated:

  • Fixes Ammunition storage turret control access

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Vaurca Bulwark unarmed attacks no longer have a chance to cause bleeding, but deal slightly more brute damage and have a chance to knock back the unfortunate victim.
  • Vaurca Bulwarks are easier to grab and have a higher resist modifier to bring them in line with other large mobs.
  • Vaurca Bulwarks now use the heavy sparring attack instead of the light one, because they are giant bugs.

atteria updated:

  • Resprited most kitchen appliances.
  • Added smoke effects to show when food is about to burn.
  • Fixed the stove's turned on animation not displaying.
  • Fixed the cutting board and mixing bowl sprites.

kyres1 updated:

  • Condenses the existing recreational area into holodeck presets.
  • Practically doubles the size of the existing holodeck.
  • Adds a second holodeck! It's adjacent to the new holodeck and can run different programs simultaneously with the other one.
  • Added a Trinarist and Tribunal chapel holodeck preset, a Jupiter atmosphere holodeck preset, a Mendell city rooftop holodeck preset and a Moghresian jungle holodeck preset.
  • Added an organized selection of dedicated fake props to the effects folder, for use in situations that have no mechanical usage, like holograms.
  • Moves the command bunker, or CIC to fit nicely where the previous shield generator was, adjacent to the crew armory.
  • Moves the self-destruct terminal into maintenance adjacent to the crew armory, behind the CIC.
  • Adjusts the engineering shield generator to be connected to the engineering break room.

09 April 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Updated the default rust_g dll to 1.2.0+a2 from our other repository release.
  • Added a debug verb for our custom udp send module used in rustg.

SimpleMaroon updated:

  • Examining wallets or modular computers that contain IDs while adjacent will now show you the ID menu.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Made minor tweaks to the asymmetrical shirt.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Adds new religions, origins, and an accent for Dionae hailing from EUM.
  • Adds a consular role for EUM, only played by Dionae
  • Adds a new origin and accent for Skrell hailing from EUM
  • Adds some new EUM clothing and a flag

08 April 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Apparently github now wants it inside a folder with the same name as the previous file, and with the extension as YAML, this should be it.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed ruins not being generated due to planet_type lists not being initialized.

07 April 2023

Garnascus updated:

  • Changes the tranquilizer dart box to use the shellbox sprite.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Switching tabs in the character setup should now be more performant.
  • Loading a new character should now refresh the preview.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Ported a new full gasmask sprite from Baystation.

06 April 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Modernized our github issue template, so it uses the new format, as the old one is deprecated.
  • Modernized our codeowners template for PRs pings, added some additional ones, reassigned away from skull to currently-in-team devs.

05 April 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Fixes slot machines not giving some cash winnings amounts.
  • Fixed PDA charging cable immediately retracting on APC connection.
  • You can now point at things if you are buckled, aka cannot move. You still cannot if you are restrained or dead.

Geeves updated:

  • Unathi can now take more augments, such as the welding fuel cell processor.

Geeves, CNEGecko updated:

  • Added a culture for Aut'akh, as well as an origin for the various communes. Additionally, added a unique accent for Aut'akh.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Adds minor fixes and mapping improvements to the ruin spawns and actually allows them to spawn.

03 April 2023

Alberyk, Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Added sprites for wielding the adhomian assault rifle.
  • Added golden plated version of the adhomian assault rifle.

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Refactored the various unit tests to use macros to indicate pass/fail and logging.
  • Added a new unit tests logging system that integrates with github output, prettifying it, and is able to be switched back to terminal-reading mode with a flick of a commented header/define.
  • Added a manual unit tests define file, for when you want to run the unit tests locally, with logging to terminal output readability.
  • Added some assertion macros to be used for unit tests, to make their writing less annoying.
  • All unit tests logging now report from what file and line they come from, instead of having you guess and search around for where they originate.
  • Added a create and destroy unit test, it verifies that all items can be created and destroyed without issues, do not sleep during, runtime, error out, are not set as initialized, and returns an hint during initialization, and do not harddel at their destroy, at least in their default state.
  • Added a subsystem initialization unit test, that verify all subsystems initialize correctly.
  • Added an SStimer unit test, that verify the bucket does not go negative.

kyres1 updated:

  • Adds a more complete readout of information to scan results. These readouts include non-mechanical statistics for the scanned objects, like its length, or an exoplanet's geology.
  • Added visible scan images for all exoplanets and third-party ships seen ingame, with exception to most shuttles. These show up on printed papers, too!
  • Fixed the skybox sprites of the TCFL corvette and the tramp freighter being swapped.

02 April 2023

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixed OM not having access to the vault.

Sniblet updated:

  • A whole lot of spellchecks and clarity/brevity/grammatical rewrites in accent description texts for all races.

31 March 2023

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed mixing bowls turning invisible.
  • Fixed the scrapper outpost being invisible.

GeneralCamo updated:

  • Flashlights now consume power. They accept device power cells, with the exception of the lantern which uses standard cells.
  • Flashlights have various brightness modes. The higher the brightness, the more light produced but also the more power consumed.
  • The lantern and maglight's on states are actually used.
  • Added more sanity checking to catch illegal calls in flashlights.
  • Cleaned up flashlight code to make it more flexible.
  • Added a sprite for device power cells. (Credit to Pebbles, Baystation12.)
  • Power cells now have a distinct sprite for low power, and no power.
  • Added advanced device power cells. (Sprite credit to Pebbles, Baystation12.)
  • Added sounds for toggling flashlights, and the green desk lamp.
  • Flashlights are now fabricated from plastic, instead of steel.
  • Electronic cigarettes now use device power cells. Power consumption has been reduced in half to compensate.
  • Dim lights can no longer be used to inspect eyes, and robotic eyes can no longer be inspected with flashlights.
  • Lanterns are now considered large items. Their attack force was increased to 10 to compensate.
  • The health analyzer now has an inactive sprite, as intended.

30 March 2023

RyverStyx updated:

  • Changes the core world origin to inner systems.

29 March 2023

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed Sahul not having a proper color.
  • Fixed the NKA merchant ship spawning even if no one joined as its crew.
  • Fixed the scrapper outpost using the wrong icon.

AuroraBirdie updated:

  • Remapped the bridge.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Chat message limit can now be changed.
  • Chat string highlighting now allows any number of strings.
  • Ghosts can jump to a ghost spawner's spawn point.

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Fixed the artifact forcefield effect, which could runtime if it didn't find a turf.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed an issue that prevented several ruins from spawning on exoplanets.
  • Fixed ruin spawns being partially / wholly deleted by landing zones, causing unit test failures and, of course, deleted ruins.
  • Changed the ruin tag system to more appropriately reflect types that actually want to be filtered for. Added planetary tags to restrict ruins by planet type.
  • The away site testing map now attempts to build one of each exoplanet (excluding lore planets) and one of each ruin.

Sniblet updated:

  • Instead of Zoleth and Vetju, Scay and Vedhra are the new Bound donors for Horizon biological testing. This means the bugs you buy come in new colors.

atteria updated:

  • Exoplanet snow is now smoothable rather than hard edges.

28 March 2023

Llywelwyn, RyverStyx updated:

  • Added two brands of Skrellian cigarettes: Eriuyushi Sunset and Xaqixal Dyn Fields.
  • Added two brands of Skrellian chewing tobacco: Leviathan Chew and Weibi's Breeze.
  • Added a pouch of wulumunusha cigarettes to the loadout, only selectable by Skrell.
  • Touched up the wulumunusha reagent by giving it a unique flavour description and removing the initial effect.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Tweaked the vault to make more efficient use of available space.

Sparky_hotdog, Alberyk updated:

  • Added dinner plates and dinner bowls, which can be used to serve up food in a somewhat more refined manner.
  • Dinner plates and dinner bowls aren't clean after use. Make sure to clean them with a cloth, or with your tongue, afterwards.
  • Added serving plates which work like trays, but can't hold as much.
  • The item which was a serving plate is now a chopping board. Functionally this is the same as before.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added an upgrade to changelings that disables their need to breathe in order to survive. Useful for those who don't intend on getting full space adapation.

27 March 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Set background=1 in xenoarch Initialize(), byond consider the proc too long and automatically switch it in background already, but prints a warning about it, this suppress the warning.
  • The Grinch stole the return hint of the xmas gifts to SSAtoms, restored it.
  • Set background=1 in get_area_turf, byond consider the proc too long and automatically switch it in background already, but prints a warning about it, this suppress the warning.
  • Fixed ai mask Initialize() not returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fix mech flare Initialize() not returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixed screen mecha Initialize() not returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixed gravgen Destroy() which assumed to be linked, generating a runtime.
  • Fixed minedrone FindOre() that did not handle the lack of enemies, runtiming.
  • Fixed mobcorpose initialize not setting the variable nor returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixed antimatter shield initialize, a dependant function could sleep, making SSAtoms angry.
  • Fixed stairs initialize that could return without returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixed bush initialize not returning an hint to SSAtoms or setting the variable initialize.
  • Fixed random_pixel initialize not returning an hint or setting the initialize variable.
  • SSAtoms init now uses a switch statement only, slightly more performant.
  • Fix nuclear gun updates procs, that assumed a power supply present, when it is not guaranteed to be, causing a runtime.

GeneralCamo updated:

  • Added fuel pipes. Fuel pipes are intended to carry fuel for vessels, and have their own dedicated pump and connector for this.
  • Added auxiliary pipes. Auxiliary pipes are intended primarily for airlocks, but can be used in other various means. They have their own dedicated pump, connector, and vent.
  • Added a mode to airlock controllers to cycle air externally. This prevents external, potentially poisonous air from mixing with clean air.
  • Thrusters can now attach directly to fuel pipes.
  • Pressure tanks can now attach directly to all pipes.
  • The Intrepid and Spark now have externally cycled airlocks, and utilize the new pipes.
  • Added a scrubber to the Spark, which is directly vented out into space.
  • Ported Keekenox#1337's vents and scrubbers.

SimpleMaroon updated:

  • Library computers now print generic bibles that can be customized by anyone.
  • Added several in-universe religious book sprites as options when customizing bibles.
  • Only Chaplains who use the Set Religion verb will affect the SSticker.

26 March 2023

Alberyk updated:

  • The Lazarus injector can no longer revive mobs that are not tameable.

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Makes the announcement handling more robust, avoiding a runtime when it's called and no player is logged in (eg. when a random event triggers).
  • Fix intercom broadcasting Initialize() not setting the initialize variable nor returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fix med_pouches Initialize() not returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixed orange_hears not setting the initialized=TRUE value on Initialize, making SSAtom unhappy about it.
  • Fix some slime items initialize() not returning an hint to SSAtoms and not setting the initialize variable.
  • Fixed full windows init, now they set the initialized variable to true and return the correct hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fix slot machines init, they were unnecessarily creating the coins to add and then immediately QDELing them, making SSAtoms angry. They were also sleeping during init, making SSAtoms doubly angry.
  • Fix telescience stationary GPS Initialize() not setting the initialize variable nor returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixed some floor decals Initialize() that were not returning the correct hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fix two implanters Initialize() that didn't return an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixed hivebot beacon Initialize() being so heavy that BYOND sended it in background, thus sleeping, thus making SSAtom not happy.
  • Fix extinguisher cabinet Initialize(), was not returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fix radio encryption keys Initialize() not setting the initialized variable and not returning the hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixes some eyeglasses Initialize() that were not returning an hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fix statue Initialize(), that could self-del, making SSAtoms unhappy about it.
  • Fix mobile station holomap init, now setting the initialized variable and returning the correct hint to SSAtoms.
  • Fixed vending_product New() so that it assigns the parent return value to itself.
  • Fixes cleanable fuel decal initialize, they now return the correct hint.

Huntime updated:

  • Complete overhaul of Skrell Srom map/dreamscape.

ReadThisNamePlz updated:

  • Fixes vault access for OM. Also adds access requirements to the Vault door.
  • Removes double airlock spawner on the headmaster.

24 March 2023

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Removed the carp random events in favour of the overmap implementation.

23 March 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Fix material initialization for structures, ensuring they are init'd to the material, not a string.
  • Fix lattice Initialize, as it was QDELing directly instead of returning a QDEL HINT.
  • Implemented stack_trace(), a version of CRASH() that does not end the current proc, from /tg/.
  • Fixes slime initialization, so that the correct init hint is returned to SSAtoms.

ImmortalRedshirt updated:

  • The cochlear implant now costs only one point, like the other accessibility augments.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Replaces all mentions of 'genophage' with 'X'Lu'oa'.
  • Replaces all remaining mentions of 'Jargon Federation' with 'Nralakk Federation'.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixed some mapping oversights in the service area.
  • Fixed the bunker's escape route.

William Murdoch updated:

  • Added Chief Medical Officer labcoats to the loadout.

22 March 2023

Fluffyghost updated:

  • Fixes duplicate lattices in our maps.
  • Resolves some startup runtimes/harddels.
  • Removes minor objects from the old Aurora map that implement shitcode.
  • Implements auxtools_expr_stub, used by auxtools (the debugger dll) to get expressions with the debug console.
  • Fixes the issues found during debugging of not being able to copy values from the variables panel, debug console, or conditional breakpoints expressions.
  • Updated build chain to use the new rustg v1.2.0+a2 from our repository, after having updated our repository.
  • Updated byond version to use to 514.1589 from the previously set minor, in the chain.
  • Updated flyway version to use to 9.9.0.
  • Updated spacemandmm version to use to 1.7.3.
  • Removed version bindings for pip requirements.
  • Github pipeline now runs on Ubuntu 22.04 (from 20.04), both are LTS.
  • Added package requirements to correctly bind into the new version of rust-g.
  • Added some premade cooled floors, used in the AI chamber.
  • AI Chamber in Aurora and Horizon now uses the cooled floors.
  • Fixed ZAS unit tests (along with the mapping above) so now they correctly run. They were not since Aurora.
  • Fixed switch statements that were using double pipes, as they are either not supported since a while or never were.
  • Fixed switch statements based on random() that did not catch the variables, as the codechecks now catch them.
  • ZAS Unit Tests now tell when something fails the temperature, pressure and what expectation parameter they checked for.

Ramke updated:

  • Added 8 new Tajara-themed cups into loadout.

  • Replaced table lamp sprites. (Credit to CEV Eris, Kegdo.)

  • Replaced mass driver sprites. (Credit to /tg/station, Wallem.)

  • Finished the adhomian fish soup recipe.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixed the herring gull plushie grab intent interaction message having an extra "the".

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Changeling horror form has been reworked. It is now permanent, it does not passively regenerate health, cannot survive in a vacuum, and costs more chems to use the ability. In exchange, it has better stats across the board, and is marginally cheaper to purchase.

  • Improves telecrystal sprites.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Removed switch statements that used non-constant values in range checks for 515 compatibility.
  • Fixed several runtime errors related to creating wounds / handling pain on dropped / detached limbs.
  • Admins are now properly notified when someone attempts to vote for an early round restart.
  • Fixed beam timers not being deleted when the beam fizzles early.
  • Fixed station all-in-one relays not listening for the hailing frequency.
  • Paper bundles now correctly show the overlays attached to the first paper in the bundle.
  • Fixed a runtime error with dionae nymphs sprinting.
  • Fixed the supermatter control console not automatically updating.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added Resonant Shriek, a ling ability that is essentially chiropterean screech but without a stun, and just disorientation.
  • Added Dissonant Shriek, a ling ability that produces an EMP.
  • Added Electric Lockpick, a ling ability that opens doors.
  • Added Integrated Armour, a ling ability that gives the ling innate armour. Slightly worse than heavy armour.
  • Added Augmented Eyesight, a ling ability that gives the ling thermals. When active, it makes the user more vulnerable to flashes.
  • Added Fabricate Clothing, a ling ability that equips the ling with chameleon clothing.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Integrated mining drills can now be taken by Vaurca bulwarks and workers. The integrated drill has been moved from xenowear to augments in the loadout menu.

Alberyk, Happy_Fox updated:

  • Added a new random ruin to Adhomai, the Adhomian Schlorrgo Testing Site.

Ben10083 updated:

  • Workshop now has a Holopad.

Caelphon updated:

  • Added a crashed shuttle dungeon to Grove exoplanets, alongside ghostspawns of survivors.
  • Added a new exoplanet.

Geeves updated:

  • Greimorians now inject toxins into the same limb they hit. If the limb is robotic, no toxin is injected. Wearing armor lowers the probability of toxin being injected.
  • Ported CM dir-slashing, meaning, if you play a simple mob, you can now click at the edge of your screen, and any mobs in that direction will get slashed, provided they're adjacent to you.
  • There's no longer a power cost or delay when you fail to use leg actuators.
  • You can now jump to a location that contains railings with leg actuators.
  • Removed the silver and gold cost for leg actuators in the mechfab, it just costs steel and glass now.
  • Tweaked the leg actuator landing messages to make more grammatical sense, and adds a self message to them.

  • Added a variant of the mercenary hardsuit for use in the Einstein gear crates.
  • Added gear crates for antagonists wishing to play as Einstein to allow for a more unique set of weapons from other group antagonists.

  • Remapped all of D2 security. Swapped Armory and Brig positions, Bathroom is on D3, Equipment room swapped with processing cells.

14 February 2023

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the Okon ore unloading machine.

Geeves updated:

  • Added grenade and large grenade casings to the Autolathe, under the Arms and Ammunition section. Large casings are only available in hacked lathes.
  • Removed the option to print large grenade casings from Protolathes.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes HE pipes being invisible.
  • Fixes photocopiers not having an eject paper button.
  • Fixed lattice welding not consuming fuel.
  • Fixed a wrong button label.
  • Added machetes and machete holsters to the excavation closets in Research EVA and to the expedition weaponry locker in the Intrepid.
  • Material weapons now have armour penetration (increasing further if their damage exceeds a maximum force of 40), with the effectiveness depending on the material.
  • Added high-power sensors. When toggled at a sensor console (must be using normal or better sensors) they will scan things through opaque overmap objects in a wide range. They add heat, so be careful.
  • A report containing the bearings of all overmap objects is now sent to Horizon command consoles within 180 seconds from roundstart.
  • Fixed there being odd rows of blank spaces before sensor contacts.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The Intrepid navpoint was moved back to its original position in roughly the middle of the shuttle. The recent change to its position ended up causing issues on away sites and how it interacted with other overmap ships.
  • Some of the bridge deck navpoints had identical names and that meant they wouldn't work. That's been fixed too

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Security jobs now start with black gloves as part of their default loadout. Tajarans and Unathi should spawn with toeless boots depending on their job.
  • The Chief Engineer spawns with insuls now.

13 February 2023

Alberyk updated:

  • Some away sites have different sprites and colors.
  • S'rand'marr overmap planet objects now have lore accurate icons.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Changes the sensors console range input to a button selection ranging from 1 to max sensor range.
  • Tweaks sensors suites max range and heat efficiency values. Standard sensors are now 10 max range, and sustainable heat is at 4 range. Strong sensors are 14/6, weak are 7/4.
  • Horizon's sensors suite is now the 'strong' variant.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Removes the decrepit, unused skills in the loadout.

  • Adjusted the Adhomai inn to make it seem more lived in and fuctional.
  • The Amohdan Swordsman now has basic medical equipment.
  • The bayonet locker has been fixed and no longer has the wrong access on the Hailstorm.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a Konyanger hachimaki headband to the loadout.
  • Added a Wildlands Squadron uniform, a generic side cap, and four factional side caps to the loadout.

kyres1 updated:

  • Added new sprites based off of our current roster of third-party ships.
  • Remade all overmap sprites.

08 February 2023

Caelphon updated:

  • Added a new recipe called Ration Coffee. 2u Coffee and 1u Water make it.

Geeves updated:

  • Spawning with Aut'akh graspers will no longer duplicate your right hand.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the overalls sprites missing their shoulder straps.
  • Fixes the Zeng-Hu surgical apron being invisible.
  • Fixes the chef jackets being invisible.
  • Makes identification card's names flow better when read.
  • Cleans up and improves the guest pass terminal's code.
  • Makes the arrivals announcer announce the map type instead of just "station".

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Bags of holding have been renamed and made adminspawn only.
  • The default character now has skin tone 125 with the haircut bedhead 2 instead of skin tone 35 and bald.
  • Some monsters can no longer spawn in the warehouse.
  • Some monsters can no longer be spawned by golden slime cores.
  • Living mushrooms are now adminspawn only.
  • Some drinks have been renamed and refluffed. Soda cans are now properly labelled.
  • The 10mm pistol and ammo lockers in the crew armory are now properly labelled, and the fortification supplies are better organized.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Ports med-pouches from Bay. Contents in medical kits have been changed to reflect this.
  • Cough syrup's chemical is now named antidexafen. Any similarity with any chemicals, living or dead, is purely coincidental.

07 February 2023

Alberyk, Kyres1, KingOfThePing updated:

  • Added a framework that allows space sector to have their custom lobby art, icon and sounds.
  • Added unique lobby assets for Adhomai.

Connorjg1 updated:

  • Fix the capitalization for mentions of Vaurca Hive.

Geeves updated:

  • Piloting a ship or shuttle while confused, such as when drunk or under the effects of some chemicals, now has a chance to offset the angle you meant to go in.
  • Tactical goggles now process HUDs correctly.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Cryo now works correctly for offships. If your mob doesn't despawn when you ghost, it means that there isn't a cryogenic oversight computer mapped in.
  • Added origin and culture restrictions for ghost spawners. Currently only implemented for Solarian offships.
  • Ported the radiation subsystem from Baystation. Radiation will now behave more realistically.
  • Added geiger counters.
  • Asteroid exoplanets now always spawn next to the Horizon.

Ramke updated:

  • Tails will now appear on ghost roles and spawned mobs that are meant to have a tail.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Added skrell bandana to Skrell loadout.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds lights to the telecommunications server hall.

Sniblet updated:

  • Bigger, scarier font for the one notification you get that black k'ois has lobotomized you.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • The CE's hardsuit will now spawn with an integrated suit cooler for our IPC friends.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes invisible bloodbag boxes.

06 February 2023

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Adds welding helmets and first aid kits to the PRA mining camp away site.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added a Zeng-Hu and military version of the tactical goon goggles added by HappyFox.
  • There is a medical goggles loadout selection now. Only First Responders can select these.
  • Renamed the tactical goggles selection due to the above. The label 'security' is appended to it.
  • Fixes the tactical goggles not offering any flash protection until you pushed it up and then back down.
  • Added the generic military goggles to the mercenary spawn zone and the three Solarian offships
  • Safety goggles now inherently layer above hair unless you adjust them.

05 February 2023

Geeves updated:

  • Tips are now handled in the code rather than via config, so you may see some new ones that the server hasn't been updated for yet.

Geeves, Kyres1, Ramke updated:

  • Added a new shorter tail type for Tajara.
  • Added a colorable tail cloth accessory for the standard Tajara tail.

SimpleMaroon updated:

  • The Zeng-Hu Nralakk division cloak is no longer invisible on your person.

04 February 2023

Geeves updated:

  • You will no longer lose internals if you drop a mask/helmet and have an airtight helmet/mask to spare.
  • You will now lose internals if you drop a helmet and don't have an airtight mask to spare.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Fixed a missing item state of the cropped designer jacket.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Overmap hazards are no longer coloured for no reason.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Rounds out Revenant damage resistances to 25% reduction to brute or burn. Removes the evasion mechanic vs. lasers.
  • Revenants can now be totally understood by Tau Ceti speakers. Revenants also now have different contextual speaking verbage! This aims to make them seem more ghostly instead of disgusting.
  • Removes the sound effect howl when Revenants speak. It was just annoying.

Sniblet updated:

  • Phoron works again
  • K'ois contaminated phoron has been recalled until it can be implemented in a way that doesn't break all phoron

03 February 2023

FluffyGhost updated:

  • The ship sensors now work as a sonar or radar, obscuring the view when the first object is pinged, otherwise the things not in range will not be seen.
  • The ships now need to be scanned before they appear and are identified, which takes a little of time.
  • New instruments implementation, using a mostly a synthesizer.
  • Trader and maintenance can now have a guitar, violin or trumpeth
  • Sound synthesizer based on sound tokens and player.
  • Old instruments implementation.

Geeves updated:

  • Added temperature pack accessories to the loadout menu, with heat and cold cooling/warming by 5 degrees celsius, and volcano and blizzard cooling/warming by 10 degrees celsius.
  • Temperature discomfort messages are now based off body temperature instead of the temperature of the air your breath.
  • Humans now sweat to get rid of heat.
  • Hostile mobs now think and react faster while in a combat state.
  • Hostile mobs now attack the target nearest to them.
  • Exosuit chassis now have a baseline level of medium armor, so even mechs without dedicated armor can resist blows.
  • The gravity generator now recovers faster after locking on, and the throws have been made asynchronous so recharging starts faster.
  • Remote controlled exosuits can now be disassembled for repair, just use a wrench on them while the maintenance protocols are active.
  • Examining exosuits now properly state when the component is completely broken.
  • Roundstart Ripley exosuits now properly spawn with armor.
  • Fixed a bug that caused exosuit and simple mobs attacks to ignore exosuit armor.
  • Fixed a bug that caused simple mobs to aggro on people inside exosuits and attack them directly, bypassing the exosuit.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Overmap processing is now on a priority subsystem. This means that ships will now be REALLY fast, and should keep being fast even when the server is lagging.
  • You can no longer combat roll/turn more than once at a time.
  • Maneuvers can no longer throw you into deep space.
  • Lowered Physician slots to 2.
  • Lowered Medical Intern slots to 2.

Nope63 updated:

  • Adds a power knot to Xenoarchaeology for powering emitters.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Tweaks the kitchen foyer wall mountable layout slightly. Gives hydroponics a window so they can listen to kitchen conversations.

Sniblet updated:

  • Zeng-Hu Emotion Manipulators now give you SPAN_GOOD instead of SPAN_NOTICE messages. This means they are green.
  • Added punctuation to 'feeling' artifact effects.
  • /reagent/toxin/phoron no longer spawns in-game, replaced with three new types.
  • Phoron can be phoron/pure, which is the one the SCC is looking for, phoron/kois, which spawns in unfiltered k'ois bars and k'ois fungus and is only useful for poisoning, causing mycosis, and vaurca respiration, or phoron/kois/black, which is useful for bioterrorism.
  • This means that you can no longer solve the phoron crisis with k'ois. For now?

WickedCybs updated:

  • Fixed some navpoints on the outside of the Horizon. The upper deck had duplicated navpoints that were not set properly. Few of the navpoints were too close to the map border too. Should make it safer to go to those and reduce ahelps.
  • Lowers the prices of a few ling abilities by one. Affects arm blade, blind sting, silence sting.
  • Added that dying in horror form as a changeling is permanent to the ability help text.

WickedCybs, MattAtlas updated:

  • Added the blue river away site. That might be familiar to those coming from other baycode servers. It still has its stuff and some changes for the Aurora
  • Multi-Z away sites are fixed as part of this PR. There was some issue involving them that Matt handled.

02 February 2023

Alberyk, Atteria, Canon35, Wowzewow (Wezzy), NiennaB, Kyres1, KingOfThePing updated:

  • Added the S'rand'marr space sector, including its lore planets as visitable exoplanets with their own unique ruins.

PurplePineapple updated:

  • Added a cropped leather jacket to the loadout. It's just the standard toggle jacket with new icons.
  • Cropped leather jacket icons, originally made by GeneralPantsu for SojournStation13. Edited slightly to fit Aurora icons.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds a high back and X-shaped back version of the overalls.
  • Adds a shorts and skirt version of the overalls and its variants.
  • Turns the loadout overalls into an accessory to allow for layering and lets them be worn as both overwear and an accessory.
  • Turns the shorts into a contained sprite and cleans up the code.

Azlan, Geeves updated:

  • Added a new AI emotion for the status displays, Diagnostics.

  • Unathi now get a unique flavour description for Xuizi Juice.

  • Fixed airtight plastic flaps stopping working after shuttles moves.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed an issue where wall icons and other smoothed icons would fail to update.
  • Potentially fixed an issue with the server failing to reboot / launch correctly.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Removes invisible hitbox from rollerbeds so buckling bodybags will be easier.

29 January 2023

Alberyk updated:

  • Added cryo to the Haildstorm.
  • The hailstorm now has the proper ship guns, two rotatory guns.
  • The NKA merchant shuttle can now dock back with its mothership.
  • The stargazer light's color now matches the space sector starlight's color.
  • Added a new away site: the Sani'Orios smuggling outpost.

  • Given machinists access to medical records again, along various other programs they had access to when they were called roboticists.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now store cigarette packets in helmets.

Sheeplets updated:

  • Minor mapping changes to the Medical Bay.

Sniblet updated:

  • Unary pumps, outlet injectors, and scrubbers will no longer turn small ventcrawling mobs (borers) into dust on contact.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Ports a lot of the old Aurora asteroid ruins to the exoplanets the Horizon will encounter. Most of the content is on barren exos/asteroids unfortunately.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes window clipping.

28 January 2023

Afya updated:

  • Ghost can now medscan IPCs/Robots.

Geeves updated:

  • Added some permanent teleporter beacons around the map, specifically the bridge. Replaced a couple movable beacons with permanent ones, like in xenoarchaelogy and the engineering break room.
  • Added three movable teleporter beacons, a first aid, and a box of flares to the teleporter room.
  • Teleporter beacons can now be anchored to the floor by using a screwdriver on them.

27 January 2023

Afya updated:

  • Wands of nothing can now be recharged.
  • Wands of nothing have 10 shots instead of 20.
  • Wands no longer use firing pins.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed look up/look down verbs being buggy.

GeneralCamo updated:

  • Idris liaisons can no longer be IPCs

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes mobs floating on holes.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds a proper public library computer.

25 January 2023

JohnWildkins updated:

  • The sound component of flashbangs no longer stuns unless you have sensitive and unprotected hearing.
  • Eye damage from flashes has been significantly reduced.
  • You can no longer use a flash that isn't in your hand to AOE flash.
  • soundbang_act renamed to noise_act; ear protection now uses defines for preset values like flash/eye protection

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed skin.dmf weirdness on 515.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • All ghost ships now have GPSes.
  • Adds a damaged Solarian powerloader and adds it to the SFA away ship.
  • Replaces the FSF corvette's powerloader with a Solarian powerloader.

23 January 2023

Drawsstuff, atteria, Cerebulon updated:

  • Added a variety of new tattoos to the markings selection.

FluffyGhost updated:

  • Fixes decls merged from PR 15549.

Geeves updated:

  • Added sensor array away sites, one is guaranteed to spawn on every map. They have a strong sensor suite that can support 4 tiles of illumination, but need to be set up before they can be made operational.
  • Carp shoals and schools now a 5 percent to be a movable event, which means it'll move across the overmap.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Heavy armour and ballistic armour bullet resist have been buffed by 5 points.
  • Security now gets a second burst rifle.
  • The PEAC now actually has armour penetration, meaning it will actually do damage. It is not very good against organic targets, however.
  • Increased PEAC anti-materiel coefficient to 6.
  • Full auto now globally has a 0.5s fire delay, instead of a 0.1s delay.
  • Adjusted most other calibers' AP to compensate for armour buffs.
  • Fixes shuttles not bringing shuttle parts with them.
  • The server has been updated to BYOND 515.

MattAtlas, DasFox, Azlan updated:

  • Resprited dominian greatcoats, consular greatcoats and consular uniforms.
  • Added shorter versions of the dominian greatcoat to the loadout.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Makes merchants unable to be antagonists round-start.
  • Fixes the internal armoury blast doors button being set to HoS access instead of general armoury access.
  • Fixes the anti-tank warhead having "armor_penetration" defined twice.
  • Overhauls the library.
  • Tweaks the pharmacy's layout.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Added woolen hats to the colourable hat selection in the loadout.
  • Added corporate woolen hats to the relevant faction headwear selections.
  • Added NanoTrasen and Orion berets to the loadout in their faction headwear selections.
  • Added ear warmers to the earwear section of the loadout. These can be worn like earmuffs or attached to headwear.
  • Added mittens to the gloves section of the loadout. These can be worn by all species.

WickedCybs updated:

  • LARP has been enhanced. The tactical goggles and welding goggles layer above hair as they likely should.

Wowzewow(Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new material and medical stack sprites.
  • Adjusts application sounds for medical stacks.

22 January 2023

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes some more origins not saving.
  • Pulling heavy objects now properly applies slowdown.
  • Slowdown for human mobs is now capped at -2, fixing unathi and tajara going slower than they should be.

  • Removes chaplain's leftover accesses.

  • The jukebox now uses the sound player.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix slowdown being applied twice.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds a isolation cell to the brig.
  • Adds brig lockdown blast doors to the windows in the communal area.
  • Tweaks the communal layout.
  • Replaces the security areas with relative areas.
  • Makes reinforced windows and window panes need a weapon with 8 or higher force to inflict damage.
  • Tweaks the plastic jug's force to be more believable.
  • Makes tools not attack windows unless on harm intent.
  • Adds a unique communal emergency closet with the bare necessities.
  • Removes a duplicate intercom from the warden's office.
  • Fixes the mounted flash's name being capitalized.

Alberyk, Atteria updated:

  • Added the tesla rejuvenation suit as a currently unplayable species.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes drinks allowing you to go into negative speed values.
  • Shuttles will no longer bring background turfs like space or exoplanet turfs with them.

Ramke updated:

  • Dispenser (coffee, chem, alcohol, etc.) UIs no longer open with a single row of reagents.

  • Replaced the Francisca ammo on the Hailstorm ship with Grauwolf ammo.

  • Fixes washing machine typo.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added a button inside the armoury that controls the blast doors. The warden and the HoS can use this. It replaces the bottom wall charger.

Wowzewow(Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new sprites and updates sprite generation for medbots.

listerla updated:

19 January 2023

Alberyk, Atteria, Canon35, Wowzewow (Wezzy), CaptainGecko updated:

  • Added a new ship: the DPRA Hailstorm.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds missing description for the "neck accessories selection (colourable)" entry in the loadout.

atteria updated:

  • Repaths spaghetti, tweaks the description of spaghetti with tomato sauce.

18 January 2023

Geeves updated:

  • Baseline screens now render under glasses.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • All flash effects (flashbang, flashes, welding w.o protection, etc.) now deal damage to eyes relative to their effect intensity.
  • Handheld flashes are now significantly more powerful, no longer stopped by sunglasses, etc.
  • Handheld flashes' AOE flash can now be performed by using them in-hand with harm intent.
  • Backend code for flash effects now unified under flash_act. Stunning sonic effects (e.g. flashbangs) now unified under soundbang_act.
  • Significantly cleaned up handheld flash code.
  • Vaurcae and Tajarans will now only take extra damage from flashes when their night vision is active, and when they do not have flash protection.
  • Dionae now take flash damage from all sorts of flashes, and are weakened by major sources (welding, flashes). They also gain energy equal to the intensity of the flash.

17 January 2023

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Floating chat messages now follow you in -and- out of the closet! (And all other 'enterable' objects.).
  • Sodium chloride now overdoses properly.
  • Cleaned up a whole mess of runtime errors related to bad clients, null objects, etc.

The Stryker, NewOriginalSchwann updated:

  • Adds a Lyodii accent to Morozi and Exile origins. Description done by Schwann.
  • Adds Novi Jadran to Imperial Exile origins.

atteria updated:

  • Resprited the modular laptop to three-quarters perspective.

15 January 2023

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes some origins not saving.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • Sleepers can now inject people with tricordrazine.

14 January 2023

Geeves updated:

  • Moved toys out of the General loadout section and into the Toys section.
  • You can now use toy mechas in-hand to put them on the floor in an active state. Shouting Attack at them will make them seek out other mechas to fight. Click them on help intent to pick them back up.
  • Simple mobs' overhead text will now match exactly what they're saying.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Floating chat messages will now follow you when you speak before exiting an enclosing object (closet, charging unit, sleeper, etc).

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added a way for Origins to give the character one or more mechanical traits. Currently only implemented for some human origins: New Hai Phong, Visegrad, Mictlan, most Dominian origins, Assunzione, Himeo, most Elyran origins, to name a few.
  • Split the Venusian Cytherean and Jintarian origins.
  • Split the Eridani Citizen and Dreg origins.
  • The NHP origin now matches the wiki's origin restrictions.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes diona nymphs not having a description.

atteria updated:

  • Resprited snow and added some snow decals.

  • Adds Dionae Executive Officers

11 January 2023

PurplePineapple updated:

  • Aim mode now does not restrict movement, radio, or item use by default. You can set it yourself instead of accidentally shooting people because you forgot.

10 January 2023

FluffyGhost updated:

  • Refactored /datum/observ into /singleton/observ.
  • Refactored /decl/ into /singleton/.
  • Added singleton base class and abstract meta-propriety as dependencies.

Geeves updated:

  • Revenants can now teleport anywhere they can see with the middle mouse button, as long as there isn't a dense object on the tile. It has a five second cooldown.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Firing guns no longer slows you down.
  • Fixed the pipe dispenser dispensing the wrong pipes.
  • Added chugging. Clickdrag a reagent container you're holding in your hand to your character. Note that you'll lose breath while chugging.
  • Added knocking and slamming your hand on a table. While aiming for right or left hand, grab intent click a table to knock, harm intent to slam.
  • Added an info description on glasses on how to perform a toast.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added a thruster subtype that only requires electricity to be supplied to it in-game. This is probably something that won't be something that's seen often.
  • The runtime shuttle had its gas thrusters replaced with ion thrusters.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Adds Dionae as a choice to some ghostship roles
  • Adds two new Dionae-themed awayships, the rokz and serz voidtamer ships.
  • Adds new carp ponchos to the dionae loadout.

Sheeplets updated:

  • Boiled fjylozyn is no longer hilariously poisonous.

  • Replaced the NanoTrasen logo AI core sprite with an SCC logo version.

  • Tweaks telecommunications layout.

  • Starlight is now colored on a per-sector basis.

05 January 2023

FluffyGhost updated:

  • Refactored /datum/observ into /singleton/observ.
  • Added singleton base class and abstract meta-propriety as dependencies.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now color your prosthetics by using the body marking system and selecting the correlating IPC-limb type.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Adds admin verbs to load map templates in round.
  • Fixes late spawned templates' pipes being bugged and not working.
  • Added support for multi-z away sites.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Changes "NT Default" to "default" in AI laws.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Big change to Horizon's propulsion areas. Port propulsion doesn't also feed the starboard anymore. They can both be started independently of each other.
  • To accomplish what was noted above, the starboard room is now a mirror of the portside room essentially. Both propulsion areas were moved up a little, which shouldn't be too noticeable other than having a little more walking space by the atmospheric tanks.
  • The Horizon's mass was tweaked to make it easier to move around. This should allow even a novice engineering team to get it to a decent level of thrust.

04 January 2023

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed the Overmap being 15 tiles smaller than it should be.
  • Fixed overmap hazards not spawning correctly. There are now MANY more hazards.

03 January 2023

MattAtlas updated:

  • Potentially fixes bluespace jump lag.
  • Potentially fixes lobby icon transitions.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes assistants being able to be independent.

02 January 2023

Ben10083 updated:

  • Ai cores and Solar Panels can now be built again.

FluffyGhost updated:

  • Added ability to the sensors console to send an announcement about incoming fire, along with the direction it's coming from, and to announce when there's no fire incoming (and thus to resume damage control).
  • Expanded the Intrepid helm room and moved the sensors console, added a window to allow the sensors console operator to see the people buckled and see the helm, added two softsuit dispensers to fill the space a little, made the window doors towards the cannon station a double window and duplicated it to the right of the sensors/helm area for symmetry.

Greenjoe updated:

  • Adds a selection of Tajaran clothing, aimed towards New Kingdom nobles, which can be selected in the loadout.
  • adjusts some of the existing Tajaran clothing items so that they may be colored better, and so their details are not lost when coloring.
  • adds tajara adjusted earring sprites, now actually on their ears rather then the sides of their head.
  • the fancy jacket is now in the coat section, instead of wrongly in the uniform section.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Cleaned up cell charger interaction and processing code.
  • Cell chargers no longer send 90 kW into the void every time they're unwrenched and moved.
  • Fixed empty cells not initializing with the proper icon state.
  • Cell chargers now audibly ping when their attached cell has finished charging.

MattAtlas, DasFox, Azlan updated:

  • Renamed the Dominian summer dress to Dominian noble dress.
  • Renamed the Dominian noblewoman dress to Dominian noble greatdress.
  • Separated the Dominian clothing section into a suit selection and a dress selection.
  • Added white Dominian cape versions.
  • Added house variants of the Dominian noble dress.
  • Added alternate black versions of the Dominian noble dress.
  • Added house variants of the Dominian suit.
  • The Dominian commoner dresses have been resprited. Sleeveless versions have been rolled into the main dress, just use the roll sleeves verb.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds missing cameras to deck 3 and deck 2.
  • Expands the machinist workshop. Gives the machinist workshop a welder fuel tank and tinting windows.
  • Fixes the machinist workshop ringer terminal not being mounted on the wall.
  • Properly removes the deprecated mule, floor, ED209, and security assemblies.
  • Adds an emergency escape hatch to the main elevator on deck 1.
  • Fixes missing power cable in research.

31 December 2022

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the first responder minimum age not reflecting the wiki.

30 December 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • The Bridge's coffee machine now has all the cartridges instead of just one.
  • Splitting full rod stacks no longer gives you another full stack.

29 December 2022

FluffyGhost updated:

  • Added a blank 5.56 (a556) projectile and box (magazine).

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Headsets no longer reset channel settings when moving them between inventory slots.
  • Headset channel on/off settings now are taken into account over the frequency of the radio when determining if a radio should hear a channel.

Nope63 updated:

  • Fixes IAC docking port, a missing port connector and some rogue non-cardinal walls.
  • Gives the IAC rescue ship a rescue hardsuit.

connorjg1/talion updated:

  • Fixed a Kataphract vessel spelling mistake.

28 December 2022

Geeves updated:

  • Using an assembly detailer on Wearable Integrated Circuits will now change the green coloring on them.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Added a selection of different coloured fox plushies to the loadout.

27 December 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix AI turrets trying to shoot the brains out of cyborgs.

26 December 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed secure channel announcements (command, engineering, security, etc.) being announced over Common.

25 December 2022

Afya updated:

  • You can pull out broken lights without grab intent.
  • Added mechanics description to light figures mentioning grab intent.

Geeves updated:

  • Vision enhanced retina's activation message now mentions pupils narrowing instead of you peering down them.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Changing the IFF on an away ship no longer bricks comms for any late-joiners.
  • Away ships with access to the Common channel (casino, etc.) now properly broadcast that channel to crew.
  • Capitalized 'Grand Romanovich Casino' when used as a proper noun (e.g., as a radio channel).
  • Fixed intercoms not respecting speaker on/off setting when switching channels.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Added a gold and a silver crucifix to the religion tab of the loadout.
  • Tweaked the old emergency flare sprites and gave them animations.

Nope63 updated:

  • Fixes an overlap between the IAC Technician and Coordinator roles that should allow proper spawning.

24 December 2022

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the interrogation radio init.

23 December 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Moved a significant portion of machinery processing to on-demand processing, lightening the load on the server.
  • Shifted turret targeting and simple mob targeting to use the spatial grid system for searching.
  • Telecomms machines will now once again reboot themselves after being EMPed.
  • Fixed a divide-by-zero runtime with adding reagents to a full container.
  • Fixed an issue with admin proc call failing on unowned procs.
  • Turrets now properly reset and close when all targets are lost.
  • Turrets continue to quickly acquire targets until they fully reset.
  • Windoors no longer play a closed deny animation when interacted with while open without access.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Added alcoholic eggnog.
  • Prepared the Idris Cruiser for Christmas with various additions.
  • Added garlands, snowflake stickers, snowman stickers and tinsel as halloween decorations.
  • Added all of the above in one way or another to the Idris Cruise map for the event.
  • Tweaked some of the previously added crates of stuff on the Idris Cruise map.
  • Fixes broken gift wrapper, krampus gifts and regular presents.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes the Intrepid being unable to land on planets.

listerla updated:

  • Fixed anomaly harvesters disappearing when enabled.

22 December 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Exosuits can now toggle inflatable doors when interacting with them in help intent and with no modules selected.

Geeves updated:

  • You now count as successfully transferring at roundend if you're on the ship's Z-level and in a ship area.
  • Middle-Mouse Clicking a suit with storage slots will now open its inventory, like labcoats for example.
  • You now only remove lightbulbs from their fixtures if you click on it with grab intent.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Removed photon grenades from the antag uplink.

Peppermint updated:

  • Fixes area code for SFA ship.

21 December 2022

Geeves updated:

  • You can now select your uniform's rolled state in the Loadout menu.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes fire alarm sounds not stopping.

Ramke updated:

  • Added a new Tajara comic available in loadout.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Renames "station bounced radio" to shortwave radio.

20 December 2022

Geeves updated:

  • Putting a lattice/catwalk on an open space makes it not be a hole anymore, meaning you won't fall through it, not use jetpack fuel to traverse them, and mechs can now walk over them.
  • Jetpack users will now visibly float when they're jetting over an open turf.
  • Jetpack ion trails now fire whenever the jetpack thrusts, not on a processing timer.
  • Attacking someone or throwing someone no longer resets your floating state.
  • Trying to pass through an open space with a catwalk will now report the catwalk as the blocker, instead of the open space.
  • Slimes now pass their mutation chance on to their offspring.
  • You can now increase a slime's mutation chance by injecting them with unstable mutagen, and you can decrease it by injecting them with slime jelly.
  • Slimes will no longer wander or follow their leader while pulled or grabbed, and you can prevent them from chasing their target with a blue, aggressive, grab.
  • Button- and colorpad-like inputs on the integrated circuit goggles now work as expected.
  • Renaming wearable integrated circuit clothing now works correctly.

Granodd updated:

  • Adds a sprite for non-berry pancakes.
  • Creates a non-berry version of pancakes and makes berry pancakes a subtype of it.
  • Makes ashtrays actually empty into the bin instead of onto the floor.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed psiblade and psiping not working.
  • Fixed drop pouches being invisible.
  • Fixed holsters not showing up on the mob.
  • Removed redundant flip verb on drop pouches. Use them in hand with no items inside to flip them.

Nope63 updated:

  • Added an Interstellar Aid Corps third party ship and an IAC info pamphlet.

Peppermint updated:

  • Adds cryo tubes and power wire.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Gives xenobotanists and xenobiologists access to the main R&D lab.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Fixes the display text for spray bottles showing the wrong volume when adjusting the nozzle.

Stryker, NewOriginalSchwann updated:

  • Adds Novi Jadran and Imperial Frontier accents to their respective origins.
  • Removes Vulgar Morozi from Novi Jadran and Imperial Frontier origins.

19 December 2022

Geeves updated:

  • You can now click on the slime smart fridge with the slime core bag to insert all the cores into the fridge again. As a side-effect, you can now fill fridges by clicking on them with any storage item.
  • Slime core bags sort their contents by name instead of type, and used extracts are displayed seperately.
  • A slime extract that turns used while in the bag now automatically updates your storage UI.
  • You can now collapse rollerbeds again.
  • Clicking the HUD icon of integrated circuit clothing now works correctly.
  • Integrated Circuit advanced locator refs now work correctly again.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed subspace broadcasters having no overmap range, thus capturing messages and not sending them to away sites near the Horizon.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes pushups.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Added new scarf sprites.
  • Scarves can now be used in hand to retie them into other styles.
  • Zebra scarves are now colourable.
  • The Remove Accessory radial wheel now displays proper colours and overlays for all accessories.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • The Horizon's docking port that's used by the orion express ship now shares a frequency with it, allowing it to actually dock.
  • The Spark dock airlock functions as an actual airlock again
  • The Intrepid's transit zone has been moved- due to complications it will not autodock, but it can pseudo-dock with south facing docking ports easily now.
  • The Spark's transit marks have been moved, so they can now dock properly with any functional south-facing dock.

atteria updated:

  • Fixed rogue pixels on two Dominia fleet uniforms

harryob updated:

  • Disposal units no longer bypass high tech locking devices.

18 December 2022

Geeves updated:

  • Your body will now disentegrate into a skeleton on death if you have more than 100 genetic damage.
  • Added skeleton sprites for monkeys.
  • Refactored mutation code to use bitflags rather than a list, making it faster and less memory intensive.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Restores the custodial utility holster sprites.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Motherships for shuttles will now use a more visible icon type on the overmap so they can differentiate themselves from their shuttles. Shuttles and motherships will share the same colour.

listerla updated:

  • Ported Xenoarchaeology artifact and machinery sprites from Tau Ceti Station.
  • Building skeletons from fossils is now easier.
  • Xenoarchaeologists should find fewer dud energy guns.
  • PMCG shorts are no longer invisible.

17 December 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed some mapping and access issues in the People's Space Station and Tajaran ships.
  • Added the Hadiist Satellite away site.

Alberyk, HappyFox updated:

  • Added a new sprite for peanuts.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed an issue where speech problems (drunk slurring, etc) weren't being applied properly.
  • Fixed commandable animals not listening when their short name was used.
  • Fixed alarm consoles not displaying any alarms.
  • Fixed looping sounds not initializing properly.
  • Fixed the missing HOS jacket sprite.
  • Discord bot (and other things that interact with the staff list) no longer break when a de-admined staff member leaves the server.
  • Fixed the bot runtiming the server by asking about the evacuation controller before it existed.
  • Fixed mapped-in mobs (namely animals like Columbo) not being added to the hearables grid properly, thus acting deaf.
  • Fixed an issue where voice mimic / masking wouldn't be respected by tcomms logging.
  • Removed virtual mobs implementation in favor of the spatial grid system, as the two conflict.
  • Re-add handling for species-specific speech problems (only dionae reduced range for losing their head, currently).

Peppermint updated:

  • Remaps the SFA away ship.
  • Rebalances the SFA away ship.

PurplePineapple updated:

  • Added a handheld video game device in the loadout selection called the GameHelm.
  • Icons for the GameHelm device. Icon credit goes to Azlan#0852 and PinkestKitten#8019.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Standardises contained sprite paths.
  • Makes alternate bridge crew uniforms follow the proper color palette.

atteria updated:

  • Improved the coloring of yarn items.

16 December 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Added the People's Space Station as an away site.

Geeves updated:

  • Slimes will now consider hunting when they're under the grow threshold, instead of when they're at 80% of their maximum nutrition, so they should hunt more often.
  • Raised the slime random hunt chance to 35%, up from 25%.
  • You can now buckle yourself and others into a chair or bed if they're adjacent to it, the bucklee will attempt to step onto it, then buckle.
  • Added status indicators to the top right of the screen that indicate when you're bleeding or drunk, or both.
  • Chemsprayers and xenoblasters now report how many units of reagent they have left after you spray something.
  • Adjusting the pressure nozzle of a spray now accurately tells you how many reagents you'll use, and in how many lanes your spray will go.
  • Your emergency survival box and loadout items will now spawn in a plastic bag if you don't have a backpack.
  • Your wristbound portable computer will now attach to your ID slot if you spawn with a wristbound radio.
  • Your wristbound will now hold your ID and automatically register you, even if it spawns in the wrist slot.
  • Slime Core Bags now show a sorted and numbered list of the cores inside, instead of throwing it into a massive unsorted storage list.
  • Ported push-ups from CM. You can initiate them from the IC tab by hitting Do Pushup.

PoZe updated:

  • Added Ship Weapons access type for flak cannon, longbow, and Secure Ammunitions Storage. Roles that now have it: hangar technician, all head of staff, engineers.
  • Removed QM access from miner and hangar tech. Now they shouldn't be able to access QM's room.
  • Fixed Access for the door that seperates AI upload lobby from research hallway, now cyborg's have access to it by default.
  • Fixed AI shells's all station access.
  • Updated holomap to work with the new horizon's map.
  • Added holomaps to the hallways on all 3 decks of the horizon.
  • Cyborgs now have a View Holomap verb to see holomap from their position.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Gives investigators access to the holding cells.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Second deck starboard maintenance didn't have many emergency shutters and air alarms within it. This has been fixed.

listerla updated:

  • Ported new slime sprites from Tau Ceti Station.
  • Added a number of in-lore holidays to the holiday system.
  • Dominian Unathi may now follow the Thakh faith.

  • Fixes Xenoarchaeologists not having an icon on security HUDs.
