  • Adds a pump from the mix loop to the mixed gas tank.

13 December 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • The submachine gun's sprites are no longer missing.
  • The anomaly suit's sprites are no longer missing

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Audible emotes (say !emote ...) are now audible by other players again.
  • Fixed runechat breaking on bolded audible emotes.
  • Deleted / cleaned up some unused saycode.
  • Respawn timers are now properly reset upon spawning / being granted a respawn.
  • Respawn / death timer is no longer reset when observing after having already spawned once in the round.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Tucking into a roll is now an 0.6x damage modifier instead of an 0.2x damage modifier.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Tricordrazine now needs water to react, which makes Tricordrazine no longer mix in your bloodstream if you inject inaprovaline and dylovene at the same time.
  • Fixes empty hazmat gear closets spawning in operations.
  • Adds a new hair ribbon, a neck ribbon, and a neck bow.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • The tramp freighter now has a gun. yeah.
  • The budgets for away sites with ghost spawners and ruins have been seperated, ensuring a mix of both in rounds.

anconfuzedrock, CNEGecko updated:

  • Unathi pirate voidsuits have softer outlines.

listerla updated:

  • Reduced handheld mirror's size.

12 December 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Asteroid exoplanets now have an unique overmap object.

Connorjg1 updated:

  • Vaurca warriors are weaker against brute damage now and can now be killed easier.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Requests console input can now be canceled, and no longer permits you to send faxes from three rooms away.
  • Hoists can no longer move through catwalks and/or lattices.
  • Hoists no longer cause issues when hoisting mobs.
  • Hoists can now hoist occupied air bubbles.
  • Clicking on hoist hooks now detach what they're holding to the turf beneath the hoist.
  • SCC telecomms staff now remember to regularly rotate the message server's password once again.
  • Fixed intercoms not broadcasting radio messages.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Makes overhead text for audible emotes visually separate from regular talking.

10 December 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed away site telecomms AIOs not initializing properly, causing comms to fail.
  • Fixed AI shells having no access.
  • Fixed AI / borgs / etc. speaking locally when sending a radio message.

MattAtlas, Wildkins updated:

  • You are no longer affected by ship maneuvers if there is an active gravity generator.
  • AIs no longer get thrown around by ship maneuvers.

PoZe updated:

  • Sensor suit will now have 5 different icon states depending on range it is set to (Since our range is not a constant and could change in code, I did not make it 7 but rather precentage of max view range). It also has another icon effect if heat is above 85%.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the command bunker blast door being accessible to anyone.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes alignment of turf windows.

listerla updated:

  • Filled in a pixel on the short shorts, to prevent clipping.

09 December 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Two exoplanets of the same type should no longer spawn.

GeneralCamo & Bloodpriest updated:

  • Ported Atmospheric Pipe Meter sprites from Eris.
  • Ported Airlock Sensor, Control, and Access Control sprites from Eris.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Tcomms relays have been removed. All telecomms machines now handle traffic on all connected z-levels by default, making them superfluous.
  • Ported and overhauled generated away site frequencies from Bay. Away ships and sites now have their own radio frequency, accessible via ';' or ':h'.
  • Hailing frequency, ':y', added to all ships and most of the command / exploration crew on the Horizon. Radios (headsets) now have a button to reset to their preset frequency, if tuned away.
  • Significantly overhauled the systems underpinning telecomms / radio broadcasts, relying more directly on /datum/signal creation.
  • Ported the spatial grid / orthogonal range search algorithms from /tg/, making checks for hearers in range much faster, and thus easing server load during high-pop events.
  • Ported the trait system from /tg/ and refactored / reorganized telecomms machines as necessary for the above changes.

PoZe updated:

  • Reworked cyborg's access to be role specific and reflect their crewmate's access for the same role/department.
  • Added ability to change cyborg's access in Robotics Control Console from role specific to all access and vice-versa.
  • Added displaying of what access type cyborg has in status tab.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Moves the bunker to a more central location on deck 3.
  • Fixes the atmospherics volume tanks starting at 15000 kPa output pressure.

08 December 2022

Connorjg1 updated:

  • K'lax Hopeful Helmets are now flash proof so Vaurca can fight with their eyes intact.
  • Fixes a door on the Kataphract vessel named incorrectly and fixes a wall in the way of re-fueling the vessel.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Custom borg sprites can now be selected again.

Sheeplets updated:

  • Removes the ability to perform surgery on stasis beds.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Cleans up the biosuits code and renames them to hazmat suits. Renames the level 3 biohazard closets to hazmat gear closets.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a large number of weapons to the antag uplink. Some are very strong, and very expensive!
  • Gave the energy sword enough armor penetration to do around half damage through heavy armor.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Guests no longer get warnings for multikeying (For testing purposes).

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed some messed up pipes in the scrapper ship.

Geeves updated:

  • The piece of the Dominia cape that renders between your legs now gets hidden by tails or other clothes.

  • Removed SCC Assistants and Representatives that were unintentionally added.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Added two alternative job titles for medical intern. One is for aspiring surgeons, one for Medics in the making.
  • To be more consistent, interns dont have specialized medical access anymore.

PoZe updated:

  • Majorily increased maximum power rating for most atmospherics devices. Refer to the pull request for exact numbers: https://github.com/Aurorastation/Aurora.3/pull/15229
  • Refactored atmospherics omni gas filters' and mixers' UI to be more like a gas pump. Added display of current power usage.

SilverSZ updated:

  • Allows Solarian IPC to take the Visegradi and San Colettish accents

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the maintenance turf initializer not respecting the is_open() proc.
  • Fixes abyss turfs not utilizing the is_open() proc.
  • Fixes abyss turfs not respecting lattices and its children, only catwalks.
  • Fixes rollerbed inhands being mirrored.
  • Fixes a table in the brig communal room.

  • Adds some Sol floor decals to the code.
  • Removes a leftover sign where cryo used to be on deck 3.

  • Added a Southern Solarian Military District third party ship. Also adds a Visegrad flag, and a Solarian military IPC uniform.
  • Fixes a problem with the TCFL ship roles not all being able to spawn at the same time.
  • Changed the shading slightly on a few Solarian uniforms.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Elevator doors are now see-through again.

04 December 2022

Connorjg1/Talion updated:

  • Vaurca warriors have undergone large balance tweaks. They are now more powerful across the board, having better laser resist, less bleeding and have had their mandible ability replaced with a mandible attack.

  • Fixes odd behavior with bags saving.
  • Bag strap adjusting works properly now.
  • You no longer can color bags that can't be colored.
  • Faction specific bags are now default.

  • Fixed a spelling mistake in Pineneedle Brand white wine.

GeneralCamo updated:

  • NanoTrasen Corporate Representatives aboard the SCCV Horizon are no longer required to have a mindshield implant. All existing implants have been complementarily removed during the last scheduled physical for all NanoTrasen Corporate Representatives.

  • Map reader will now properly mapload initialize /area atoms for away site areas.
  • Cables now correctly override their direction vars to match the set icon state, making mapped-in d1/d2 vars superfluous.

02 December 2022

Connorjg1/Talion updated:

  • Portable Fusion Generator incorrectly had Uranium listed as the fuel source. It is not Tritium as expected.

Omicega updated:

  • Fixes some mislabelled/misnamed stuff on the COC ranger ship and gives them minor inventory tweaks besides.

Peppermint updated:

  • Adds the correct window to the CoC armory.
  • Adds the correct ammo type (HE) to the CoC armory.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Makes the worn bunny slippers a child of the bunny slippers.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Worn bunny slippers are species unrestricted like the normal bunny slippers now.

01 December 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • Damage values of 7.62, 5.56 and midlasers have been all nerfed.
  • Security's ballistic and ablative armour have been heavily nerfed. They now only block around 5 more damage, instead of blocking over half.
  • Combat stims' chems have been compacted into one new chem, Kilosemine, with increased metabolisation rate (0.6u/tick) and without the effects of Oxycomorphine. Combat hyposprays start with ten units, which can be spread out across two injections.
  • Personal shields no longer recharge on their own. They have a cell, which can be recharged and cannot be manually replaced. Passive upkeep is 2 charge every 2 seconds or so, whereas blocking a bullet is 200 charge per shot. Their size has been reduced to normal, so they can fit in backpacks.
  • Shuttle walls are now reinforced.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the Spark dock being pressurized. Replaces the dock airlocks with regular doors.

atteria updated:

  • Added enlisted and officer uniforms for the Dominian fleet.

30 November 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • The Tajaran smuggler ship now has working atmos and power.
  • The Tajaran smuggler ship can now eject its cargo hold.

Nope63 updated:

  • Added an alt version for the Zavodskoi warden coat and hat, as well as the ability to select them from the loadout.
  • Removed the parent version of the warden hat, which was mistakenly labelled as the Zavod warden hat.

29 November 2022

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the Longbow's barrel not being mapped in appropiately.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • SSD no longer immediately puts you to sleep - only after 5 minutes will your character drop on the ground. Also, adds an overlay to indicate when someone's SSD.

28 November 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed some mapping issues in some Tajaran ships.
  • The scrapper and the mining jack ghost roles now spawn inside the ship.
  • Added some food to the mining jack base.

Spud2 updated:

  • Adds "*Missing*" as a possible physical status in medical records.

27 November 2022

GeneralCamo updated:

  • Changed the in-game Sol Alliance flag to reflect the flag in canon.
  • Purged all references to "SolGov", as this is now considered a non-canon remnant from Baystation.
  • Updated the descriptions for Sol Alliance citizenship, and Hephaestus Industries membership.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Removes manually mapped names on intercoms. Implements coded-in intercom subtypes where applicable.
  • Relocates the Longbow to near the deck 3 port docks.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Fixes following shipbounds from the crew manifest as a ghost.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • Five new ammo types for the unathi bruiser cannon ship weapon-the Izharshan freighter gets one cheap HE shell in the safe, and advanced versions of existing ammo types alongside AP are admin spawnable..
  • Ship ammo can now be made different weights that can be carried with difficulty by larger or smaller species.
  • The bruiser now shoots 178mm shells that require you to be larger than a human to carry by hand, and even then require more effort.

25 November 2022

CinnySuccubus updated:

  • Removes minimum temperature limit (50K) from Xion frames, making them immune to the cold and allowing them to mine on ice planets and other environments below this limit.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Added four new rifle reload sounds.
  • Removed one subpar rifle reload sound.
  • Updated the sprites for the stunrevolver and the speedloaders.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Adds new Dionae-themed airlocks and table sprites

BLUNTFORCE420 updated:

  • Adds .45 SMG for Dominia.

FearTheBlackout updated:

  • Adds a CondiMaster and a bottle of space spice to the Bar.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Fixed the tajaran light brown fur scarf to be misaligned by two pixels.

Omicega updated:

  • Limits the big quake stompy jump version of the jump manoeuvre to very big species only, rather than just big ones.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Removes the unused investigator jacket.

Sophiemint updated:

  • Increases Grauwolf ammo for the FSF, SFA, Elyran Strike Craft, and CoC Rangers.
  • Added some extra flavour items for the CoC ranger captain's wardrobe.

23 November 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Added a new third party ship: the Orbital Fleet Database Freighter.

Anconfuzedrock, Kyres1, CneGecko updated:

  • Adds a new Izharshan Pirate ship to most badlands regions, alongside new pirate voidsuits.
  • Moves one of the deck 3 starboard docks more starboard so wider ships can dock with it.
  • Above ship includes the Bruiser cannon, a weak unathi ship weapon that rarely has decent ammo, but can be loaded by hand.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ship weapons can now be used on visitables that aren't ships.
  • Added (currently unused) functionality that lets ship weapon targeting manually choose a direction.

RustingWithYou updated:

  • Allows the floral somatoray to mutate specific genes

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds a static GPS to the Intrepid.
  • Turns the Unathi pirate voidsuits into contained sprites.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Added a box of sterile gloves to the autopsy room.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Adds more reinforced armour layers where it could be easily fit on the Kataphract ship.
  • The Kataphract armoury now includes their flags. These act as flamboyant yet effective spears.
  • The Kataphract armoury now includes Hegemony sluggers. These are crude and very heavy projectile weapons.
  • Adds a CIC to the Kataphract ship. It's a safer place to control the ship if it ends up being fired on. You can find it in the hallway that leads to the warehouse.
  • Adds a carbon dioxide holding tank to the Kataphract ship to eliminate any reliance on filling and removing cans from the fuel line. It's unlikely they will run out of fuel during a round.
  • The Kataphract medical room has an operating theater and some more medical supplies. This includes a nanomed.
  • The Kataphract Quartermaster role has been renamed to 'Kataphract Specialist'.
  • Some more props were added to the map. A few water fountains and punching bags among other things.
  • The Kataphract body armour had its ballistic protection increased. The voidsuit has had its ballistic and laser protection increased. It's on the level of the average merc voidsuit now.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • Away site hangars have more transit spots, so ships are more likely to be able to land in them.

22 November 2022

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the security cells' doors having no access requirements.
  • Fixes the security cells' blast doors and blast door buttons being labelled and wired incorrectly.
  • Adds a new burning sprite.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Added a colorable turban to the loadout.

WickedCybs, MattAtlas updated:

  • Adds a minature fusion reactor. These are similar to portable generators in functionality but scaled up to provide consistent power for the ships you see running around on the overmap. They also have an additional mechanic that involves adding coolant.
  • Generators have some really high power values that had to be scaled down. It's still too high probably but further adjustments need some planning.

21 November 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Added a new third party ship and away site: the Tajaran Mining Jack.

BLUNTFORCE420 updated:

  • Adds Dominian assault rifle for eventual Dominia ship PR. Reskinned 762 assault rifle in line with other factional offerings.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Grauwolf and Francisca projectiles now actually use their icon on the overmap.

20 November 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the stargaze not displaying the badlands icon.
  • The temperature and air alarms on the Tajaran ships now have more reasonable values.

19 November 2022

Omicega updated:

  • The calf suspension augment now allows you to jump a little further (via the manoeuvre system) in addition to providing slight protection against fall damage.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes a missing APC wire.
  • Fixes pilot's room object placement.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Re-adds the missing docking controllers to the deck one pilot prep room.

18 November 2022

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Ghosts can now follow crew on the crew manifest.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ops technicians now really, actually have access to ammunition storage.
  • Fixed the Nanotrasen IPC origin having accents it shouldn't, and not having the TTS accent.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Removes a duplicate requests console in medical.
  • Adds a navigation console to the bridge.
  • Adds suit coolers to the atmos technician suit storages.
  • Moves the heavy flashlight in engineering's locker room to the Engineer locker.
  • Fixes the RFD being unable to construct nor deconstruct full windows and their frames.
  • Renames the "desc_fluff" variable on objects to "desc_extended" to better reflect its intended purpose.
  • Merges "desc_cult" with "desc_antag". Removes the "desc_cult" variable.
  • Adds handrails to all the washroom stalls.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Added the ability to buckle patients to operating tables. Click and drag as normal to buckle, click on the table on any intent other than help to unbuckle.
  • Added a handrail to the operating theatres, so surgeons can stay upright during maneuvers.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Adds a small biogenerator to the public garden.
  • Tweaks the second deck security checkpoint by removing the extra paper bin and pencil and the white hard hats.

17 November 2022

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes missing master wire on deck 1.
  • Removes unused power cables and atmospherics piping on deck 1.
  • Fixes the operations hangar being unrestricted access wise.
  • Doubles the lift and cryogenics room's capacity.
  • Adds a contraband locker and evidence storage locker to the code.
  • Tweaks the armoury layout. Maps in the contraband locker and the evidence storage lockers.
  • Adds polish and details to security, such as decals and layout changes.
  • Fixes the security incident paper mentioning NanoTrasen as well as security in general and not mentioning the SCC or the SCCV Horizon.

16 November 2022

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Moves the residential lifts to deck 1 next to the main elevator.
  • Adds a residential deck stairwell to the central stairwell on deck 1.
  • Moves the auxiliary custodial closet to where the residential lifts used to be on deck 2.
  • Moves the machinist workshop to deck 2, where the mech bay- and recharging station used to be.
  • Moves the mech bay- and recharging station, teleporter, and tech storage to deck 1 where the machinist workshop used to be.
  • Moves the secure ammunition storage to the other side of where it lies currently to reduce risk of collateral damage.
  • Fixes the SM cooling slower than it should.

15 November 2022

Alberyk, Coalf updated:

  • Added Tajaran leader portraits to the Tajaran custom loadout.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Bridge crew no longer have access to the flak cannon or to ammunition storage.
  • Leviathan powerup is now a global effect.
  • Lowered the sound of most guns.
  • Ammunition loaders no longer instantly explode and die when hit.
  • Fixes ship weapons not being anchored.
  • Fixes projectiles not deleting when they reach the Overmap edge area. They now wrap around and delete after a certain amount of steps (30 for leviathan shots, 10 for normal shots).
  • Finished longbow shells will now have the impact type in the name.
  • Leviathan projectiles have been sped up.
  • Targeted overmap objects are now detargeted if they go past the 7 tile range.

14 November 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Added a Tajaran Scrapper third party ship.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added more ammunition for the Francisca to the Horizon, for a total of 12 boxes.

Omicega updated:

  • Adds antifuel reagent (for cleaning liquid fuel exclusively) + associated chemical grenades to engineering.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Tweaks the deck 2 port stairwell.
  • Fixes the journalist office not having a power wire.
  • Gives the machinist access to operations.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Made a number of minor fixes to various third party ships. Most notably, their rotary guns should no longer fall off.

13 November 2022

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Fixes mining overalls broken roles restrictions.

Ramke updated:

  • Mobs listening intently will receive hearing damage from loud ship firing sounds.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes bags' strap masks.
  • Fixes parts of rucksacks becoming invisible if the strap wasn't set to thick.
  • Gives the First Responder access to the disposals room and its computer.
  • Maps in a proper disposals pit.
  • Makes the SM reactor waste management room more compact.
  • Adds a maintenance tunnel beneath the custodial closet.
  • Tweaks maintenance behind the machinist workshop.
  • Tweaks the layout of the machinist workshop.
  • Makes the area below the machinist workshop a public area and a staging area for the Intrepid.
  • Gives the custodian and first responder access to the mail room.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • All roles should now use the correct security HUD icon.
  • Security HUDs now read IDs in the same manner as airlocks.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Survivability of military third party ships has been improved. They now have backup controls, portable air pumps, backup weapons, and more.
  • Third party ships have a more consistent naming scheme.
  • Certain third party ships can now spawn in the Badlands.
  • The militia ship, freighter, and Skrell smugglers now have randomized guns in lieu of pre-selected weapons, for greater variety. Skrell and OX ships now have armor that they were missing.

12 November 2022

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Minor styling fix/tweak of the loadout search bar and buttons.
  • Adds a per-uplink item limit mechanism.
  • One free medkit can be claimed from an uplink.
  • Personal shield can only be bought once from an uplink.

Evandorf updated:

  • Very minor changes to fluff item mechanics. Can now remove spearhead from stand without needing to pick up the stand first.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Non-asteroid exoplanets now correctly have a chance to have ambient lighting.
  • Exoplanet theming (rock coloration, etc.) now correctly applies to all exoplanet turfs.

Loaf (Original Code), MattAtlas (Porting) updated:

  • Added a maneuver system. Access your available maneuvers by using the Prepare To Maneuver verb in the IC tab. Control click a tile on grab intent to activate the selected maneuver.
  • Added a leap maneuver for humans. You can use this to jump across open spaces or other items. Baseline humans can jump 2 tiles out. More agile species can jump 3 tiles.
  • Jumping onto a mob from above or while it's laying down as an industrial IPC, bulwark or breeder does quite a lot of damage.

Omicega updated:

  • Removes the AI job from traitor role eligibility.
  • Properly sets lifeform stasis units to be anchored.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds a proper psychiatric supplies locker to the psychiatric office.
  • Fixes the stargazer being unanchored and non-dense.
  • Fixes some mapping oversights on deck 3.
  • Moves some stuff in the HTML folder to a more appropiate folder.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a Coalition Ranger third party ship.

11 November 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Added lava exoplanets.
  • Added a PRA third party ship: the Headmaster. It should appear in the Badlands and Tajaran systems.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Search box in the loadout. Looks up loadout item names, and also names of sub-items in the selection.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Being thrown into airlocks, machines, windows will now hurt a lot.
  • Mobs can now be thrown over railings!

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Remaps port deck 3.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • There are now pure bicaridine, kelotane, and peridaxon autoinjectors, as well as hyronalin bottles, as adminspawn items.

10 November 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • Decreased the amount of damage ship guns take to compensate for explosions hitting them more than once.
  • Ship projectiles now properly hit their targets if they're on the same tile.
  • Ship projectiles should feel a lot faster to start up and less clunky.

Omicega updated:

  • Adds a service gantry going underneath the Leviathan to make EVA on the Horizon's hull a bit easier.
  • Adds a specific Leviathan access code for ID accesses to use.

PoZe updated:

  • Fixed robotic storage unit turning invisible when occupied.
  • Added broken state sprites for full steel and plasteel tiles.
  • Research Cyborg's scientific gripper can now interact with seeds and grown products. Added robot auto-harvester tool for collecting grown things.
  • Mining drone now has access to service channels.

Ramke updated:

  • Removes a few white pixels from Nasira's custom item.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes being unable to put reinforced glass in airlocks.
  • Fixes some parapen issues.

09 November 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • Overmap projectiles are now much faster, as they were meant to be.
  • Ship projectiles now actually hit things when shot diagonally.
  • Added useful ship combat information for deadchat when bullets enter a zlevel.
  • Ghosts can now jump to the Overmap by using the Teleport verb and going to System Map.
  • Added missing admin logs.
  • Added notifications for people inside a ship when ship projectiles miss it.

Sheeplets updated:

  • Made various mapping tweaks to the Medical Bay. Allows Rescue Hardsuits to hold blood bags in their suit storage. Nerfs the stasis factor on lifeform stasis units. 10X, down from 15X.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • The Elyran strike craft, FSF and SFA corvettes, and TCFL corvette now all have grauwolf flak batteries. The militia ship has a 40mm rotary cannon. The civilian station has a large amount of ammunition to sell.
  • Some third party ships and away sites have had their small arms to be more substantial. The civilian station now has an autolathe.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Organizes all the away site and ship files. They each have their own folders. The generic folder was renamed to awaysite.
  • Seperates the wildcard and corporate ship file as it was being shared by the tramp freighter + milita and the ox ship and ee ship respectively.

Alberyk updated:

  • The Tajaran divination cards are now more lore accurate.

Kyres1 updated:

  • Added a badlands stargazer system icon.

Omicega updated:

  • Tweaked/added various things to engineering. Fixed lowercase area names, added some fire closets, an extra voidsuit, some more lockers to the equipment room, and some other QOL mapping stuff.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the Idris and Zavodskoi security sleeve patches being esoterically role restricted.
  • Removes the depreciated crystal therapy pod and its console from the codebase.
  • Adds a hip variant of the custodial holster. Removes superfluous items from the custodians' lockers. Removes superfluous items from the custodial cart.
  • Turns the utility holsters into a contained sprite.
  • Adds a camera to the secure ammo storage. Fixes the flak weapon APC wire location.

07 November 2022

FearTheBlackout updated:

  • Idris Librarians using their respective alt titles will now receive the correct items again.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The Francisca is now actually a gatling gun as it was meant to be. When fired, it spawns eight extra projectiles.
  • Francisca normal ammo now has 1 more penetration so that it actually gets through hulls.
  • Maneuvers now work correctly. Do note that the left/right distinction is relative to ship direction ONLY for combat rolls, whereas it is absolute for combat turning (imagine a compass).
  • Physical ship ammunition projectiles now have hit sound effects.
  • Ship weapon projectiles no longer miss when they enter a ship. Get down if you want to dodge them!

06 November 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the abyss icon.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Used items in the loadout always appear at the top of the list.

FearTheBlackout updated:

  • Added a Venusian flagpatch to the accessory loadout.
  • Added the sprites for the Venusian flagpatch.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes the Zavodskoi security coat selection.
  • Ops techs now have access to the Intrepid armament area and the ammunitions storage.
  • Ship weapons can now actually hit overmap hazards.
  • Ship weapons can no longer fire if the ship is not on the overmap.
  • You can no longer target overmap objects if you're not on the overmap.
  • Entry point landmarks now properly move with shuttles.
  • Fixed the Leviathan activation terminal. You can no longer interact with it before unlocking the safeties.
  • Fixed some chat messages.
  • Entry point lists are now sorted.

05 November 2022

MattAtlas (Code), Kyres1 (Sprites, Mapping) updated:

  • Added a ship to ship combat system! The basic functioning is that each ship has at least four entry points that can be targeted. Projectiles enter these entrypoints based on the heading of the ship that fired them. Ex: if you are facing the starboard of a ship, and you fire to hit the aft, you will miss.
  • The Horizon now has its own guns! They were fitted in the last few port calls. The Leviathan (accessible by Engineering & Command) is on the port ballast on Deck 2. The Grauwolf, a flak cannon, is fore of Operations. The Longbow, a 406mm artillery gun, is port of the Bridge. The Intrepid has been fitted with a 40mm rotary gun, the Francisca.
  • To target an overmap object with a gun, go to a targeting console (found on the Bridge for the Horizon), open the targeting grid and then click an overmap object that you can see. You will then lock onto it.
  • To load ammunition into a gun, load the respective shell or bundle or whatever you might need into the ammunition loader next to the gun.
  • The Leviathan has a fairly complex activation sequence! All details can be found in the envelope found in its holding bay.
  • Certain guns, like the Grauwolf, can be used to destroy some overmap hazards.
  • When targeting multi-z maps like the Horizon, you are able to select a z-level to filter the entry points.
  • Ship ammunition can be very heavy. If it is, it can only be lifted by G2s/G1s/Vaurca Breeders/Bulwarks, by a human in a rig or by a mech clamp. Ripleys spawn in the Longbow, Francisca and Grauwolf's compartments.
  • The helm console has four new buttons under the Maneuvers section. The two that look like turning arrows will perform an emergency combat dodge which moves the ship by one tile to the left or right, a fairly dangerous maneuver that throws everyone on the ship around, unless buckled. The second set that looks like arrows with a line at the end will instead turn the ship 45 degrees to the left or right, useful for turning to face enemy ships to shoot them. This is markedly less dangerous and only puts unbuckled people on the floor. It's also not as loud.
  • The Mining Shuttle has officially been given the name of SCCV Spark.
  • You can no longer see overmap objects through darkness.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Shuttles won't look like they're jumping into bluespace anymore, as they were not anyway. It will look like they're actually flying through space.

03 November 2022

Butterrobber202 updated:

  • Cultists now have a station-wide language to communicate with.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Fixes loadout culture and origin check always failing, making it so culture and origin restricted items were always grayed out.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Renames the "Begin bone repair" surgery to "Repair Broken Bone" and renames the "Mend closed bone" surgery to "Repair Sawed Bone" to better reflect their purposes.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The Security voidsuit's armour is now on par with Security's standard armour plate.

  • Fixes 6 faulty variables in the "orion_express_ship.dmm" file.

  • Adds an alternative bright yellow high visibility jacket from Shiptest. It has two pocket slots. Available in the loadout under the jacket selection.

MattAtlas updated:

  • When you input a message to announce through the Command console, your character now speaks the message, which gets recorded and then replayed as the announcement. This means that auto-hiss will translate over to your announcements!
  • Moved the requests console in the first responder bay.
  • The crew armoury carbines no longer spawn with full-fat 5.56.
  • Removed the Visitors gamemode.

Omicega updated:

  • Reinforced windows now drop more materials when broken.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Updates the status tab date to follow ISO 8601.
  • Adds some missing tiles to the holodeck.
  • Renames "Syndicate Cyborg" to "Combat Robot" to better reflect its purpose.
  • Renames the adminspawn "Combat Robot" to "Military Robot".
  • Removes the on-death explosion from the combat robot.
  • Tweaks the mounted netgun from 1 to 2 shots. Reduces its recharge time slightly.
  • Tweaks the mounted submachinegun to do a bit more AP, so it is more usable against armoured opponents.
  • Removes the derelict.dm away site, i.e. the big, empty derelict.
  • Reverts the Idris cruise halloween map edits.
  • Puts the halloween costumes and props into a dedicated folder.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Four navigation consoles have been added throughout the ship, to allow people outside the bridge to know where the ship actually is.
  • The three .45s in the emergency armory have been replaced with six 10mm pistols.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The blackbox and the common server in telecomms had their positions swapped so people can repair the common server easier.
  • Extended the fore hallway area to the spot between the bar and kitchen. It used to all be considered a bar area, so those lights would start off and It'd all be enveloped in darkness.
  • The central primary hallway was considered a singular area all way from the entrance to operations to the giant room with the stargazer. The stargazer area in particular is now considered a different area, which will stress out the poor singular APC that's been powering it all far less, as it has its own APC now.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes bags spawning with the wrong strap type.
  • Fixes bags having invisible inhands.

  • Removes and replaces generic security coats with corporate ones. The new ones can be found in the Factions loadout tab under the coat selection.

29 September 2022

Omicega updated:

  • Readds the engineering + atmos clothing wardrobes from the Aurora map.

WickedCybs updated:

  • If venting happened, third parties wouldn't be able to use their emergency shutters to escape since it inherently has horizon engineering access required, which is ideally supposed to make it so non-engineers can't open the way into vented areas. Was rectified by adding a variant that needs no access to open. Every window and door has the proper type of emergency shutter now.
  • Defined more areas for the kataphract ship since a lot of what was mapped in was pulling double duty for extra rooms. This would lead to some buggy and confusing interactions, especially for those far apart.
  • Lights in the kataship hangar were swapped for spotlights, as intended. Still looks the same, it just shines brighter.
  • Some of the air alarms still had engineering access requirements, which was hopefully fixed on a second pass and changed to kata id stuff instead.
  • Removed the unused kata trader and quartermaster access types.
  • The kata ship docking airlock will actually start bolted now.
  • the kata ship airlock pumps will both cycle now instead of just one working.
  • There were catwalks visible on the solars of the kataship when you look at the map using dream maker or strongdmm. These didn't spawn in the game itself as they weren't the interior type. Removed those from the map file.
  • Moved the position of the kata shuttle's docking port controller, since it was positioned in a way that it would overlay over anything put on the table it was originally on.
  • Added the missing air alarms and other minor atmos equipment where it was missing on the kataphract ship, like the janitorial room or the brig.
  • Fixes blastdoor orientations on the kata ship bridge and transport shuttle.
  • Correctly tags and replaces the interior/exterior airlock buttons for the yacht so they should actually work now if anyone ever fixes that ship.
  • The yacht's airlock is being fed by an air canister as intended instead of an entire air pressure tank.

  • Fixes the research director lacking access to the robotics control console.

Also removes the boxing gloves for lore reasons. Finally those hopeful's without flash proof voidsuits now have glasses.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Plasma projectiles have been reworked. They now burn blood like lasers do and have lower damage, but have much much higher AP.
  • Most combat hardsuits now have armor values equal to the crimson hardsuit, which means that they're really good at blocking damage now. The hazard hardsuit has been buffed to be comparable to heavy armour instead.
  • Fixed binocular message spam.
  • Fixed being able to use your binoculars while looking down or up.

  • Moves the TEG power wire in the supermatter room so it doesn't cover an emergency cooling valve indicator.

Omicega, Granodd updated:

WickedCybs updated:

  • The power line to the Intrepid's SMES runs off of the main grid now, rather than a subgrid.

WickedCybs, Leudoberct updated:

  • Added a new third party, the Kataphract Chapter Ship. Representing the Hegemony's finest abroad, probably. They're out for adventure and to prove themselves. Trade for supplies for the long road ahead, quest, act with honour.
  • The emergency services dock isn't just limited to the ERT TCFL shuttle anymore. The OX ship, TCFL third party shuttle and Kataphract shuttle should be able to dock to it too now. It's also been futureproofed and can be used by most ships with a south facing airlock.
  • Added two SMES subtypes for mappers. One is turned on and has a capacitance coil for autostarted solars, the other is a little less beefy SMES for shuttles. Should be nice for mappers.
  • Had to make fuel ports by default spawn with nothing inside. A subtype with phoron already inside the hatch was made and should be replacing all the fuel ports as of now. This had to be done, as the way it was initalized, hydrogen ports would have 2 fuel tanks inside, one phoron one hydrogen.
  • Moved the hangar landmarks for the OX and TCFL ship as well as the docking landmark on the Horizon for south facing ports. It's placed below the airlocks in all cases to better accomodate ship design, as having it to the side was causing issues.

listerla updated:

  • Added a single pixel to the hijab sprite so that you can't see the floor through it.
  • All Himean items are now origin-locked.
  • Himean IPCs and Free Council Tajara may now access Himean-locked items.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Tweaks the layout of the crew armoury. Gives it some polish.
  • Puts some of the contents in the crew armoury into dedicated boxes.
  • Tweaks the kitchen's plastic bag box to hold 20 instead of 6 plastic bags.
  • Makes blobs unable to spawn unless engineering is active in the round.
  • Tweaks engineering and atmospherics to add QoL features and to polish the mapping.
  • Fixes missing "open spaces" on deck 3.
  • Tweaks unconsciousness so you are able to see 1.5 tiles around your character (including the tile they are on).
  • Adds a informative message when losing consciousness.
  • Removes paralysis from N2O as it was redundant.
  • Turns the halter top and flared pants into contained sprites.
  • Reworks and cleans up the ambience code. Seperates the ambience and ambient hum and makes the ambient hum its own SFX toggle.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Due to some confusion around the existence of an SCC Shipyard, the Horizon dock location has been renamed to the much more bureaucratic and unimportant SCC Sector Liaison Post.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Makes an evidence bag variant called 'resealable plastic bag' and adds some to the kitchen and loadout. Now you too, can store your sandwich properly.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Reverts the operations uniform changes so they are more consistent with the other uniforms.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • Gives Unathi four more busted horn styles- short horns, draconic horns, styra horn, and short frills.

kermit updated:

  • Cerulean slimes have been re-added and are used to create Extract Enhancer - all in line with the wiki.
  • Sepia slimes have been re-added. They are not used to create cameras anymore as the wiki suggests. They instead can be used to open wood/cardboard material portals (with water) or leather/hide material portals (with blood) - for use resupplying departments or creating fancier golems.
  • Pyrite slimes have been re-added. They are not used to create paint/crayons anymore as the wiki suggests. They instead can be used to transmute various chemicals into stronger variants, some examples include: dexalin -> dexalin plus; radium -> unstable mutagen, EZ nutrient -> diethylamine.
  • Docility Potions have been renamed to Docility Serums. The Advanced Docility Potion is now also a lighter pink, complimenting the slime it's acquired from.
  • Some extract abilities have been added to various slimes to compliment their pre-existing abilities: Green Slimes (silver & carbon -> bluespace crystal), Red (sugar -> glycerol; phoron -> nightshade), Pink (water -> paxazide), Oil (water -> plastic/glass material portal).
  • Gelds the slime glomp attack - them pouncing and latching onto prey is already strong enough, especially considering 'friends' of slimes may still, on occasion, be glomped by RNG.
  • Some extract abilities don't just require 1u of a chemical to activate, some now have a larger 'chemical cost' - mostly reserved for the more powerful abilities.
  • Slime jelly no longer nukes the liver with 100-300 toxins out of nowhere. Instead, it deals genetic damage over time, just like slimes actually do.
  • Now that Slime jelly's healing properties can be used safely, it now treats both brute and burn damage to the same degree as butazoline and dermaline. It also reoxygenates blood.

listerla updated:

  • Added flared pants and halter tops to loadout, ported from Polaris.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added IFF beacons to all ships. You can interact with them through the sensors console. Turning them off will obfuscate the ship's name on sensors. Additionally, some ships are capable of changing the class or name. You can also cut the wire on an IFF beacon to disable it.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Adds new skrell cape (cosmic cape; alternative to star/nova/nebula/galaxy capes already in game).
  • Adds a skrell star coat.

FayeLovesU updated:

  • Added a second rescue RIG to the first responder's quarters.

Forester40 updated:

  • Utility belts can now hold rolls of duct tape.
  • Uility belts ordered from Operations no longer spawn with hand drills in them and therefore no longer spawn with one more item than they actually have storage slots for.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Health analyzers can now correctly read values with decimals instead of reporting 0bpm.
  • Control clicking a decal on the floor with a floor painter in hand now copies that colour.
  • Shift clicking a decal on the floor with a floor painter in hand now deletes that decal.
  • Added light corners to the floor painter. These are the corners used in Engineering, for example. Remember to try alternate directions (such as southeast) if a line of the tile is still visible!
  • Moved the status display in Security that was in front of one of the lockers to somewhere else in the same room.

Roostercat12 updated:

  • Added Grape Jelly and its respective condiment bottles. Obtainable by blending grapes.
  • Added Condiment bottle sprites for: Ambrosia/Wulu Extract, Psilocybin, Pumpkin Pulp, Pumpkin Spice, Cocoa Powder, Batter, Egg Yolk, Triglyceride

SimpleMaroon updated:

  • Gives the Research Robot module access to Operations radio so they can communicate with Machinists.
  • Gives the Research Robot module 15 steel sheets to build tech processors and other machines.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the typo "Nanotrasen" to NanoTrasen.
  • Tweaks the psychiatrist wing a bit, making it more roomy and cozy. Tweaks and polishes medical slightly.

The Stryker, NewOriginalSchwann updated:

  • Adds a Callisto accent, available for any species/origin that could take the Jovian accent.
  • Tweaks the Jovian accent description.

05 August 2022

TheBurninSherman updated:

  • Added a new human short ponytail hairstyle. Sprite originally made by Kyres1 and edited by TheBurninSherman.

02 August 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Vaurca Bulwark attacks now have the shred variable, allowing them to destroy windows and other actions similar to a Industrial IPC.

Doc updated:

  • Changed the position of the deck 3 nature garden, replacing the unused janitorial nature display room.

Lohikar, CrimsonShrike, MattAtlas updated:

  • Ported some Z-Mimic changes/improvements/bugfixes from Nebula/Bay.

MattAtlas, Kyres1 updated:

  • Announcements now only show up to the affected Z-levels.
  • Barricades have been ported from CM-SS13! You can build steel, wood and plasteel barricades through the respective material build menus. Plasteel barricades can be flipped to allow entry. Additionally, you can link one or more plasteel barricades together with a crowbar to make them flip open at the same time.
  • Added barbed wire as a stack item, made from steel. You can use it to wire barricades, preventing climbing. Barbed barricades also deal damage to simple mobs or human mobs that try to slice barricades open with their hands, such as zombies.
  • Added liquidbag barricades. They're bags filled with non-Newtonian liquid! You can find them in the crew armoury and the normal armoury, along with barbed wire to set on them. These can be set down by everyone. Use crowbars to disassemble these.
  • Added liquidbags and steel to merc and raider shuttles respectively.
  • Added a 25 liquidbag option to the Devices and Tools section of the uplink for 3 TC.
  • Note that the PEAC works *extremely well* on barricades! If you want a barricade buster, use the PEAC!
  • The PEAC no longer destroys floors.
  • Removed the Call ERT option from the keycard authenticators.
  • Calling a distress beacon now prompts the first person to swipe for a message. This message will then pop up as a distress beacon to all other Overmap ships.
  • Added a distress beacon button to the cockpit of every offmap ship. It only requires one person to press it, but otherwise works just like the keycard authentication option.
  • The PEAC has been moved to the standard Security armoury.
  • Bullets now ping off of walls, structures and machinery! Try it out. It's a cool effect. Ported from CM-SS13.
  • Added the Jingya A-1, a Nanotrasen burst rifle with a single shot mode and two-shot burst mode. It fires 5.56 rounds in carbine magazines. It is also available in the uplinks for 8 telecrystals. Sprites by Kyres1!
  • Added the Noctiluca XM28, a Zavodskoi combat laser rifle that can switch between a normal firing mode (slightly less damage than the laser rifle, better armor piercing) and an armor piercing mode (much less damage, but extremely high armor piercing). It is available in the uplink for 8 telecrystals. Sprites by Kyres1!
  • The crew armory has received a massive buff and now contains two Noctilucas, four ballistic carbines and three .45 pistols. It also contains more useful items in general.
  • The crew armory's weapon lockers now require either Bridge access or Armory access to open, instead of requiring only armory access.

Niennab updated:

  • Adds Koyanger gomusin shoes, a blue and white female hanbok, a colourable belt to go overtop male colourable hanbok and colourable wooden sandals.
  • Tweaked the pink-white and magenta-blue female hanbok sprite as well as making them contained sprites.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Cleans up the signs, flags, and decals code- and sprites. Seperates them into their own DMI's. Removes unused sprites. Moves some sprites to a more fitting directory.
  • Adds a new vacuum danger sign.

listerla updated:

  • Fixed religious items not showing up in character setup.

01 August 2022

Canon35 updated:

  • Replaced Vysokan accent icon with up to date version.

WhatsUpBrotendo updated:

  • Adds rolled sleeve sprites to the Jargon work uniforms.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Removes superfluous taste description from batter.

31 July 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Ruins should no longer generate on top of each other.
  • Starlight generation is now handled in SSlighting, so temporary space tiles are not calculated.
  • Fixed an issue where exoplanets were creating 2x as many necessary space tiles during generation.
  • Moved SSxenoarch init above SSlobby.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Nerfed the improvised (powered) crossbow in damage. It does not pin you to walls anymore either.
  • Adds 2 Pneumalin autoinhalers to the Intrepid's, the mining shuttle's and the Medbay's stabilization locker.

KingOfThePing, TheLancer updated:

  • Added two new, animated kitchen signs. Paradise Sands from Silversun and City Alive from Eridani I.
  • Tweaked one bar sign description to align with recent Eridani lore changes.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes some oversights in the auxiliary custodial closet.

  • Added skyboxes sprited by Kyres1.
  • Parallax settings have been removed.

  • Fixes unsimulated steel walls not smoothing with simulated steel window frames.

  • Overeasy egg taste description are no longer subject to developer preference.

  • Adds a new asteroid structure.

Doc updated:

  • Added a new garden area attached to the third deck cafe, featuring Patience.
  • Moved Stargazer to the central ring.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Lower the max mob size that can be crushed by airlocks. Now crusher, ian, chauncey, or columbo, no longer get crushed.

FlamingLily updated:

  • Added a crate contents scanner, used to quickly and easily generate a paper showing the contents of any scanned (unlocked) crate.
  • Shifted the table in the warehouse over slightly, and made it bigger.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Tweaks the message victims of stealth vampire feeding get, to allow the vampire more freedom in how to frame it.

Omicega updated:

  • Adds the Jovian accent to an overlooked IPC origin.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Minor changes to the Sol equipment locker at the mercenary base.
  • The nuclear bomb no longer spawns on the mercenary shuttle. It now spawns in the base itself.
  • Mercenaries no longer get 3 maxcap TTVs for free.

WhatsUpBrotendo updated:

  • Added Tattuqig accent as an option for Traverse Skrell.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new hardhat, firesuit and firesuit helmet sprites. Ported and modified from /tg/ and Bee.
  • Red firefighting helmets have been superceded by the Atmos firesuit helmets.
  • Golems no longer can wear firesuits. They literally can't wear anything else anyway.
  • Zavodskoi and Hephaestus Engineers now spawn with hardhats which match their uniforms.
  • New green hardhat! Enjoy Hephaestus green! All other hardhats tweaked to match uniforms!
  • Resprites EMT helmet.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Modifies the dionae right hand to look more attached to the body.

listerla updated:

  • Dominian Dionae can now access Dominian items.
  • Excavation pick sets are now available in the protolathe.
  • Removed suspension field ID lock.
  • Removed suspension field options with no functions.
  • Added sounds to some xenoarcheology equipment.
  • Ported new sprites for xenoarcheology equipment and finds, from Polaris and Baystation.

  • Vaurca Bulwarks can now be scientists/lab assistants, intention being for them to be xenoarchaeologists. They can also be reporters.
  • Vaurca Breeders can no longer be scientists.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes duffel bag icons. Again.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a civilian station away site. It's part gas station, part strip mall, part motel!
  • Added a local militia third party ship. They're neutral towards Biesel and the SCC, and mostly focus on protecting their region of space from pirates. They can also double as mercenaries.
  • Fixed a few oversights on the civilian station. First being that it had no overmap site, second being it had no holopads, and lastly a number of missing items, from clothing to first aid to ammo.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes the IAC hazard vest not having a sprite.
  • Shuttle walls can now properly be interacted with, just like normal walls. This means you can break them with weapons, put APC frames on them, etc.
  • Material cut delays now work properly. Since the shuttle walls can now be cut open through welding, there is an extra 20 second delay to it for them.
  • Fixes girder attack animation.
