01 July 2022

FlamingLily updated:

  • Fixed missing sprites on versebooks.
  • Replaced the trinary bible sprite with one of the trinary logo.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Optimized character setup mob previews; removed a source of server-crushing lag in the process.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a number of Solarian warlord variants of the normal Sol voidsuit, spawning in the FSF ship, worn by the FSF ERT, or through modkits that spawn in the sol gear crates.
  • Reworded the Vulture voidsuit's description slightly.
  • The Orion Express shuttle has been remade into a mobile refueling station. It's a lot like a gas station. Credits to Robotic Potato for the map.

30 June 2022

MattAtlas, TheDocOct updated:

  • You can now link PDAs to holopads by clicking them with it. Doing so will make the PDA ring when that holopad is called, with information on who is calling and where.
  • Fixed the stargazer not having a sprite for the CRZ. Credit to TheDocOct for the new sprite!

29 June 2022

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a new reagent called Sanasomnum to the uplink for 2 TCs, which induces a regenerative paralysis that can heal almost any type of damage, including bone breaks, brain damage, arterial bleeding, and organ damage, at the cost of roughly four minutes of being unable to move.
  • Added a new type of 5.56 bullet, 5.56 polymer.
  • Added a bullpup carbine, two 9mm machine pistols, and two boxes of buckshot to the sec armory.
  • Added the ballistic carbine and ammo to the uplink, the L6 LMG and ammo to the uplink, and the energy pistol.
  • Changed telecrystals counts across the board - most antags with access to the uplink will have 20 TCs now. Mercs still have 15 TCs, with their own unique uplink.
  • Raiders now have uplinks, with 3 TCs each.
  • Minigun TC cost increased to 40 TC.
  • New type of ballistic rifle added, the bullpup carbine. Mechanically identical to the ballistic carbine, more SCC-friendly flavor.
  • Cult robes have more ballistic armor and less laser armor.
  • Buckshot has been made from 6 x 14 pellets of damage to 3 x 25 pellets of damage. Frag grenade shrapnel does 5 more damage per shrapnel.
  • Random gun cost increased, to make it more of a challenge option as opposed to a guaranteed win option.
  • Rezadone is now blacklisted from spawning in cargo crates.
  • Fixed a bug where the horror form would die at 2/3rds health.
  • Gear crates are now available for all antagonists, and burglars are no longer locked out of a number of uplink categories.
  • Burglars no longer spawn with ballistic armor.

FlamingLily updated:

  • Added a versebook for the Trinary Perfecton. Did not alter the chaplain's version of the trinary versebook.
  • Added a sprite for the versebook.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds a new welding effect. Try welding something!

28 June 2022

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Puts the glove boxes from the OR walls where they belong.
  • Makes gloves fingertip's snippable again. All gloves this time.
  • Fixes the xeno nitrile glove amounts in the boxes to actually have a value.

26 June 2022

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Fixes the Vaurca kidney icon_state missing.
  • Fixes the black and executive suit to actually have their respective sprite.
  • Removed the weird off-center from the teapot.
  • Made the Gear Selection in the Uplink return, in a lazy way.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Sensors can now actually be repaired with a welder.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Reverts nitrile boxes so they work like normal boxes again. You can still find corresponding xenowear gloves in each box.
  • You can snip gloves much more liberally now, so long as the item you use is sharp.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Fixes the airlocks being multi-tile airlocks on the Wrecked NT Ship awaymap.
  • Removes a combat ripley from the Wrecked NT Ship awaymap.

25 June 2022

FlamingLily updated:

  • Added a space cleaner refiller tank to the janitor's closet.
  • Added a sprite for the aforementioned space cleaner refiller.
  • Moved the air alarm in the janitor's closet slightly.
  • Changed the name and description of the janitor's backpack water tank to reflect the fact that it spawns with space cleaner, not water.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds the impoverished economic status as an option in the SQL database, so it can save properly.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Painkillers in pill form should last far longer than it did before now. It won't be as long as injecting it, but it should be at least triple the amount of time it used to when ingested.
  • Meteors and ship debris have been removed from the random event rotation the Horizon experiences.

23 June 2022

Connorjg1 updated:

  • Changed Vaurca Projector frequency to prevent multiple minute long gaps where it won't project anything.
  • Fixed some missing fullstops in the Vaurca Projector and adjusted some grammar.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Accents now appear properly during hallucinated messages.
  • Removed an invalid emote from a pain hallucination.
  • Hallucinated announcements can now only come from people actually on station.
  • Tweaked some text in hallucinated messages to better fit the current setting.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Falling objects now have armor penetration, depending on damage dealt plus their own armor penetration.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Adds a wrecked NT ship awaysite.

21 June 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • IPCs now stutter when below half health.

Wickedcybs updated:

  • Fixed the punk shave bun alt hairstyle and the Chelsea hairstyles not saving by shorterning their names a bit. The Chelsea hairstyles lost the 'fringe' bit of their names and the punk shaved alt hairstyles lost the parentheses around 'alt'.

20 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Miners can now use their vender coin to purchase a mining drone.
  • Mining drones can now use their gripper to hold and apply their own upgrade circuits.

FlamingLily updated:

  • Removed some stray bushes from the theatre holodeck program.
  • Added cleaning gloves for Janitorial. They protect against chemicals, but not much else.
  • Added a sprite for the janitorial cleaning gloves.

Forester40 updated:

  • Fixed some typos in the Nanotrasen, Zavodskoi, Aemaq and Medina descriptions in the character setup screen.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Shield generators should no longer glitch out randomly and stop working.
  • Zombie attacks now have armor piercing.
  • The armor piercing Zombie martial art now actually has armor piercing. It does 5 to 10 damage, but pierces through all armor.
  • Zombies now only have 70 brain health and the brain is much easier to hit. If you're a survivor, aim for the head!
  • Zombie bite now has some armor piercing. Zombie claws are now far stronger for damage output, however, since they have more AP and damage.
  • Added useful information for zombies in their attack descriptions.
  • Martial arts and unarmed attacks can now have armor piercing. Martial arts effects depend on unarmed attack armor piercing.
  • Unarmed attack special effects (such as dropping people) now consider the actual damage dealt in the chance calculation.
  • The PEAC should no longer RNG miss.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Raiders start with sunglasses in their eye slot now.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Tweaks security uniform sprites, as well as their softcap and beret counterparts.
  • Security uniforms should show their corporate affiliation in their names now.
  • Collapses Faction loadout section, should be more compact now. Make sure to check your loadouts!

19 June 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix heat exchangers not radiating properly on open space turfs (as opposed to space turfs). This should stop the supermatter delaminating on nominally "safe" setups.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixes flashes not working correctly in many cases.

Stryker updated:

  • Adds a flagpatch selection and colorable flagpatches to the accessories tab.

18 June 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed flashlights in PDAs not creating lighting nor being installable as components once removed.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Added a lot (around 65) new gun related sounds. Including but not limited to: dry firing and reloading for all gun types, shotgun pumping, casings and shells hitting the ground, as well as some gun specific uniques.
  • Deleted a very sharp and old shotgun pumping sound that didn't fit in anywhere anymore.
  • Re-organized a lot of sound categories.
  • Re-organized the gun magazine code while I was at it.

Vrow updated:

  • Tweaked the IV drip tank indicator icon to use the percentage helper instead of the exact gauge updating, and some IV drip code clean up and oversight patching.
  • Fixed the IV drip not automatically retracting the installed mask if you stripped it from someone and then wearing it yourself.
  • Fixed the IV drip outputting a specific message even though the installed tank gets spilled everywhere when not secured.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Live surgery is more painful in general now. Light painkillers will not cut it if you want it to be safe for your patient. Assuming you want it to be safe, anyway

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Updates the faction selection screen.
  • Tweaks corporation logo images to be more consistent.
  • Faction restrictions now properly cross out jobs instead of not spawning them.
  • Updates the Orion Trail and Battler arcade UIs.

17 June 2022

Connorjg1/Talion updated:

  • Added a Vaurca-Projector for Hive Zo'ra. Works like the Skrell Projector except for a small slice of Vaurca VR.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Armblades and changeling shields now work again.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The security hazard jacket is now found in the security lockers, instead of spawning in the loadout.

The Stryker updated:

  • Tweaks the Zavodskoi IPC origin description because it contradicted the wiki.

16 June 2022

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Many pistols have had their sprites tweaked.
  • Ballistic and ablative helmets have been tweaked.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The Tajara Himean voidsuit kit will only spawn for those who pick the Free Council origin, now.

15 June 2022

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Added to the space bar: another light in the backroom, a long-range holopad, and a box of crayons to the bartender's locker.
  • Made the space bar hangar a separate area from the bar proper.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Audible emotes now show an accent.
  • Radio emotes now show an accent as well.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Suit items only cost 1 point now. Down from 2.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new letterman labcoats. The old Idris labcoat with the giant symbol has returned and falls under this category as well.
  • Re-adds classic vibrant Zeng-Hu labcoat and EPMC labcoat variations.
  • Improves IAC labcoat.

13 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Exosuit RFD now properly displays radial menu.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • There is now more time between the various hallucination effects, to give players time to properly react to them.

DreamySkrell updated:

  • Added a Skrell Hair Gradient - Headtail Middle.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Antennae from the IPC Xenowear loadout can now be locked with the Lock Antenna verb, thus making them unremovable.
  • You can now crawl while lying down simply by using WASD. You no longer crawl by clickdropping your sprite on turfs.

Melariara updated:

  • Fixed a bug that caused slimebags to not collect slime cores.

Vrow updated:

  • Organizes the smokables (cigarettes, cigars, rolled cigarettes, smoking pipes) sprites into a contained sprite, now contained in the smokables.dmi
  • Cleans some stray pixels from the North Facing smokables.
  • Fixed Unathi and Tajara cigarettes and cigars appearing in their mouth when they're actually in their ear slot.
  • Fixed the smokable sausage into a proper cigar/sausage instead of rolled/sausage, which caused the sprite to not appear correctly.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The Horizon now has a ton of new landmarks outside the ship for any sort of shuttlecraft to visit! If you've ever wanted to sneakily pilot the mining pod behind the ship or take a trip to the front of the kitchen and wave at the occupants, now you can! Third party players may enjoy more landing zones that aren't just the hangars as well.

12 June 2022

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Magboots should once more prevent you from being flung about during shuttle launches.
  • Magboots should now always function if there's solid ground beneath you, including at away sites, and newly built floors in space.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Gives scientists access to the Intrepid.
  • Fixes the xenobotanist not having access to the hazardous specimens air alarm.
  • Fixes the chaplain's shield diffusers leaving the bar exposed to meteors.
  • Fixes the SM colliding with the shields when ejected.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • The TCFL ship survey data has been refluffed.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes IAC uniforms.
  • Adds new hazard vest sprites.
  • Adds new corporate hazard vests.

11 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • New gear harnesses for Vaurca.
  • New vaurca undershirt sprite.
  • New vaurca blinders sprite.
  • New vaurca shoes sprite.
  • New colorable variant of Vaurcan shroud.

Connorjg1/Talion updated:

  • Vaurca Blaster Pistol is buffed to being a good blaster.
  • Vaurca merchant has new Vaurca items in the sale pool.
  • Vaurca merchant will now accept K'ois and Phoron in food form instead of just raw K'ois and K'ois bars.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Security voidsuits are now weaker to melee attacks, but have pistol-level protection against ballistics and lasers.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Removed an unattached scrubber in the living quarters lift area.
  • Added a missing pipe for the TCFL right thrusters.
  • Added a circuitboard for the ship engines control computer, so it can be rebuilt if needed.
  • Active magboots no longer stop you from entering open turfs if you're lying down, grabbed, or buckled to an object.
  • Ghost roles jobs will no longer show up as a blank space when entering cryo.
  • The cryogenic oversight announcer will only announce when people cryo if the cryopod is on the Horizon.
  • Replaces the supermatter on the overgrown mining station with a shard, so there won't be any false delamination announcements.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fall damage no longer dislocates joints that can't normally be dislocated.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Adds the K2557, a super heavy pistol, together with it's custom sounds. It is available in the antag Uplink for 4 TC.
  • Adds a new high damage calibre, .599 Kumar Super.

Omicega updated:

  • Removed playable species' slowdown at higher hunger and thirst levels.

Vrow updated:

  • Fixes Psychiatrists and Psychologists not having the department specific backpacks/satchels/duffel/messenger bags.
  • Fixes the Package Wrapper not properly wrapping boxes if it had enough space to get stored in. It now asks whether you want to wrap it or store it if the box has enough space to store it.
  • Fixes the Wrapping Paper (for Gifts) and the Package Wrapper not properly turning into cardboard tubes when used up completely
  • Fixes the above not updating their amount number when used
  • Fixes the Package Wrapper and Cardboard Tube in-hands not showing up properly

WickedCybs updated:

  • The emergency supplies closet by the primary tool storage has had a very small expansion, an additional airlock leading into the tool storage added and the camera within removed.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Slot machines now announce to the whole station if someone wins a jackpot.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • Operations managers now make more money (same as other heads) and bridge crew make less (same as miners and engineers).
  • Adds an impoverished option to the economic status tab, for when you want to be even poorer.

10 June 2022

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Away ships are no longer shuttle subtypes. The ships will spawn on the overmap, there is no need to 'launch to open space' first, and there will not be a 'faint ship activity' sector. Away ships still have their own shuttles.
  • Replaced the no longer needed shuttle control consoles with engine control consoles in away ship helms, if the ship did not have one in the helm.
  • Added a navpoint to all away ships at their external airlocks; if a shuttle can fit, it can dock right up against the ship!
  • Fixed the generic shuttle landing point for away ships not appearing as a valid destination, and renamed them to better describe the landing area.
  • Fixed bugs relating to airlocks disappearing or not functioning once one leaves the 'faint ship activity' area, since this no longer happens.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Headshots no longer stun with weapons that do equal to or over 40 damage.
  • Audible emotes now show accents.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Custodians can now put their tape roll inside their utility belt.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Improves IAC uniform sprites.

09 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Added a crayon augment to loadout.
  • New Integrated Crayon sprite.

Connorjg1 updated:

  • Removed mentions of NanoTrasen and station in Consular directives. Replaced them with the SCC and Horizon respectively.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Intellicarded AIs can no longer remote control the AI shell. When carded, they will be kicked out of the shell, if they are in it.
  • The CoolerMaster borg sprites no longer vibrate rapidly when facing east.
  • Offworlders are able to have human synthskin prosthetics, and can select them in character setup.
  • Borgs can now activate the emergency tesla beacon, if they are adjacent to it.
  • Deployed augment items (Combitools, lighters, and the like) can no longer be removed from their hand slot, placed or thrown on the ground, put in bags or pockets, etc.
  • Attached items (Augments, robot modules, exosuit equipment) will no longer embed in mobs if used to attack.
  • Attached items can no longer be removed via disarming. This applies to the above, as well as some special equipment, like changeling armblades.
  • The autolathe will (once again) no longer eat robot modules.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Rescue pods now work again. Instead of spawning on the ship, they spawn on an asteroid in the sector. Good luck surviving!
  • Drop pod doors can now be dismantled for metal. Survival.
  • Vampire grapple now works correctly and doesn't anchor you in place.
  • Removed lean from the game.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds custodial holographic tape.
  • Adds a custodial pestgun- and toy weapons only holster.
  • Adds a radial menu to the custodial truck for operating the mop and vacuum cleaner.
  • Adds sounds to the custodial truck.
  • Foam crossbows now fit on the belt slot and in holsters.

TheDanseMacabre updated:

  • The bee gun has been removed.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixed some sol uniforms being unable to have their sleeves rolled.
  • Fixes Zavodskoi cap and beret being unable to spawn.

stev/Memescope, Vrow updated:

  • Tweaks the PMCG Aviators, HUDsunglasses, and fat HUDsunglasses palette to be more consistent with the PMCG colors.
  • Fixed Security Aviators in-hand sprites being invisible.

08 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Added the constitution of the Republic of Biesel to the Biesel Consular's loadout.
  • litanybook objects now renamed to versebook.

Connorjg1/Talion updated:

  • Tajara Zhan subspecies have a slightly lower grab resist mod bringing them more in line with the other species.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Engineering now gets a stack of wood in their locker room.
  • Added some pipe wrenches to Engineering lockers.
  • Added more spare parts to tech storage.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Changes the sprites for the Orion/Heph Tech Alt to be the old sprites with the vest.
  • Changes Heph Tech default to not include the vest. Gives the position a Hephaestus themed jump instead of being generic.
  • Changes the Heph Miner to be thematic with Hephaestus as an industry.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes mining shuttle sensors console being inaccessible. Fixes the possibility of the operations hangar being vented if the mining shuttle airlock is forced.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • Diona Nymph Limbs can now be reattached to hands and feet, rather than just arms and legs.

07 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Drones have been given a T-ray Scanner.
  • Space Bar is now rad shielded.
  • Added a cryopod in the Space Bar bathroom for patrons to cryo.
  • The super secret Einstein Engines ship following the Horizon now has a working cryo network.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Mining drones can now actually go mining without exploding.

Doxxmedearly, MattAtlas updated:

  • The library book upload scanner and book binder can now be anchored and unanchored.
  • You are no longer able to put a paper in the book binder while it is already binding a book.
  • Adjusted some visible messages relating to some library machines.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Fixes the black zavod softcap being invisible.
  • Fixes the Unathi Th'akhist wristguards being unequippable by Unathi.
  • Removes some old and (long) outdated stuff on the Tips Of The Round. None new added. Yet.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The ninja esword no longer has 100 armor piercing for no reason at all.
  • The ninja esword no longer has a 100 percent guaranteed deflection rate on projectiles. It is now closer to 65 percent when shot with a laser rifle.
  • Energy sword parrying now functions off of the integrated shield power. If the shield power falls to below zero, parrying is no longer possible. Energy swords have 100 shield power, while the Ninja energy sword has 150. Shield power receives three fourths of the damage parried.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Changes the re-admin text to mention a space ship, instead of a station.

Wickedcybs updated:

  • N2O will now be referred to as 'Nitrous Oxide' in all cases instead of having it appear as 'Sleeping agent' on gas scans.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes xenoarch jumpsuit sprites.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Adds the overgrown mining station awaysite.

kermit updated:

  • Red Nightshade induced berserk state now increases your melee damage by 50%.
  • Red Nightshade's metabolisation speed has been decreased, so the berserk state lasts a lot longer. This also prevents all the toxins immediately destroying your liver in 30 seconds.
  • An examine message makes it obvious when someone is using Nightshade, in addition to the jitters already present.
  • Adds flavour messages which appear when using Red Nightshhade.
  • Moves Nightshade's cardiotoxicity to OD only. The liver damage will still be severe regardless of ODing.
  • Changes Nightshade's recipe to something more sensical and in-line with it's effects (now 1u Stimm, 1u Synaptizine, 0.1u Phoron).
  • Adds Red Nightshade to the Random Toxin Kit uplink purchase, maintenance contraband spawn, and xenobotany/L7 vines biohazard random chemicals pool.
  • Adds a Box of Berserk Injectors to the Uplink for 2 TC, containing 2 doses of Red Nightshade lasting 2.5 minutes each.
  • The Random Toxins Kit comes with 3 random toxins instead of just the 1.

stev/Memescope, Vrow updated:

  • Removed the Shorts Only mode in the PMCG Modsuit.
  • Fixed the right facing pants blue band being offset by one pixel.

06 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Added folders to the deck 1 offices, including XO.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a derelict away site, ported from Baystation.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Removes the 'Remove Sticker' verb for stickers and googly eyes, since you can just click them to remove them.

GrayRachnid updated:

  • Gave the OM a Fax machine and an upgrade to his Requests console.
  • Added clipboards to the bridge.
  • Fixes multiple cameras with identical names.
  • Fixes the Machinist workshop RC being named Operations.
  • Fix intrepid walls being seethrough

Lancer, Stryker updated:

  • Adds moss bowls with egg, miyeokguk, maeuntang, and moss dumplings to the kitchen recipes.
  • Adds moss to the garden vending machine.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Phoron gas contact damage is no longer spread out to every organ. This allowed it to be entirely autohealed by natural regeneration.
  • Very slightly increased zero pressure brute damage.
  • Inhaling phoron with an inhaler is now really bad for you.
  • Full auto is no longer a laser beam that never misses.
  • The head and the human limbs now have a lower max damage, which means that they should now be delimbable by laser rifles and similarly-damaging weapons.

Omicega updated:

  • Fixes injury inspection via grab not working on surgery tables.

SinfulBehaviors updated:

  • Added three previously unused body markings.
  • Fixed Lower Cheek Right not being available in the markings list.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Remaps the mining shuttle, giving it more space for cargo; and other QoL features.
  • Fixes some floor-mounted signs layering above mobs.
  • Adds static GPS, which are intended for use in shuttles.
  • Shrinks the holodeck and tweaks its templates.

Vrow updated:

  • Fully separated CPR into: Full CPR (Compressions + Mouth-to-Mouth), Compressions only, and Mouth-to-Mouth only. With an added buff that Mouth-to-Mouth will work if you've Lung Rescued someone with collapsed lungs.
  • Reworked the Auto-Compressor into a Stabilizer Harness. The Stabilizer Harness now draws power from a cell with a default load of 1k (which means you can also bother Science for better cells), and it can be put into rechargers.
  • The new Stabilizer Harness now has the same toggleable Emergency Positive Pressure system as the IVs! But it can only handle small tanks like Emergency ones and use a good mount of power.
  • The Stabilizer Harness toggleable Auto-CPR mode now has a chance to Restart Asystole/Flat Lined hearts! Although it also has a low chance to crack the ribs ONLY IF the patient is Asystole/Flat Lining.
  • Tweaked the Auto-Compressor sprites to better fit Stabilizer Harness! Now with in-hands, visible battery, and tank pressure indicators!
  • Added a small percent helper in the tanks.dm.
  • Body Scanner VueUI will now show the additional damage readouts of Critical and Fatal, and accurately as well in accordance to how the health analyzers/medscans do it.
  • Fixed the Body Scanner VueUI damage readouts not being colored.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Add alt versions of the punk shave and punk shave bun that has a more uniform fade.
  • Touched up the braids and braid alt hairstyle when it came to the profile and shading. They'll hopefully look better now.
  • Added a braids alt hairstyle for Tajara.
  • The mercenary ship has windows at the cockpit area again.
  • Adds one inflatables box to the merc ship.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • You can now take butanol in your loadout flask, just like yummy toothpaste or ethanol.

kyres1 updated:

  • Remapped the TCFL Peacekeeper ship, and its respective shuttle.
  • Adds a new docking arm outside the Operations Lobby where big shuttles of different shapes can dock.

05 June 2022

ClemTheDuck, The Stryker updated:

  • Adds new armor sprites by ClemTheDuck.

04 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Tramp Freighter now has suit cooling units so IPC crewmen can go EVA.
  • Tramp Freighter given a cell charger so they can recharge power cells.
  • Removing the exosuit frame's metal reinforcement now refunds the metal.
  • Mining now has access to mining shuttle APC and Intrepid APC.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Held schlorrgos now have sprites again. Ough.
  • You can now throw-intent place items on crates and tables consistently again.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix machinery not being disconnected from powernets when node cables (O-X) are cut.
  • Fix windoors turning invisible when power is cut.
  • Fix interacting with windoors with objects (i.e. hitting them).
  • Colliding with unpowered windoors now pushes them open as if you clicked on them, rather than opening instantly.
  • Fix colliding with a pulled simple-mob being picked up sending players into another player's columbo dimension.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Fixes the psych office having a duplicate air alarm.
  • Fixes the gibber not accepting some simple mobs.
  • Fixes the TCFL pamphlet being out of date lorewise.

Omicega updated:

  • Removed negative slowdown from the loadout RIG available to off-worlders.

Vrow updated:

  • Fixes medscans/body scanners/operating consoles thinking there's something else when someone only has an implant in them.
  • Fixes the above counting each and every single greimorian larva inside a limb that has eggs implanted.
  • Completely removes the Rainbow and the Psychodelic jumpsuits.
  • Removes old Jumpsuits sprites.
  • Ported and tweaked most of CM's Redone Bay Colored Jumpsuit sprites! Details on the tweaks can be found in the GitHub PR, and they're all Bulwark friendly as well!

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Improves computer sprites.
  • Improves lift controller sprites.

03 June 2022

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • You can no longer put items in walls by throwing on help intent.
  • Diona can now take the headtails 'hair' option again.
  • Anomaly power utilizers no longer go invisible when a battery is removed.
  • Morph turfs no longer spread through windows or doors, unless the door is open.
  • You can now throw items over railing again.
  • Freedom implants now allow you to select a trigger emote, instead of randomly selecting one you may not be able to use.
  • Freedom implants are now more obvious when they're out of uses.
  • You can now secure extinguisher refill canisters with a screwdriver, giving a way for borgs and drones to refill their extinguishers.

02 June 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Most KA barrels now cost Uranium instead of Phoron.
  • KA cell costs have been tweaked.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • You can no longer tear down a flag from a distance by leaving the dialogue box up.
  • Torn flags are no longer invisible.
  • When you use a screwdriver to take down a flag, you get the proper item back (if it's not torn up!), meaning you can place them again easily.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Tweaks Orion Hangar Tech and Miner Uniforms.

Vrow updated:

  • Added a new high loft jacket, which is selectable in the loadout.

stev/Memescope, Vrow updated:

  • Added a PMCG modular jumpsuit, or more simply known as a modsuit, which was made by Memescope! This modsuit is restricted to PMCG and can be found in the loadout. It can shift between forms like shortsleeved, or just the pants, and some others!

01 June 2022

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Radio communications are now limited by sector distance. The default max range is two grids. The centcomm level, ERT staging, and antagonist bases are exempt from this.
  • Ships will now only hear other ships' communications if they are within this range. Get close on the overmap if you want to eavesdrop. Note that away ships will still only hear the Ship Frequency, not Horizon comms.
  • Away ship roles should no longer get duplicated radio messages, even when in comms range of multiple other away ships.
  • As away shuttles do not have telecomms units, they will no longer receive radio broadcasts when departed, if they were previously able to. Intrepid/Mining shuttle can still speak DURING the bluespace jump, away ships cannot. Holopads are unaffected.
  • Added an External Signal Receiver to the Horizon tcomms room. This does not need any special setup or connections, and while powered, will allow away ships to communicate with their crew who are aboard the Horizon. This has no bearing on antagonists, so disabling it won't help you there, crafty engineers.

31 May 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed antag uplinks not working off-station (for real this time). Chat clients on PDAs can now be opened off-Horizon, but with limited functionality.

Vrow updated:

  • Added two more reading outputs for damage. The cap for damage readout now is Fatal (over 100 damage), in contrast to Severe (over 50 damage).
  • Fixed the Burn Severity reading from being hard numbers to the minor/moderate/significant/severe/critical/fatal.
  • Greimorian Eggs and Larvae in people now show as 'Abnormal organic body' in body scanners and medscans.
  • Added the Electronic Implants from integrated circuits in the body scanner's known implants list.

30 May 2022

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • You can now dismantle reinforced walls again.
  • The additional description info for reinforced walls and girders now shows the correct disassembly steps.

GrayRachnid updated:

  • The Intrepid now has faster cycling airlocks and a bigger aft cycling space.
  • The Intrepid has also gone through a little bit of remodeling. There's empty spaces for people to park equipment rather than unnecessary items that will never get used.

MattAtlas, RyverStyx updated:

  • Added a new accent for mobs in the Srom.

29 May 2022

Afya updated:

  • Changed color of Ya'ssa in light mode.

GrayRachnid updated:

  • Gives the mining shuttle a proper cycler and an additional air canister and a single vent. Miners now also have access to their own fire alarm to enable the vent.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ghosts do not receive pain messages unless they are in range.
  • Ghosts do not receive halloss messages unless they are in range.
  • Halloss messages should now happen less often.
  • The ninja teleporter console in their base works again.
  • Drop pods now work correctly.
  • Fixed shuttles that dock to the Horizon's exterior being unable to dock.
  • TCFL ERT shuttle can now actually dock with the Horizon.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds a secondary audioconsole to the western bar.
  • Fixes the portable generator crate in engineering storage spawning with the wrong fuel.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Replaces Goon slot machine sprite with modified Eris slot machine sprite.

28 May 2022

Afya updated:

  • XO, CE, and RD now have basic access to operations.
  • OM now has basic access to engineering.
  • Added a childlock to mechs. Mechs must be in maintenance mode to unlink.
  • Mechs give more feedback when commands fail.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix power networks not updating properly when single cables are cut.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The alternate Idris Beret has had its logo area made more teal like in the original rendition.
  • The engineer survival box that most antags and a lot of admin or ccia ghost spawners start with now has what survival boxes usually get. Main difference is that their oxygen tank is upgraded to an expanded capacity variant and the glowstick is replaced with a flare. Horizon engineering department members get it too now, it is an engineering box after all.
  • Ports the emergency forcing tool from Baystation. On Aurora it's been renamed to the 'rescue axe' and true to the name, is a hand axe used to force your way into situations where a crowbar would not suffice. You can find these in fire closets or in the CE/Atmos tech engineering lockers.
  • The old retro full face gas masks have been swapped for the clear faced gas mask variant within fire closets and engineering lockers.
  • Fireclosets have been buffed overall. They'll usually contain a very small amount of inflatables totalling to one door, two walls. The EMTs and the bridge will have variants that have two doors, three walls. The EMTs also get a ladder in their firecloset.
  • Firesuits can have a few more things in their suit slots. Crowbars of any type, the rescue axe, the fire axe and full oxygen tanks.

27 May 2022

Afya updated:

  • XO preset now shows up on the ID card modification program.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Added a wall-mounted variant of the Audioconsole.

26 May 2022

Afya updated:

  • Spiderbots can no longer drag all the things.
  • Spiderbots are now considered tiny mobs.

sleepy wolf updated:

  • Spirits have fixed the powernet, generators, and items in the cursed station.

25 May 2022

Afya updated:

  • Added a *tflick emote for tail flicking. Tajara+Unathi can use the tflick emote.
  • AI shell no longer shows up on end of round text.

Ben10083 updated:

  • Workshop APC now starts with a better cell.
  • Spiderbots now have emotes.
  • Spiderbots now are defined as synthetic in code.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Srom mask is now a small item like most other masks.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds more lights to atmospherics. Gives atmospheric technicians a pipe painter each. Gives atmospheric technicians access to the SM reactor.
  • Fixes Xenobotanists not spawning in the research meeting room. Fixes them not being able to choose wristbounds. Fixes engineering medical wall locker.

Vrow updated:

  • Fixed the invisible and misnamed PMCG undershirt back into EPMC undershirts.

WowzewoW (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes pick up animation, and adds put down animations.
  • Removes broken disposals animation.

24 May 2022

Omicega updated:

  • Reduces the item size of comic books and manga. Now they can fit in your pockets!

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes a typo in the tool belt's name, i.e. "tool-belt" to "tool belt".
  • Removes the pilot lockers and places the helmets on a rack instead.

WowzewoW (Wezzy) updated:

  • Improves sprites for wall lockers, fire extinguisher cabinets, fireaxe cabinet, critter crate and wall safe.

anconfuzedrock updated:

  • The unathi droopy dorsal frill option now has the frill facing right in all four of its sprites instead of left in the back one.

23 May 2022

Arrow768 updated:

  • Removes the "inbuilt whitelist handling of the ghost roles. -> That is changed via config.

Ben10083 updated:

  • Increased cost of exosuit Ion Rifle so it now requires rare material such as phoron instead of only requiring steel.
  • Made exosuit flashbang launcher easier to produce by changing material requirements.
  • Made exosuit RCD easier to produce by reducing phoron cost.
  • Reduced Exosuit Combat Circuit tech cost so it is available at round start.
  • Removed phoron requirement from heavy mech construction.
  • Removed tech requirement from exosuit treads.
  • Exosuit health analyzer can now switch between basic and full body scans.
  • Exosuit crisis drone now nullifies some of the pain of the target.
  • Added a retractable cyborg analyzer useable by machinists.
  • Mech Hoverthrusters can now pass over railings.
  • added PASSRAILING as a pass flag.
  • Significantly reduced the amount of fall damage drones recieve.
  • Increased Matriarch Drone health.
  • Added a integrated mining drill for industrial ipc miners in xenowear.

KingOfThePing, RyverStyx updated:

  • Added the new Medbay pet Crusher's sprites and code.

Llywelwyn, RyverStyx updated:

  • Added srom masks to the Skrell loadout.
  • Dreamer mantle is renamed to 'skrell mantle', and is no longer specific to the Zi'Pluax genner vessel.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You now interact with doors if you click the tile under them. Doors are given precedence to firedoors.
  • You now interact with elevator buttons or lift panels if you click the tile in front of them -- not the wall they're on, as the buttons are mapped on the floors.
  • Non-modular camera consoles now work properly.
  • Full auto no longer prevents you from throwing or using weapon safeties.
  • Networks are no longer switched if accessing an unauthorized camera network.

Omicega updated:

  • Adds departmental duffel bags to various departments' job lockers.

RisingValiant updated:

  • added a check to the relaymove call in cryo.dm that checks if you're inside the cryocell before calling relaymove when you move.

Ryverstyx updated:

  • Adds more Skrell hair styles.
  • Changes names of existing Skrell styles to be uniform and descriptive.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds a "playsound_in" proc that lets one play a sound after a set time has passed.
  • Re-adds the old custodial uniform with the purple sleeves.
  • Adds an alternative custodial uniform with a purple vertical stripe for both factions.
  • Adds faction-based custodial softcaps.
  • The Xenobotanist role is now its own job and no longer an alt-title. Dedicated xenobotany access were added to them and their equipment.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds use_tool proc.
  • Adds new hammer and shovel usesounds.
  • Makes use of new ishammer() proc.
  • Pipe wrenches now correctly take half the time to wrench atmospheric things.
  • Tweaks time needed for poking holes in paper bags to prevent accidental immediate poking.
  • use_tool procs now all consistently use ticks, instead of some using seconds.
  • Welding tool remove_fuel() proc has finally been properly replaced by use() proc.

Yonnimer updated:

  • Changes the Coeus Dionaeh head to the Geras head, which should fix clipping issues and missing pixels with hats and cosmetics

kermit updated:

  • Increases dextrotoxin's metabolism speed. Parapens should last ~5 minutes instead of ~8 minutes.
  • Adds a Purgepen which comes alongside the Parapen in a box. It's used to remove the dextrotoxin and end the paralysis early.

listerla & Pawn updated:

  • Replaced plastic clogs sprite with one by Pawn.

stev/Memescope, Vrow updated:

  • Added back in the Eridani Private Military Corporation uniforms, headwear and renamed the Eridani Sec Sleeve Patch appropriately to an Eridani item instead of PMCG. All which should be available in the loadout!
  • Added the PMCG Armband, which was made fully by Memescope (who also reworked the current PMCG sprites to the nifty, clean and organized state as they currently are)
  • Fixed EPMC AP's IDs being invisible, also using the incorrect PMCG uniforms instead of their proper ERT
  • Properly names PMCG items as PMCG instead of just PMC.

22 May 2022

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Crew armory contents have been changed. More vests and helmets of a different type, along with blue and white armbands.
  • Crew armory medkits now spawn with contents.
  • The bar has annexed the hallway in front of the bar. This will prevent the audioconsole from playing music throughout the entire ship.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • The space bar now has a cabinet filled with high-quality drinks not usually available on the ship, and their booze dispenser was given additional cartridges to help mix uncommon drinks.
  • The space bar kitchen now has additional meat options in the freezer.
  • Small map tweaks to the Space Bar- More disposals, bartender can change holo-menu, replaced light bulb boxes with the correct kind.
  • Small map tweaks to the Orion Express ship- added an engine control console to the helm, added trash bins, removed booze dispenser, added package wrap and a labeler.
  • Condensed the Orion Express ship's anti-piracy gun lockers into one, and added a stun revolver for less lethal defense.
  • Added a closet with some jackets and other items for the Orion Express ship.
  • Replaces a random crate in the merchant starting area with a guaranteed medium to high-value good.
  • The Orion Express ship cryogenics will now function.
  • Adds vintage wine bottles, with lore-appropriate names. These are exceptionally rare drinks.

FlamingLily updated:

  • Added marshalling wands with four unique action messages (per intent) for hangar technicians to direct shuttlecraft with.

RisingValiant updated:

  • Changed the code in the clothing files so that the nt and PMC intern jumpsuits aren't invisible anymore.
  • Did the same for the NT Phys and Psych Jumpsuits as well
  • Made it so mischiveous ghosts can't unattach googly eyes, which was happening because it was a command verb which required no hands. It now checks if you're dead before giving a damn about what you say.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Flags and banners for the Free Traverser movement.

Vrow updated:

  • Added a toggleable verb for Stethoscopes between Manual and Automatic usage. Automatic usage means you'll use the stethoscope automatically on the selected body part when examining someone adjacent to you. Manual means the automatic examine doesn't happen.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Pilot helmets recieved a resprite, going for a design that has a visor attached rather than mounted goggles. The sprite itself was from Baystation and was tweaked to have its visor toggleable. There's also a repainted TCFL variant.
  • Adds a new hairstyle for Humans and Tajara. Short Hair Bun 2 and Tajara Bun Short.
  • Changes some of the to chat names for a few Tajara hairstyles to be more descriptive.
  • Renamed the 'Lizard' sprite dmi's to 'Unathi'. This is an under the hood change that should not affect anything.
  • The Unathi tail sprite files don't reference their old name of 'Soghun' anymore.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new sprites for Living Quarters Lifts.
  • Adds new sounds for cryo, lifts, and robotic storage.

sleepywolf updated:

  • The Horizon's scanners pick up an asteroid with a large structure within, a huge hangar big enough for the Intrepid. Locals say it's cursed - and not to go.

20 May 2022

Afya updated:

  • Added a *flick emote for ear flicking. Tajara can use the flick emote.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a more modern jukebox to the bar. It comes with ten hit songs of the future! Console sprites from Bay.
  • Space jukebox is now just a normal jukebox

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Cleaned up several misc. runtime errors.
  • VueUI windows will now clamp to slightly less than the current BYOND window's screen height, hopefully preventing windows from being stuck open.
  • Away sites with the same player-facing name no longer overwrite each other in site selection.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Security no longer has access to non-Security cameras on code green.

WowzewoW (Wezzy) updated:

  • Tweaks labcoat and warden overcoat sprites to look less bulky.

19 May 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed code_check not having proper arguments passed to it, added a check for non-TGM mapfiles.
  • Added a unit test for testing all away sites.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Matriarch drones are not whitelisted anymore.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Remaps hydroponics and changes part of the old freezer into a hydroponics-kitchen shared garden space.

18 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Machinist can now use the airlocks south west of their workshop.
  • Removed paperwork gripper from Medical Module.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Adds missing fire alarms and emergency shutters to several rooms on the Horizon, Aurora, and Runtime.
  • Adds a unit test to check that all rooms that should have a fire alarm, do.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Loadout uniforms once again override job uniforms.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the CCIA shuttle venting the mining shuttle dock.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Sped up code related to pain, dislocation and shock.

17 May 2022

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Reduced misc. subsystem and lighting priorities, raised priority of Mob and ZAS/Air subsystems.
  • Replace references to the NSS Aurora with dynamic references to the current map, where possible.
  • Replaced some references to NanoTrasen with the SCC, where appropriate.
  • Removed several visible_messages for objects being damaged in explosions, deferred powernet regeneration until after explosions completed. Explosions should now process significantly faster.
  • Cables, pipes, and other objects hidden beneath floor tiles should no longer be damaged by explosions, unless the tile itself is blown off first.
  • Map-loading will no longer queue every turf for smoothing several times, which should slightly decrease mapgen load.
  • Fixed several areas meant to be airless containing atmos tiles, causing roundstart atmospherics processing which may have caused roundstart lag.
  • Added a unit test to catch atmos zone mismatches.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Added two decks of Skrellian tarot cards to the loadout, selectable by Skrell and Diona.

Llywelwyn, RyverStyx updated:

  • Added the 'adjust-headtails' verb to Skrell, found in the IC tab.
  • Added the following body markings to Skrell: gills, beakmouth, tearstains, and dart frog markings.
  • Added the following hairstyles to Skrell: emo for regular and long headtails, behind for long headtails, and expressive headtails.
  • Tweaked the order of headtail styles in the hair selection menu for better organisation. They're now organised by general length for ease when adjusting style.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Wardens have their peaked cap again.

WowzewoW (Wezzy) updated:

  • Changed terminal sprites.
  • Ringer has a new sprite.

16 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Spiderbots now get a message when access is updated.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Unusual containers should no longer spawn locked.
  • Unusual containers with certain appearances should no longer spawn with excess gear.
  • Ghostspawner roles will now have their ID card updated after they close the character setup window, so that it displays the correct information.
  • Ghostspawner roles will now be able to select their citizenship, based on standard origin and culture selections.
  • Citizenship selection and ID card updates will also apply to any mob using the plastic surgeon machine, assuming they have an ID equipped before using it.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Refactor power usage to not constantly recalculate every tick, only draw and update when necessary. Should ease server load.
  • Refactor SSmachinery to be much more efficient in regards to processing, removes SSpipenet and SSpower and moves their responsibilities onto SSmachinery.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Berets have once again been removed from security job outfit datums.
  • Removed errant mentions of Eridani PMCs from the PMCG beret and glasses.
  • The Horizon can no longer use cameras that aren't on its connected Z levels.
  • Ghost roles can no longer see AOOC unless they are explicitly antags.
  • Adjacency checks now respect Z levels.
  • AIs no longer remotely press their non-existant feet onto holopads.
  • Fixed errant pixels in the PMCG sunglasses.
  • Fixed the misnamed Oqi medical uniform.
  • Fixed the invisible janitor softcap.
  • Fixed inconsistencies in the Eridani asset protection ID.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Fixes errant pixels in the Skrell Headtail Blotches.

The Stryker updated:

  • Adds a collection of Konyanger traditional dresses to the loadout, as well as a shrine maiden outfit to the religion loadout tab.
  • Adds a horizontal sash and asymmetric dress shirt to the accessories tab.
  • Adds a long straight skirt to the skirt selection.
  • Fixes the positioning of the gat sidesprites.

Vrow updated:

  • Swaps the in-hand icons for chemical bottles and beakers so that they show in the correct hand.

WowzewoW (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes invisible hairnets, sword sheathes, CMO uniform, XO uniform, Bridge Crew uniform, OM uniform, and a stray pixel on the DPRA cigarette packet.
  • Fixes Nico-Tine box sprite being unable to open and close.

Ben10083 updated:

  • People can now give spiderbots access by swiping their ID.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed invalid objects causing runtimes on the Racers away station.
  • Fixed cyborgs being able to teleport yield declarations infinitely far away. They will now dispense at the console unless you are adjacent.
  • Yield Declaration paperwork updated to comply with current lore and map.

  • Maps in missing captain's office air alarm and adds bridge requests console.

Vrow updated:

  • Medical's Secure Wall Lockers start properly locked.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Remove proc waiting on visible_message (and alike procs) as well as process()

Llywelwyn updated:

  • People in Srom will no longer crash when they die.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes tiles in freezer having the wrong temperature. Removes a duplicate APC in the old freezer. Fixes missing door access.
  • Expands the security desk area by 1 tile and adds a alerts console, paper shredder, and file cabinet.
  • Fixes the holodeck not being radiation shielded.
  • Makes the Horizon's holodeck and its templates' areas relative to the Horizon map.
  • Fixes morgue APC not being connected to the SMES grid.

WowzewoW (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes invisible PMC sunhud.
  • Tweaked warden overcoat color schemes.
  • Swaps Warden and Officer uniforms for better contrast. Tweaks Idris uniforms to use tertiary color.
  • Loadout suits, hats and masks now override default jobspawn clothing.
  • Adds corporate logos to the back of corporate labcoats.
  • Janitor uniform no longer has purple highlights.
  • Tweaks some Idris clothing items to use correct white/teal instead of white/gold color scheme.
  • Fixes loadout surgical caps spawning in wrongly.
  • Wardens spawn with proper glasses now.
  • Nanotrasen EMT jacket color scheme has been tweaked.
  • Removed superfluous caps.
  • Fixes missing pixels for rolled civillian uniforms.
  • Fixes wrongly colored pixels on pants.

13 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Removed improperly placed window shutter at Bridge.
  • Expanded the bridge window shutter lockdown to areas near the bridge.

Vrow updated:

  • The level-3 biohazard closet in Medical's Isolation Ward is no longer empty.
  • Made general level-3 biohazard closets spawn with two biosuit pairs instead of just one.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • The new departmental uniforms can have their sleeves rolled up now.
  • Tweaks jumpsuit rolling code, so only the verb is available if rolled state actually exists.
  • The new departmental uniforms have been tweaked in several places to be more differentiated.
  • Captain, Bridge Crew and Executive Officers spawn with oxford shoes instead of sneakers.
  • Wardens, officers and cadets have new hats, vests and jackets to differentiate themselves further.
  • Machinist outfit has been tweaked to be more unique - and their jacket has been seperated from being glued on to their uniform. Don't worry, the overall look is still identical. You simply now can unzip.
  • Removed generic corporate hats. (For anyone that's asking, they're the black and really dark blue hats that were actually unaffliated with any corporation.)
  • Removed first responder outfit, mime, depreciated uniforms and alternate detective outfits. (They did not fit in with any of the uniforms.)
  • Corporatizes the scrubs selection and adds more choices. Color coordination!
  • Scrubbed superfluous megacorp uniforms from the loadout. (You're already spawning in with your uniform anyway.)
  • Corporate liaisons have proper uniforms now, rather than using the default one.
  • Adds proper IDs for Orion Express employees.
  • Fixes some corporate jobs not spawning with labcoats.
  • Adds some alt versions of corporate labcoats and tweaks labcoat sprites to match the palette.
  • Adds placeholder Nanotrasen default job uniforms as a safety net for missing uniforms.

12 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Most cyborg modules have been stripped of their clerical tools.
  • Added a augmented pen to loadout. It can change color and use cursive.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a derelict racer hangout as an away site. Credits to Sleepy Wolf for the map!

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Spiderbots now properly spill oil when hit, rather than bleed red.
  • Vampire's Screech ability will now shatter or, if far away, damage windoors.
  • Fixed an issue with chairs causing runtimes with the scrubbers event.
  • Radiation now only applies hallucinations at very high doses.
  • Queenless origins for both Zo'ra and K'lax should now provide the proper selections for accents, citizenship, and religion.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Temporarily disabled mirror reflections to prevent server crashes.
  • Suit coolers will now stop processing properly when deleted/destroyed.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Added a chef bounty for a Reuben sandwich.
  • Adds auto-hiss for Skrell beakmouth, simulating a mouth-full sound. BASIC replaces 's' with 'sch', FULL additionally replaces 'x' with 'ksch'.
  • Adds additional functionality to auto-hiss to allow an option for preventing doubling up of substitutions for consecutive letters.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added the Gadpathurian Exile and Coalition Other origins for humans.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Makes the bridge radiation shielded and adds safety shutters to the windows.
  • Fixes a missing research disposal.
  • Adds a new sprite for the radiation sign.
  • Fixes cargo conveyor being reversed.
  • The plating outside on deck 3 is now airless, which should slightly increase roundstart performance.

Vrow updated:

  • Adjusted the Dropper sprite to the classic version, but upright and with the adjusted palette. It also has invisible outlines for easier clicking.
  • You can also quickly change transfer rate for droppers by using it as well.
  • Added a new type of dropper, the Electronic Pipette, and reworked the Industrial Dropper into a Cyborg Pipette, all with unique sprites! Pipettes offer a finer transfer amounts of 0.1, 0.2, and 0.5 as well as the standard transfer of droppers.
  • New sprites for the pipettes, in-hands included! Also adjusted the dropper in-hand palette.
  • Maps in the new Electronic Pipettes in the Pharmacy and Science's Chemistry lab, as well as moving the vial box in the Pharmacy a little bit.
  • Fixed admin log for droppers.

11 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Fixed TCFL Shuttle not having a pump.
  • TCFL Medbay sleeper replaced with a body scanner.
  • TCFL given inflatables.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Made minor map tweaks to the tramp freighter. CO2 tanks split evenly between thruster rooms. Adds a suit cycler, recharging station, and cell charger.
  • Added a missing console that prevented the tramp freighter cryopod from functioning.
  • Ghostrole vaurca and offworlders should now spawn with the things they need to survive.
  • Ghostroles will now all spawn with the proper footwear.
  • Signing papers as a ghostrole will now use the correct name.
  • Space bar patrons now start with a wallet containing a random amount of money.
  • Fixed a typo in the tramp freighter captain description.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • IPCs should no longer overheat inside exosuit cabins.
  • Suit coolers (backpack + RIG versions) should now cool IPCs properly while on EVA.
  • SSmob can now process non-mob datums, for cases where an object's processing is closely tied to Life().
  • Removed movement/collision checks for observer mobs. Should reduce server load slightly.
  • Fixed secure crates starting unlocked.
  • Secure hydroponics crates now require either Hydroponics or Xenobiology access.
  • Xenobotanists now spawn with the correct access and job outfit.
  • Machinists, PMCG medical staff, and Zavod/Zeng-Hu scientists now start with their proper labcoats.
  • Idris gardeners start with aprons once more.
  • Idris gardener uniform now has proper directional sprites.
  • Security cadets now start with their appropriate hazard vest again.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Skrell can now pull non-psionics into the Srom. Grab them and then, while the grab is still active, you must both sleep. This is undone if you are damaged.
  • Observer alpha is no longer reset at round end.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes a misplaced corkboard in the journalist's office.
  • Fixes the brig communal chute being misdirected.
  • Restored atmos techs access to the deck 1 tech storage.

  • Fixed the Amohdan origin having access to the wrong accents.

  • Adds species-based age restriction for jobs, for now only affecting Skrell.
  • Skrell minimum age raised from 30 to 50.
  • PDA-based uplinks can now be accessed without a network connection (i.e. off-Horizon).

  • Added a shoulder mantle for Burzsiean IPC's

MattAtlas updated:

  • Skrell sprint is now more in line with other sprints and is no longer the worst sprint in the game.
  • Accent text tags now show up in the radio.
  • Organs now process if they are in pain.

09 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Clerical module was given additional tools such as a destination tagger, quickpay, and paper scanner.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Stamp overlays no longer float on folded paper, such as paper planes and origami cranes.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Remaps and moves the cafe from the starboard side to the port side on deck 3. Makes it possible to send things to the deck 3 cafe.
  • Remaps the recreational center. Remaps the changing room, washroom, and showers. Adds a gym and a lounge.
  • Remaps cryogenics, which now has a shower below it and a toilet a bit further down.
  • Adds a deck 3 civilian substation below engineering's break/meeting room on deck 3.
  • Remaps the crew armoury, adds a command access front desk.
  • Adds more nature, such as a nature showcase to the starboard side and a flowerbed to the rafters on deck 3.
  • Adds a central stairwell that spans across all decks.
  • Remaps the starboard side of deck 3, adds a new public hallway. Moves the scuttling chamber to the central ring on deck 3.
  • Remaps the starboard deck 2 hallway. Moves tech storage to the left. Adds a maintenance airlock into starboard maintenance on deck 2.
  • Remaps operations and implements QoL features such as a warehouse-to-mail room disposals chute.
  • Adds a command bunker above the crew armoury.
  • Remaps the AI core and moves its SMES to deck 2. Makes the turrets stun and lethal instead of lethal only.
  • Remaps the morgue and makes it look like a morgue.

WickedCybs updated:

  • No security role will spawn with the off colour black gloves anymore. If you want gloves, look through your department or grab some in the loadout.
  • The port and starboard propulsion chambers have been made safer via getting a door bolt control added. It will control whether the airlocks underneath the blast doors are bolted. There's been camereas added to each combustion chamber and an airlock leading to space added to the starboard propulsion area.

08 May 2022

Afya updated:

  • Cell timers now show time remaining in description.
  • Fixed i116 in sentencing consoles.

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the Tajaran subspecies having access to accents and origins they should not be able to.

Ben10083 updated:

  • Removed obsolete Visitation Access button from security lobby.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a new independent freighter third-party ship, and a new away site, adapted from a bay away site.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Exoplanet + away site landing destinations should no longer appear duplicated in the selection screen.
  • Fixed runtime related to the FSF patrol ship.
  • Replaced corpses in the Abandoned Hideout exoplanet ruin.
  • FSF patrol ship and Abandoned Hideout converted to TGM files.
  • Mining cart engines now start with a key inside.
  • Adds a minecart orbital dropper, available from mining vendors for 2000pts. Comes with an engine and two carts.
  • Mining carts can now travel off-tracks very slowly, so long as they aren't already on a track.

RyverStyx, Llywelwyn updated:

  • Fixes recoloring of the mantle sprite... Again.
  • Refactors all skrell_items.dmi into contained sprites.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes the bar ordering terminal being inside the bar sign. Also fixes some pipes and disposals in the kitchen.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The Intrepid has been remapped to lose its rightmost airlock. In exchange the little engine nacelle has been expanded into a full fledged room that will supply both ship thrusters. It also includes a power source and the scrubbers canister. The rest of the Intrepid has had minor tweaks for ease of use. such as handrails within the airlocks, additional scrubbers and air vents, a medical sleeper and a bit more.
  • The Intrepid and Mining Pod now require power to stay operational. They have SMES's that are topped with power and can get more just by landing back at the Horizon, or via alternate means like a generator if it really comes to it!
  • Added handrails. This is a type of object you can buckle onto securely to avoid getting knocked into stuff due to acceleration. They're usually found in shuttle airlocks. Sprite is from Baystation.

07 May 2022

Afya updated:

  • Fire alarms no longer remain red after the alarm is cleared.

Alberyk updated:

  • Increased overmap hazard density.

Huntime updated:

  • Quality of life improvements to Xenobotany

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Shuttle-shipped mining supplies now properly queue for the next shuttle delivery, rather than being lost in nullspace.
  • Orbital drills no longer create their own turfs/areas, which should permit them to drill where dropped.
  • Fix cyborgs spawning in space with wheelchairs.
  • Fix voidsuits and helmets failing to appear.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Adds a kippah to the loadout.

  • Fixes the EVA recharging bay button controlling the wrong shutter.
  • Resprites the emergency softsuit.
  • Maps in the new service airlocks.
  • Fixes the new short ponytails (and Bun, Large 2) sprite names being wrong.
  • Fixes the HoS fax being named as "Unknown".

Vrow updated:

  • Deleted Eris-style chem bottles, medcup, beakers, cryostasis beaker, and bluespace beaker.
  • Tweaked the Eris-style vial sprite and palette to be more consistent with the new sprites.
  • Resprites the chem bottles, medcup, beakers, cryostasis beaker, and bluespace beaker into something more fitting to Aurora. With a new lid style as well.
  • Added two new types of chem bottles: a mini and a triangular one.
  • Re-paths the medcup from .../food/drinks to .../glass/beaker/medcup.
  • Fixed beaker and bottle in-hands not showing properly.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The vending machine outside of the investigator's office no longer blocks transit. It was odd that it did anyway, as it looked to be next to the wall and not occupying the entire tile.

06 May 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Tesla prosthetics eyes can now use night vision.

Ben10083 updated:

  • Watches now report time until bluespace jump.
  • Added holoboard to TCFL Brig for entertainment.
  • Minor redesign to TCFL Medbay.
  • TCFL ghost roles now have storage pouches.
  • Added building materials to TCFL ship.

  • Added tool belt and welding goggles to TCFL ship.
  • TCFL Ship map converted to TGM.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed latejoins not receiving job equipment / IDs.
  • Fixed saved Aurora spawnpoints being used for Horizon.
  • Fix loadout item duplication and irrelevant uniforms being equipped.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Re-modeled the kitchen once more, according to feedback from the community.
  • Reworked the framework on how the bar/kitchen signs work. You can now easily add new ones, together with desc and desc_fluff (thanks to Vrow and Myazaki).
  • Added the Event Horizon kitchen sign.

Mikomyazaki, WickedCybs updated:

  • Autodrobes and associated code have been removed from the game.
  • The Horizon and Aurora autodrobes were removed.
  • Buffs the emergency lockers that start at the lift room and cryo room on the Horizon. They each get one red toolbox with emergency gear and a crowbar.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Fixes a runtime related to observers and landmarks.
  • Changes the name and description of portable generators to describe their function better.
  • Buffs portable generators a bit so that they are actually usable for powering things, like shuttles.
  • Replaces the phoron-driven portable generator variant with a graphite-powered one, since phoron is supposed to be scarce.
  • Adds light to portable generators when they are active, per their fuel's "colour".
  • Adds graphite. It is made from compressing coal at a mining refinery. For now, it is only used in portable generators.
  • The crew manifest now distinguishes between service and civilian.
  • The job ban menu now uses standardized colours.
  • Fixes AI, stationbounds, and off-duty crew members being unselectable as SCC.

Vrow updated:

  • Deleted old borghypo sprite
  • Cleaned and tweaked the old borghypo into something cleaner with visible volume number displayed. The Lazarus Injector has received a completely new and unique sprite as well, in-hands included.
  • Cyborg Medical Synthesizers inject twice as fast as normal hyposprays, and also make the hypo hissing sound when injecting people. Added Coagzolug for Rescue modules.
  • Added missing in-hands for autoinhalers, and fixed using autoinhalers/autoinjectors not automatically update the in-hand icon when used.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added attachable versions of some of the new taj cloaks. They can't raise their hoods or have an internal storage as a consequence.
  • The new fancy cloak that was added was renamed to 'black fancy cloak' in the loadout, as it was sharing a name with an existing cloak already.
  • The aysmmetrical cloak was remamed to 'royalist cloak' as it had a New Kingdom symbol on its back.
  • Adds a second landing zone and adjusts the area of the Grand Romanovich hangar a bit. You can land one big shuttle and one small shuttle there now.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Added portable air scrubbers and fuel tanks in Engineering and the Primary Tool Storage.

05 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Space Bar Patrons now start with 500 credits.
  • Space Bar Jukebox now starts anchored.

04 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Replaces armory camera monitor in Warden's Office with a security newscaster, to allow the Warden to utilise newscaster options such as wanted notices.
  • Legion Barrier and mag lock should now be able to be used by TCFL Ghost Role.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Fixes recoloring of the mantle sprite.

03 May 2022

Ben10083 updated:

  • Brig Cell 4 interior blast door now properly opens.

Leudoberct updated:

  • Alters the thruster nacelles to no longer pump cold phoron at roundstart, and predisposes the digital valves towards mixing.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Added zi'pluax mantle and prescient republic of the qar wetsuit to Skrell loadout.
  • Adds missing sprites when some Skrell items were equipped on ears.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Remaps the mech bay.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Some walls in the maintenance behind the crew armoury were mapped inside of windows, so those were removed and replaced with emergency shutters as they had none. The passage also had a missing air alarm mapped in.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Mining robots can now upgrade their Kinetic Accelerators again. May also fix other gripper interactions with held robot items (e.g. Custodial Module bucket).

mikomyazaki2 updated:

  • Nymphs that grow into full gestalts should now always have a visible chest icon.

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed some Tajara loadout items not having the proper sprites.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Sol voidsuit and hardsuits have lore like the other suits.
  • Generic softsuits can now carry large air tanks.
  • New sprite for the generic softsuit.

Happy_Fox updated:

  • Adds a new bluespace turf sprite.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fix runtime errors related to bad loot crate spawns / old mapped-in crates.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Added variations to Skrell algae loadout items for longer headtails.
  • Made Skrell headtail cloths recolourable instead of a set of fixed colours.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The Horizon's bubble shield has been removed.
  • Changed the position of an air alarm in the bar lounge that was in the position of a closing emergency shutter. That leads to odd behaviour with the alarm not being able to properly check room atmosphere.

01 May 2022

Alberyk, Ryverstyx updated:

  • Added some new items in the Tajaran loadout options, including jackets, shoes, and colorable uniforms.

Ben10083 updated:

  • Consulars and Representatives have had their allowances increased to allow them to spend more credits in pursuit of their superior's interests.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Adds a fallback specific heat value to Ambrosia Extract.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Examining things no longer forces you to look at them.
  • Added a toggle in the preferences tab to turn accents into text tags if your monitor is too high resolution.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Added the weishii robe to the skrell loadout. It is selectable by skrell & diona.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Remaps the deck 1 research E.V.A. and xenoarcheology areas and gives them some visual polish.
  • Moves the research substation on deck 1 to above xenoarcheology.
  • Adds a fire supplies closet to the auxiliary hangar.
  • Slightly tweaks the button and light switch sprites.
  • Adds service airlocks to the code.
  • The default airlock sprite is now plain metal.
  • You can now view extra descriptions directly in the chat.

Vrow updated:

  • Fixed being unable to fix rescued lungs surgically if they don't have any damage.
  • Fixed being unable to fix rescued mechanical lungs at all.
  • IV Drip no longer follows or crashes people with breath masks aren't adjacent to it. It instead retracts their breath mask without changing the wearer's location.
  • Rounded the IV Drip's tank pressure output when examined.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Expanded the western bar area. It's all been pushed one tile to the left so the bar could mirror its eastern portion. It should be more spacious now and ease navigation.
  • Due to the above, the Chaplain will need to ask for the shields to be lowered if they'd like to use their mass driver, as the expansion means shields will cover the firing path.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Adds empty handheld phoron tanks to the dispenser in mining. There is another dispenser like that in atmospherics storage!

Vrow updated:

  • Fixed some buckle checks not doing their thing properly in machines like Recharger Stations, Sleepers, Cryo Cells, etc.

  • Fixed Vaurcae brains being borg-able.

Vrow, KingOfThePing updated:

  • Removed old shaker sprite.
  • Added a new shaker that is more metallic, with additional detachable top and cap, as well as in-hands for them.
  • Added a unique new cyborg drink sythesizer sprite, with visible filling color so you can see what you have selected!
  • Added several shaking sounds for the shaker, removing the cap/top sounds, a big pour sound, and a new generic pouring sound.
  • You can now remove the new shaker's top, and also the cap that doubles as a mini cup!
  • The cyborg drink synthesizer now tells you what reagent you have just transferred to stuff.
  • Fixed being able to pour stuff into a capped vacuum flask.
  • Fixed cyborg synthesizer's inaccurate desc_info, and cleared the desc_fluff from them as well.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • You can place tape on doors again.
  • Tape can now cross lattices/gratings.
  • Maintenance door by the Investigator's Office no longer has a blast-door, to allow access to security if the lockdown is triggered and no one is available to lift it.
  • Removed telecomms logs printing feature until a better solution can be found for the lag it can cause.

Doxxmedearly updated:

Geeves, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added a new shorter tail type for Tajara.
  • Added a colorable tail cloth accessory for the standard Tajara tail.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Cut down on extraneous z-level generation for off-map shuttles.
  • Starlight module no longer attempts to generate lights on turfs that haven't initialized.
  • Sounds and messages via sensitive hearing were optimized to no longer rely on expensive recursive checks.
  • Visualnets no longer attempt to update their visibility chunks prior to game start.

  • Re-added the cook alt title for chefs.

  • Added an option to clear the Blood Pack's label.

  • Added a check to prevent the IVs from being knocked over if you're prone.
  • Increases the package wrap paper stack from 25 to 30.

  • Zeng-hu and Zavodskoi Xenobiologists now have the proper access instead of Scientist access.

xxxxyobdab updated:

  • Removed recipe: Espresso + Water = coffee. Reason: Americano already uses this mix.
  • Rich Coffee Plant to gather Rich Coffee Beans.
  • Grind Rich Coffee Beans for Dark Coffee Grounds.
  • Recipe:Dark Coffee Grounds + Water = Espresso
  • (Coffee Grounds + Water) From: makes Espresso. To: makes Coffee
  • Plants: Strawberry, Raspberry, Black Raspberry, Blue Raspberry
  • Strawberry, Raspberry, Black Raspberry, Blue Raspberry and Rich Coffee Seeds added to vending machines.
  • Produce: Strawberries, Raspberries, Black Raspberries, Blue Raspberries
  • Specific juices for: Glowberry, Deathberry, Dirtberry, Ylphaberry, Blueberry, Strawberry, Raspberry, Blue raspberry, Black raspberry
  • Syrup(3u simple syrup + 2u of listed juice) recipes for: Berry, Strawberry, Blueberry, Poisonberry, Deathberry, Glowberry, Dirtberry, Ylphaberry, Raspberry, Black Raspberry, Blue Raspberry

18 April 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • It is no longer possible to late spawn in the casino.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Borgs and drones can now actually change their cable color.
  • Random event spawns (Such as rats and crates) should now only spawn on the inside of the Horizon.
  • Added the ability to anchor and unanchor smartfridges, which includes the SmartHeater, drink showcase, drying racks, seed storage, and chemistry fridges. Find an engineer with a wrench to do it. You cannot use it while it isn't anchored!
  • In atmos, slightly remapped the area near the mix tank, to separate the Engine to Mix from the other parts of the mix line, since only the former should be going through the radiator loop.
  • Removed the digital valves in atmos near the canister ports. Also added a manual valve to the Hydrogen tank pipeline.
  • Removed some duplicated pipes in atmos.
  • The pump that supplies air to the station now begins the round turned on. Seems important.
  • Large gas tank monitors should no longer report the gas temperature as a percentage.
  • Made the gas room of the starboard-side thrusters airless, to match the port side.
  • Updated the deep ore scanner's name to... deep ore scanner, in order to prevent confusion with other ore detectors.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Added a new hideout exoplanet ruin, available to explore.
  • Fixed ruin site selection + budgeting.
  • Detached shuttles should now be able to return to their motherships.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Removed mentions of NanoTrasen and the Aurora from the holowarrant projector, Security rejoices.

Llywelwyn updated:

  • Fixes date when using 'save chat log'. Now gives the correct month and date.

SleepyGemmy updated:

  • Adds disposals units and coat racks to security.
  • Adds O2 lockers around the ship on deck 2 and 3.
  • Added a cigarette machine outside the deck 3 lounge.
  • Made the deck 3 rafters more accessible and added a shortcut.
  • Added emergency shutters and glass airlocks to the deck 3 port and starboard docks to lower chance of shipwide depressurization.
  • Added a ATM outside the XO's office.
  • Added a new bathroom under the living quarters lift room. Added a cyborg recharger to the medical bathroom and new bathroom.
