Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Ghosts can no longer rename monkeys or their equivalents.

Geeves updated:

  • Megaphones now work by turning them on and having them in either of your hands when speaking normally. They increase the size of your speech and sets the speaking verb to broadcasts.
  • Megaphones can no longer be emagged.
  • Exosuit megaspeakers now change your speech verb to broadcasts and gives any Tajara listening intently ear pain.
  • Speaking using an exosuit megaspeaker or a megaphone will now increase the overhead chat message size.

ImmortalRedshirt updated:

  • Adds a second spawnpoint in the machinist's shop, next to the console.

KingOfThePing updated:

  • Fixed the autocompressor's spelling.
  • Added a Saline Plus option to blood pack labeling.
  • Floating text is now actually overhead again.
  • Fixed a newspaper spelling artifact and some wording on the bridge crew cap.
  • Remodeled the kitchen for better workflow and use of space.
  • Added the missing holosign switched in both ORs.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The stealth hardsuit and its subtypes no longer make walking sounds.
  • You can now actually put cigarette filters on rolled cigarettes.
  • Cigarette filters are no longer paper.
  • You can now put a filter on a rolled cigarette by clicking it with the cigarette, instead of having to put the box down, take out a filter and then click the cigarette with the filter.
  • Reflavoured the Gen. Eric cigarette paper to the Callistean Classic cigarette paper.
  • Added some visible messages to cigarette rolling.

Omicega updated:

  • Allows suit coolers to be plugged into voidsuits just like oxygen tanks. Adds an action button for them too, just like magboots.

12 April 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the Orion Express having the wrong description in game.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed lobby ready names causing errors if no high-priority role was selected, or if assistant was enabled.

RyverStyx updated:

  • Fixed broken sprites so they line up with the body in the intended ways.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Shuttles should now always properly simulate their atmospheres when landing on a space that has the same turf types as itself. (e.g. Intrepid airlock turfs are the same as the hangar turfs resulting in air not moving properly into the shuttle)

11 April 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the Tajaran title screen having a misplaced black bar.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed a runtime to do with job selection. You can now only select a job after both the job controller and the record controller have been initialized.
  • Fixed the Orion Shuttle being unable to depart the Orion Ship after it has moved from its starting location. As a note for future mappers: if you have a ship with a hangar for a small ship, the landmark of the hangar MUST have the MOVABLE_FLAG_EFFECTMOVE movable_flag set.
  • Colored light tubes don't randomize their color anymore.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • AI can now use the sensors console fully.
  • Operations mailing room no longer launches the rubbish off of the conveyor belt.
  • Port Propulsion now has an additional valve to toggle that will send cold phoron to the starboard thruster if you wish to operate with cold propellant. Note that this mode will result in less thrust and it is preferable to use the burn chambers!
  • D1 Operations areas now have some additional holopads.
  • CE and Journalist Officers are now better lit.

10 April 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed some blastdoor having no control buttons.
  • Emitters sound should no longer be heard at the AI core.
  • Fixes the dionae species having the incorrect species job species restriction.
  • Fixes the operations manager not being whitelisted.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Security Officers, Investigators and Security Cadets can now submit warrants for approval using the warrant program. They cannot authorize warrants or edit authorized warrants.
  • Investigators now have a 'Case Closed' stamp in their lockers.
  • The Telecomms Server Monitor can now print channel logs.

09 April 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added casual t-shirts and dress shirts for Skrell under their loadout. Includes reef shirts and hawaiian shirts in Silversun style.

SleepyGem updated:

  • Zo'ra Soda effects are now similar to coffee, with a tiny bit more caffeine.
  • Standardizes the Zo'ra Soda energy drinks to 30 units.
  • The descriptions of the cans were rewritten slightly to be more interesting to read.
  • Adds the C'thur Rockin' Raspberry to the Zo'ra Soda vending machine.
  • The V'krexi Amino Acid Mixture chemical has been removed.
  • And instead the effects have been merged with the Zo'ra Soda energy drink reagents.
  • Removed negative effects from Zo'ra Soda, except Drone Fuel, so it's actually drinkable in a casual manner.
  • High Octane Zorane Might is now a "contraband" item.
  • Vaurcae are immune to the overdose side effects of Zo'ra Soda energy drinks.

kermit updated:

  • Fixed neurotoxic chemicals doing no damage. Neurotoxic chemicals will prevent Alkysine from working unless Dylovene is also in the system.
  • All neurotoxic chemicals have had their numbers tweaked to ensure they don't nuke the brain.
  • Tweaked effects and added flavour messages for many, if not all, the recreational drugs. Affected drugs include Psilocybin, Raskara Dust, Krok Juice, Nightlife, Space Drugs (now Mercury Monolithium Sucrose & Ambrosia Extract) Mortaphenyl, Oxycomorphine, Hyperzine, Stimm, Mindbreaker Toxin, and Wulumunusha.
  • Split Space Drugs into Mercury Monolithium Sucrose and Ambrosia Extract. MMS remains the chemical precursor for various mental reagents; Ambrosia Extract is a lite version of MMS found in Ambrosia.
  • Added another recreational drug: Joy (1 part Neurapan, 2 parts Oxycomorphine). Also available on the Traitor Uplink in the Random Toxin Vial.
  • Ammonia/fertilisers can be tossed onto people to deal minor burn damage. A cheap tool for traitors or an accident waiting to happen in Hydroponics.
  • Space Cleaner and Sterilisine now have toxic properties if ingested in large doses. Another cheap tool for traitors. Accidentally spraying someone (even multiple times) isn't going to hurt them, don't worry.
  • Added Xu'xi Gas, a recreational drug hailing from Qerr'Malic that must be inhaled. It produces a mild high similar to Wulumunusha and is known to make users susceptible to persuasion. Recipe: 2 parts Dexalin, 2 parts Mercury Monolithium Sucrose, 1 part Truth Serum (reagents heated to 137'C).
  • Added Co'qnixq Wuxi, a skrell nootropic/'smart drug' which enhances cognitive function & memory recollection/gain. It increases psionic stamina by 25% while metabolising. Recipe: 1 part Wulumunusha, 1 part Synaptizine, 1 part Emoxanyl.
  • Tweaked glass bottle/beaker examine code to show whether the reagent is a gas/liquid/solid (before it only showed solids).
  • Wall Nano-Meds now also have dylovene autoinjectors alongside the inaprovaline autoinjectors.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Fixes a bug where toxins (e.g. from giant spiders) would never do damage because they couldn't beat your liver's natural healing rate. Toxins now suppress your liver's natural healing and can become dangerous if you don't deal with the poison within several minutes.
  • Blast door buttons will synchronise state of the blast doors they control when pressed.

04 April 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • Autofire now continues spraying even if you hold your mouse down on one tile.
  • Fixed a bug where unwielding and rewielding a gun may result in a slower fire delay.
  • Added a current date field to the Stats menu.

TheGreyWolf, mikomyazaki updated:

  • Added shield diffusers. They prevent shielding on adjacent turfs, allowing e.g. the supermatter to be ejected while shielding is online.
  • The bubble shield generator now has the option for multi-z shields.
  • Changed what kind of turfs hull shields make shields on. They should no longer make shields within the station/ship.

30 March 2022

Aticius updated:

  • Unathi now have two new hairstyles; A droopy dorsal frill for the edgelords and a pair of regal frills for the ostentatious.
  • Unathi can now select hair gradients. But only for their hair, not their facial hair.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Clicking a turf no longer has a face direction cooldown, meaning that you'll always face the turf you click.
  • Direction lock no longer prevents facing a different direction if your direction is changed, as an example by clicking or using control and arrow keys.
  • RIGs now have a special footstep sound ported from Hestia.

Vrow updated:

  • Needles aren't able to lung rescue Vaurca.
  • Fixed Robotic Limbs not properly screwing the hatch closed
  • Fixed Robotic Limbs saying they're bleeding if they get damaged when the hatch is unscrewed.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Research module borgs now have a multitool to enable them to connect machines together.

21 March 2022

Forester40 updated:

  • The right-facing worn sprite for the boatsman hat has been moved one pixel to the right.

Vrow updated:

  • Fixes the IV drip overwriting Vaurca breath mask types.
  • Made the mask you place over patients with the IV mask non-adjustable to prevent strange behavior

19 March 2022

SleepyGem updated:

  • You no longer require gloves to remove light bulbs- and tubes. LED is finally here. Rejoice!

Vrow updated:

  • Deleted old IV sprites.
  • Ported Eris's medical stand sprites and intensively edited them to fit Aurora, with additional tank gauge, screen displays, and a unique tipping over animation.
  • IV drips are now buildable and upgradable! Science can print their circuitboards and be pestered for that sweet, sweet upgrade.
  • Ported Eris's medical stand gas tank functionality and hammered it until it fit Aurora, with a unique Emergency Positive Pressure system in case the patient can't breathe.
  • You can knock IV stands over, and you can also trip on them! Plus it'll bring down whoever is wearing the IV's mask!
  • You can choose which part of a body the IV needle will go into, which is subjected to attaching delays and armor checks unless the IV is upgraded.
  • Organized toggables into Normal Click, removables into Alt Click, and injecting IV/securing mask into Drag and Drop Radial Menus.
  • Organized the iv_drip.dm code.
  • Moved defines in the .../tanks/tanks.dm to .../__defines/misc.dm

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Large amounts of blood splatters should impact server performance significantly less.
  • Simple mobs now produce fewer blood splatters each time they are hit.

18 March 2022

Arrow768 updated:

  • Changed the prompt during ccia interviews to ask if there were antag or ooc issues.

17 March 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed being unable to select DPRA party pins.

16 March 2022

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Can now toggle atmospherics pumps & filters with AltClick.
  • RCON SMES control now includes a button to max SMES input/output without having to type in the number.
  • Removes the Clown and Mime PDA presets from the PDA preset types list.

15 March 2022

Vrow updated:

  • Changed the Fractal Reactor message to an admin log instead a to_world message.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Fixed another issue with grippers not inserting their items into objects e.g. chem dispensers.
  • Grippers will now properly remove items they are holding if that item should have been dropped / used up / otherwise deleted.

13 March 2022

Geeves updated:

  • Technomancer Cores can now be disguised like other chameleon gear. Getting EMPd will reset it to default.

SierraKomodo updated:

  • Deaf mobs no longer see 'You hear something about' messages while asleep.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Autodrobe no longer tries to poison Vaurca by putting their mandible garments into their bag when the rest of their gear spawns, instead the mandible garment stays on their face.
  • Maintenance drones and subtypes will properly generate their eye icon when spawning.

12 March 2022

Aticius updated:

  • Unathi may now select most augments from the loadout.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Added new station bounced radio sprites, as well as some department specific ones.
  • Added three station bounced radios to telescience.
  • Removed the virology uplink phone from medical reception.

Vrow updated:

  • Fixed Medical Scan paper not having the small puncture wound to the lungs if they've been rescued.
  • Fixed missing descriptions for the bone gel, FixOVein, and bone setter.
  • Adjusted descriptions for the bone saw, scalpel, surgical drill, cautery, hemostat, and retractor to be less non-sensical.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Blast doors will reopen when power is restored, if they were open before losing power.
  • Removed the Exodus map.

06 March 2022

Alberyk, Canon35 updated:

  • Added new Tajaran related accessory and beret options to the custom loadout.

Vrow updated:

  • Fixed Invisible Blood Bags and Blood Bags not displaying their internal contents right.

05 March 2022

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Robots that go to cryo will now properly have their cameras removed from the camera network list.

04 March 2022

SleepyGem updated:

  • Removes a random stool stuck in a wall in the telecommunications lounge toilet.

Stryker updated:

  • Inspector 404 and generic comic books can now be selected in the loadout.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Slot machines now accept credits! Use the multitool to switch between coin mode and credit mode.
  • Slot machines also have sound! Be sure to toggle Arcade SFX to hear it. Also, makes it 87% more addictive.
  • Adds new sprites for slot machines.
  • Resprites beakers, syringes, and chemistry bottles. And the medicine cup and melted things.
  • Nerfs syringe stabbing.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • The VV Extended List Viewer now has the same rights requirement as View Variables.

03 March 2022

SleepyGem updated:

  • Removes leftover internal affairs agent code, since the job doesn't exist anymore.

02 March 2022

Alberyk updated:

  • Added the Free Tajaran Council temporary citizenship as an option in the character setup.

Geeves updated:

  • Unathi now have a take 10% less radiation damage.
  • Unathi can now swallow small items by targeting their mouth and clicking themselves.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) & listerla updated:

  • Adds new sounds for airlocks and firedoors.

01 March 2022

Aticius updated:

  • Synthflesh can now be made at the Biogenerator.
  • Biomeat has been rebranded as Meat Substitute and is no longer implied to be biohazardous.

BLUNTFORCE420 updated:

  • Resprited and rewrote the Scout Rifle to be a variant of the existing bullpup carbine. Also fixed the icon states so the empty rifle works properly.
  • Gave the scout rifle automatic magazine ejection on empty, like the bullpup carbine.

Geeves updated:

  • AI can now lock their hologram's facing direction with the face-direction macro.
  • AI can now change their hologram's facing direction with the northface,southface,eastface,westface macros.
  • AI clicking on people's names to track them will no longer turn the link purple.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Most common melee simple mobs have been given armor penetration, so they should actually have teeth now.
  • Melee simple mobs have also been given edge or sharp damage flags, so bleeding should be more common, in addition to torn tendons.
  • Hivebot beams have been buffed to account for new armor.
  • Cultist rune limit raised to 40 from 25. Please remember that rune limit is also affected by the current amount of cultists, so with 8 cultists the effective limit is 48.
  • There can now only be up to 10 wall runes at once.

SleepyGem updated:

  • Welding a emergency shutter now takes 2 seconds, to be in line with airlocks.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Injecting reagent containers with a syringe now sends a warning to those nearby. You'll need to be sneakier with your poisoning now!

Vrow updated:

  • Tweaked various smoking item icons to fit Tajara and Unathi better.
  • Tweaked the ecigs item icons as well, and organized the ecigs.dmi
  • Fixed missing bone pipe sprites for Tajara and Unathi.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds more unique sounds to skrell falling over, and skrell walking barefoot. Also, adds unique pain messages for Skrell.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Adds a Syndicate Lunchbox to the uplink, so the mercs don't go hungry.

28 February 2022

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Fixed autoinhalers with reagents spawning unsecured
  • The holomenu can now scan a sheet of paper and display its contents.
  • Fixed stripping mobs with an active item in your hand failing.
  • Stripping an item off a mob now tries to put it in your hands first.
  • Allows you to Alt Click on a mob when you have a medHUD to set their triage tag.
  • Allows you to Alt Click IVs to set their transfer rate.

mikomyazaki2 updated:

  • Maintenance drones can now choose to swap their hat when clicking on a hat while wearing one, instead of receiving an error message about already wearing a hat.

  • Fixes a typo in Ka'Akaix'Pax C'thur's custom item's description.
  • Vacuum flask typo fixed.
  • Silversun shirt selection in the loadout no longer defaults to the description of the first shirt.

SleepyGem updated:

  • Hro'zamal Reagent typo fixed.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Vending machines will now always show the correct icon for their product.

25 February 2022

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed some name sanitization issues when picking a ghostspawner or becoming an antagonist, apostrophes will now work correctly.
  • Quickees Plastic Surgeon or changer machines will now update your ID as well.

Vrow updated:

  • The Operating Console now automatically ejects the scan if the patient isn't on the table.
  • Patched some oversights which would lead to some bugs.
  • Minor shuffling of the operating console code and adding a % to be Blood Oxygenation.

Vrow, Granodd updated:

  • Added various bread-related recipes! Toast, Garlic Bread, Eggs in the basket, Peanut Butter Toast, PBJ Sandwich, and Reuben Sandwich!
  • Added Sauerkraut, Mayonnaise, and Roasted Peanuts! You can also make Peanut Oil and Peanut Butter!
  • You can also put toast in your mask slot for the funsies.
  • Added several more sprites for the new recipes and unique condiment bottle sprites for Mayonnaise, Cherry Jelly, Peanut Butter, Ground Roasted Peanuts, and Peanut Oil.
  • Ports the Garlic Bread sprite from tgstation.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Blast doors without power will only open when power is restored if they were originally open.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Red and blue mapped in lights no longer override their color with a random one.

  • You can now remove ID cards from wallets with AltClick. This only works for human mobs, and only if you're holding or wearing the wallet.

  • Replaces coloured shorts image that was accidentally removed.

19 February 2022

The Stryker, Kyres1, The Lancer updated:

  • Added earphones to the loadout in the loadout Earwear tab.
  • Added Konyanger jackets (blue, orange, and red with variants) and a Konyanger overcoat to the loadout suits and overwear tab.
  • Added a male hanbok to the hanbok selection and a Konyanger dress to the uniform tab.
  • Adds a gat to the loadout hat tab.
  • Added Assunzione robes to the loadout Religion tab.
  • Added comic books and manga to the loadout general tab.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • The hull shield generator now also create shields around the rock walls found on the asteroid to guarantee station safety.
  • Hoodies and other suits with hoods can now be properly opened and closed again.

Vrow updated:

  • You can now shove in IPCs via grabs or drag and drop into the rechargers.
  • Shoving them in via grabs/drag and drop doesn't take as long as stationbounds, but it does take around 5 seconds.
  • Autoinhaler sprites tweaked and subtly easier to click.
  • Inhaler sprites refreshened and sligthyly larger and subtly easier to click.
  • Autoinhalers that spawn with reagents can have their labels removed properly
  • Inhaler Cartridge sprites revamped with the ability to show how much stuff there is inside of them, like hyposprays!
  • Fixed autoinhalers letting you inject people without being twisted closed.
  • Fixed inhalers not properly making the sound or giving adminlogs.
  • Fixed stationbounds's Medical Grippers being unable to hold inhaler cartridges.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Can now throw objects over railings.
  • ID card photos will now face the correct directions instead of both being of the direction your character was facing when your ID card spawned.

18 February 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ported Baystation's improvements to the maploader.
  • Ported Baystation's system for Overmap away sites and exoplanet ruin generation.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Added colourable shorts to the loadout.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Changed how hoods works slightly. Shouldn't be any player-facing changes.

Vrow updated:

  • Lung rescue properly clears the built up OxyLoss (but doesn't prevent it from increasing).
  • Decreased pain caused by lung rescue from 75 to 50.
  • Added a spam prevention to the syringes.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Being assigned a special role now clears 'role_alt_title', which could lead to you getting an ID with your previous job on it when spawning as an antagonist.
  • Atmospherics consoles linked to injector outlets (e.g. Supermatter coolant control console) will no longer require you to click 'Search for input port' the first time you open it in a round, they will instead start with their mapped injector already linked properly.
  • Crew Arrival Announcement/Records will now include a faction tag for valid factions, so your crew manifest listing can match everyone else's.
  • The Agent ID can now have a faction name set.
  • It is now possible to safely heat nitroglycerin without explosions. Use a large volume and heat it in small increments.
  • Chem heaters now have a 'slow mode' option that will heat your chemical in very small steps.
  • Fixes pressure regulators not creating the right underlays when connecting to universal adapters in some cases.

17 February 2022

Geeves updated:

  • Bulwarks now move faster, a bit slower than their other vaurca brethren. In exchange, their stamina has been halved.

SierraKomodo updated:

  • Replaced the windows between the kitchen and bar counter areas with walls, to reduce the spam of conversational text on both sides.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Fixed the Zeng-Hu Responder Coat having the wrong description.

Vrow updated:

  • Fixes the operating table's neural suppressors occasionally not working.
  • Added a set transfer amount AltClick function for Hyposprays and Syringes.
  • Syringes also have a set transfer amount of 10u. Finally the 1, 2, 5, 10, 15 train is complete.

  • Updates the old message nymphs got one growing up into a full gestalt

  • Pointing arrows should now delete themselves properly.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed a bug where faction overrides caused certain occupations to runtime when creating their outfits.

Omicega updated:

  • Added the new language Elyran Standard, selectable by humans and IPCs. Its language key is ,4.
  • Moves the Sign Language language key to ,s from ,4.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Fingerprint & fiber reports now show all source locations, even when combined and doors will have the door's name attached.
  • Added the ability to rename fingerprint cards & fiber bags.
  • Changed the layout of the various forensic machine reports.
  • Each report from the forensic machines are now numbered per evidence type (fiber, fingerprint, GSR, DNA) rather than combined amount of reports.
  • Gunshot residue now shows all residue on something rather than only the most recent.

16 January 2022

Omicega updated:

  • Removed Elyran citizenship and accent choices from Skrell.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Business cards no longer change color when copied in a photocopier.
  • Photocopiers toner now gets used correctly.
  • The sinta hood now fits in the ear slot.
  • The vial box in the forensic lab can now be locked by swiping an id card with forensic access.
  • Added a syringe and vial to autopsy trays.
  • Paper scanners now fit in filing cabinets.
  • The forensic lab and investigations office now have luminol refillers.
  • Fixes vial box sprites.
  • The investigation lab ringers now clearly indicates the call comes from there when a pda is linked.
  • Autopsy now has a second bodybag box.
  • Re-arranged some equipment in the forensic lab and added a closet.
  • The investigations office now has a button to open the door.
  • Replaced one of the three no smoking signs in the security reception with a notice board.
  • The forensic lab doors now permits anyone to leave regardless of access.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Updates sprites for APCs, SMES, Battery racks, Breaker boxes, Power cells and their chargers.

listerla updated:

  • Punk Shave, Half-Shaved Bun is no longer one pixel too low on the right facing sprite.
  • Added left and right arm heart tattoos. Credit for sprite goes to KasparoVy.
  • Fixed Skrell stomach marking, removed nonexistent heart tattoo marking.
  • Warding sphere sheath animation no longer makes the entire sprite relocate downwards.
  • Dominian citizenship selection blurb now uses far more recent lore, rather than a several year old outdated one.

12 January 2022

Dekser updated:

  • Slightly altered the Unathi brain sprite.
  • Removed the Skrells appendix for the simple reason that Skrell and Humans evolved separately and shouldn't share an exact same useless organ.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Meteors will no longer ignore shields.

09 January 2022

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Tendon repair surgery now works again.

Geeves, RyverStyx updated:

  • Added some skrell body markings, as well as a skrell hair fade.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Fixes the unathi mantle not appearing correctly in several places.
  • The Th'akhist head wrappings now properly shows on unathi again.
  • Stasis bags can now be properly deployed on adjacent turfs without becoming bodybags.
  • Fixes overlays not showing properly on glass business cards.

03 January 2022

Geeves updated:

  • Speaking while in crit will no longer recursively whisper your wails.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Removes christmas themed decorations from the map.

01 January 2022

MattAtlas updated:

  • The evacuation shuttle button now actually calls an evac shuttle.
  • Shuttles leaving the station now report the correct time to leave.
  • Added the evacuation controller to the debug controller verb.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes chair buckle overlays being uncolored.

27 December 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Whispering has now been tied into saycode, meaning things like accents should appear as normal.
  • All living mobs can now whisper, pAI, borgs, the AI, etc.

26 December 2021

Dekser updated:

  • Added new Unathi hissing sound effects.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • When using the psi mindread ability, the target now gets informed they only have 25 seconds to respond.
  • Added a new waistcoat to the loadout. It has been combined with the old one under acccesories into a selection.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Coatracks are now able to support every concievable toggleable coat, poncho and hat. Except helmets, armor and rigsuits, obviously.
  • Coatracks have a shiny new sprite.
  • You can now paint padded chairs, beds, and stools using the paint gun.
  • Fixes colored materials coloring the stack number weirdly.

23 December 2021

TheGreyWOlf updated:

  • Skrell psi ping can now detect simplemobs.

22 December 2021

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Forensic slides now deposit to the inactive hand if it is free.
  • The forensic fiber & fingerprint kits will now only activate things if clicked on with help intent. Otherwise it will only collect fibers/prints.
  • Several bits of forensic equipment now have additional text to explain how to use them, when examined.
  • Swabs will now take GSR tests from the gloves if the person it is used on is wearing any, and only if the gloves have any residue left on them.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Wheelchairs can be picked up again. For real this time.
  • Adds new show-off function to business cards.
  • Updates sprites for origami swans and business card related stuff.

19 December 2021

Desven updated:

  • QM can now choose Cargo shorts.

Geeves updated:

  • Half-wall Windows, or windows built into window frames, will now blend and smooth into walls.
  • Dragging two people at once with a grab will no longer awkwardly move them in the direction you're going.
  • Bulwarks can now comfortably hold grabs on two people at once, as well as fireman carrying both.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Fixed UI state checks for few UIs

SpaceBaa updated:

  • Added some new tips.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Vomitting now makes people slightly hungrier and they don't need to have eaten recently to vomit instead of dry heave.
  • Unathi now take 10 seconds to break out of handcuffs instead of 5.
  • Updated the eridani, heph, idris, zavod, zeng-hu and small nanotrasen paperwork logos.
  • Folders can now be renamed while standing next to them rather than having to carry them.
  • Added hairnets. They can be found in the loadout under hats and headwear and in the chef's closet.
  • People can now be properly moved in all moveable chairs again.
  • Only office chairs, wheelchairs & subtypes can now be propelled using a fire extinguisher.
  • Beds and chairs can now be properly dismantled again.
  • Eridani no longer have consulars, as they were sol consulars.
  • All sofas in the security break room are now red sofas.
  • Cortical Borer naming now has a randomised number at the end to help identify them.
  • Small enough mobs can now be properly put into glass jars.
  • Fixes some problems when checking the security record of someone using the security hud.
  • Cult communication rune now properly says who the sender is.
  • Jumping over railings will no longer move people into solid objects.
  • Fixed a set of reversed checks regarding when sensitive hearing would give halloss.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes redeployed chairs not spawning with the correct materials.
  • Does a second pass on labcoat sprites. Non-contractor labcoat users rejoyce.

08 December 2021

Arrow768 updated:

  • Adds a lock to conveyors so they only create max one timer each.

07 December 2021

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds a short delay for dismantling chairs to prevent accidental deconstruction.
  • Fixes some density problems with wheelchairs and office chairs.

  • Readded the telecomms lounge, it can be found north of the telecomms control area.

Lly2 updated:

  • Nralakk projector typo fixed.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes picking up wheelchairs.

02 December 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Teleporters from antag bases and admin areas can now reach the station, but the station cannot reach back to those areas.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Neck bandannas now fit in both the mask slot and on suits/uniforms as accessories, in addition to the ears. They will need to be re-selected in the loadout under accessories.
  • Food and fruits will no longer show a piece of paper indicating their original name when renamed.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Removed paint from backpressure surge events.
  • Refactors stools and chair code to make use of material code.
  • You can now pick up unpadded chairs (and hit people with them). Note that stools are now also click and drag to pick up.

01 December 2021

Alberyk updated:

  • Briefcases with captain gear no longer shows up in the warehouse loot.

Geeves updated:

  • Replaced the high priority phoron canister bounty with the ability to export a phoron canister with more than 2000 moles for 2000 credits.
  • Added a phoron scarcity bounty, assembled solar panels. Solar panels must be build by wrenching the assemblies, then adding glass to them.
  • Phoron scarcity bounties now only have a 60% chance of occuring a round. Otherwise, a random bounty will be made high priority.
  • Printed bounty sheets now gets the fluff description too.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Fixed paper bags sometimes becoming invisible.
  • You can now do toasts! Hold a glass (including normal drinking ones, most special bar glasses and coffee cups), target the hands and click on another person also hoding a glass while on help intent.
  • The holomenu given to chefs and bartenders can now be read from any distance when examined.
  • The uplink now offers an ion rifle for 5 TC.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added two more hair variations to the Tajara Swoop. Swoop bangs and alt.
  • Updates the side sprites of the shoulderlength and sideparted Taj hairs.

30 November 2021

Alberyk, Canon35 updated:

  • Added two new Tajaran accents: Harr'nrri and Zarr'jiri Siik'maas.

27 November 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Binary channels now work again.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • The adhomian divination cards deck now contains the correct set of cards.
  • Fixes the misplaced harm intent lights on the service version of the 'venus drone' sprite.
  • Fixes the vaurca vending machine looking weird when the panel is opened.
  • Red Nightshade berserk state now works again.
  • Red Nightshade is no longer incredible lethal. It now induces heart damage instead.

24 November 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Added a Powered Crossbow bounty. Supporting this bounty will help our friends on Mictlan achieve peace once more.

21 November 2021

Desven updated:

  • Lowered the amount of phoron sheets required for the bounty.

Geeve updated:

  • Thermal drill shots now do 2 damage each, up from 1.
  • Thermal drills on autofire can no longer be fired one-handed.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now clearly unset whatever the teleporter station is locked on to, turning off the telepad.
  • The teleportation station hub will now show you its station ID when you examine it.
  • Teleportation stations will now go offline and prevent hand-teles from locking on to them when they're depowered.
  • Teleportation stations now check whether the hand-tele and beacon is on a Z-level connected to it before locking on.
  • Hand-teles can now only support two active portals before having to recharge, making it more difficult to hop around endlessly.
  • Toggling whether headgear blocks hair has been moved from helmets to root level headgear, meaning any headwear can be made to toggle hair or not. Additionally, loadout headgear can now be set to block hair or not, so you don't have to do it each round.
  • Toggling headgear's hair coverage now instantly updates your hair icon.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Urns can now contain ashes again.
  • Bodybags can now be placed adjacent to the user.
  • Rollerbeds now display a message when bodybags are buckled to them.

TheGreywolf updated:

  • Adds an extended description to the hoist, idris ordering terminal and hardsuit module press to help explain how to use them.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • The sun sister veil now shows up properly on tajara.

  • You can detach nymph hands and feet.

Geeves updated:

  • Hammers can now properly repair airlocks.

09 November 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Mapped some additional items into the telecomms east area, notably: relay and hub circuitboards, additional stock parts for them, some cable coil, as well as four tubes of nanopaste to repair the machines.
  • Nanopaste has been tweaked to repair half of a telecomms machines health per use. With 24 machines, a fully damaged telecomms will take 5 tubes of nanopaste to repair the array.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Ghosts can no longer interact with the shield generator unless they're staff.

Desven, Xev updated:

  • Cooking recipes and fruits' kitchen tags are now unit-tested to prevent similar bugs with dyn pozole and bluespace tomato soup from happening again.

07 November 2021

Desven updated:

  • Fixed the examine text for Vaurca Bulwark horns.

Geeves updated:

  • Drones now belong to a Matrix, a collective of drones headed by a Matriarch. A matriarch can select upgrades for the drones within its matrix. After being selected, the upgrades can be acquired by charging to full at a recharge station.
  • Drone Talk has been renamed to Matrix Weave. Only drones in the same Matrix can hear eachother on the Weave. Local transmissions unaffected.
  • Matriarch drone names now appear nicer on the Matrix Weave.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Vaurca head & chest no longer needs to be sawed through in surgery.
  • Vaurca are no longer permanently blind when flashed. It can be fixed through surgery or by applying oculine.

arrow768 updated:

  • The research shuttle console can be deconstructed again.

Geeves updated:

  • Pipeguns now take a makeshift 5.56mm magazine, crafted with steel sheets under the Steel Weaponry tab. It holds 7 rounds.
  • Pipeguns can now be held on the suit storage slot regardless of what's in your suit slot.
  • Pipeguns can now fire three guaranteed shots before the chance of jamming sets in, per clean.
  • Cleaned up some funkiness with the jam mechanics, should feel nicer now.
  • Middle Mouse Clicking a storage item on your person or adjacent to you will now open it.

Desven updated:

Geeves updated:

  • Added another variant of sneakers to the recolorable shoe selection, the tip of the shoes stays white.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • The robotics lab door leading to the garage can now be opened by anyone from within the lab. It still has access requirement from the garage/hallway side.

15 October 2021

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Added a Visegradi accent.
  • Added a Visegradi passcard.
  • Refluffed the wine and gin bottles.

Desven updated:

  • Resprited the shield generators and capacitors.
  • Fixed bite sizes for k'ois food.
  • Added more clothes for the Bulwark.
  • Fixed some sprite errors with flannels and labcoats for the Bulwark.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Added hearing sensitivity. Species with hearing sensitivity (atm only tajara) will risk taking more hearing based damage from various sources including flashbangs. They also get a special ability to listen in which lets them hear various machinery being activated around them even if they can't see it, and to get an extra range at which explosions can be heard to help determine the distance to them.
  • Medical can now create inacusiate by mixing dylovene, carbon and sulfur. This medicine will help heal any hearing based damage when injected, but is very painful if overdosing by 10u or more.
  • Explosions now more accurately tells the direction in chat.
  • Megaphones now properly do audible messages rather than vision based ones.

TheGreyWolf & Ryverstyx updated:

  • The axiori tail outline is now consistent with the body.

14 October 2021

Omicega updated:

  • Adds a Reinstated Dreg accent.
  • Resprites the Lunan accent.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Windoors can be clicked on with an empty hand again to make them stay open.
  • Skrell headtail equipment can now be worn again.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The rampant vending machine event now has the announcement say which type of vending machine was initially infected. Quick response will nip outbreaks in the bud before they spread everywhere.

13 October 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed various Bulwark bugs. They can no longer wear armor, their talk bubbles are no longer on their faces, their floating messages are centred, they are now properly bald, they now successfully pass isvaurca checks, their shoes no longer have a white dot, their vaurca clothes and hive cloak (one of them) have icons.
  • Rad immune species no longer get radstorm radiation side-effects.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • inoperable windoors can now be forced open with a crowbar.
  • Fixes skrell loadout for axiori.
  • The Axiori eye body marking is now properly restricted to only non-axiori skrell and has the correct sprite.
  • Skrell and Axiori will now show up when examined as 'Xiialt Skrell' and 'Axiori Skrell' respectively.
  • Fixes medical's ability to set the patient's status in medical records completely.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Antag implants will no longer potentially require the use of an emote antags aren't allowed to do. That would be 'twitch_s'. It's been replaced with 'twitch' instead.

12 October 2021

Alberyk, Dongwaiver updated:

  • Added hammers a tool option. They can be used to repair tables, airlocks, and barricades.

listerla updated:

  • Fixed Zo'ra soda animation frames, which were previously all set to 1.
  • Removed needless animation frames on the coffee machine, which was not animated.

11 October 2021

Desven updated:

  • Fixed the animation frames of the Vaurca heart sprite.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed unathi multi-color clothes exploding violently.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Revolution now only requires 15 players to be readied to start.

listerla updated:

  • Soap is no longer capitalized in item names.

10 October 2021

Forester40 updated:

  • Fixes various typos in holo-warrants, the blurbs for Idris and Zavodskoi, the message you get after using a himeo voidsuit modkit, and the descriptions for TCFL uniforms, NT overalls, matter bins and default voidsuit modkits.
  • Deletes the lines of code for the descriptions of the upgraded versions of micro manipulators, matter bins and micro lasers, since they were identical to the descriptions of the base parts which the upgraded parts already inherit the descriptions of.

Geeves updated:

  • Emotes can now be bolded and italicized with chat markup.
  • Added a fullscreen mode. Head to the Preferences tab and hit Toggle Fullscreen Preference to enable it.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Added a fuller variant of the quarter-turf decal to the floor painter called 'full quarter-turf'.

09 October 2021

Desven, Xev updated:

  • Resprited Vaurca organs to be more lore accurate.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Belts will now properly stay on when using the autodrobe.
  • Accessories will now correctly transfer to the uniform when using the autodrobe.
  • The text guiding one to use the autodrobe when spawning at cryo now stands out more.
  • Axiori can now use gradients & beards just like skrell.

08 October 2021

Desven updated:

  • Updated sprites for mining, botany and washing machines.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Blobs can damage reinforced walls now.

07 October 2021

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Accessories no longer show up like they are worn when the item they are attached to is being carried in hand.
  • Cigarettes will now properly be in the face slot when they go out, or in the hand if carried there.
  • Cigarettes will now be dropped on the ground when intentionally put out.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Nicotine overdoses no longer weaken and paralyze people.

06 October 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Backpacks now properly spriteshift into the hand position.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Vampires draining blood will now show as biting someone when examined.
  • Added the ability for shield generators to cover multiple z-levels.
  • Odin arrival message will no longer appear when spawning at cryo.
  • Spawning at cryo will no longer show a message saying you have 10 min to get to Aurora.
  • When using the autodrobe while playing a role getting a suit, such as the chef, it will now be put into the bag if the suit slot is occupied.

TheGreyWolf, DronzTheWolf updated:

  • Added a new set of options to the tajaran loadout: Charms & talismans. The holy sun rosette is also included here.
  • The null rod can now be made into an obsidian charm.

kyres1 updated:

  • Adds a rooftop event map.
  • Adds rooftop event assets.

05 October 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Tweaks how on-mob sprites are generated, they should still function as expected.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Tajaran cloaks, dresses & religious clothes no longer give overheating messages.

LocoTokyoFunBus updated:

  • Adds 3 new emotes for Skrell: *croak, *croon, and *lwarble.

Desven updated:

  • Fixes autoinjectors hand sprites being the other way around.
  • Added some clothes for the upcoming Vaurca events.
  • Cleared the bar clutter. Most of the junk was moved to the bar storage.

NeroCavalier updated:

  • Changes the HoP's and Captain's pcarrier to match colors with the helmet they get.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Fixes securitron construction to take security helmets.
  • Phyiscal & mental status in medical records can now be editted by medical staff.
  • Autopsy scanners now work regardless of intent.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added recolourable oxford shoes and sneakers to the shoe selection in the loadout. You can see this in the new recolourable shoes section.

  • Roundstart smes start with less charge and less upgraded parts.

  • Added pozole and pulque to the game.

  • Recolored the coffee and tea bags.

  • Vaurca atmos suit is no longer invisible.

29 September 2021

  • Visitors who ready up at roundstart no longer get some of their equipment dupicated upon boarding the shuttle.

  • Rejuvenate proc should now restore stamina to full.

  • Added two shots to Icelance for a total of FIVE.
  • Stops warden's button from clipping through wall.

  • Added a Mint Plant.
  • Added a Coffee Plant.
  • Added a Tea Plant.
  • Added Tea Grounds reagent contained in Tea leaves.
  • Added Coffee Grounds reagent contained in Coffee Beans.
  • Added Mint Syrup Recipe. Simple Syrup (3 units) + Mint (2 units).

  • Removed Grape juice in Green Grapes.
  • Added Blush Wine Recipe: Wine + White Wine.
  • Added Melon Wine Recipe: Wine + Melon Liquor.
  • Added White Wine recipe: White grape juice + Enzyme.

50_N00b, Alberyk, Desven updated:

  • Added a new type of full window with new sprites. It can be build by making a frame from metal sheets and then completing it with reinforced glass.

  • Resprited the food condiment bottles.
  • Updated the smartfridge icons.
  • Standarized vendors panels.

Geeves updated:

  • All non-basic or emagged drones can now interact with ore processing consoles and mining equipment vendors.

  • Moves the kitchen ATM to the wall inbetween the kitchen and the Bar to make it easier to tip the Bar.

  • Fixed runtimes related to renaming loadout items.

  • Columbo is now hatless.

Desven updated:

  • Added more overlays to the security belt.

NeroCavalier updated:

  • There's a confirmation box for amputations. You must click yes to continue with the amputation.

15 September 2021

TheGreyWolf, Dronz & Ryverstyx updated:

  • Skrells now has unique beardstyles.

14 September 2021

Desven updated:

  • Added university sweatshirts to the loadout. You can rename them to be from any school.
  • Fixed a missing pixel in the atmos jumpsuit.

Desven, 50N00b updated:

  • Updated the tunnel cloak sprites.
  • Added departamental tunnel cloaks.

Geeves updated:

  • Plate carriers now spawn with a removable set of pouches, the class of carrier changing how large the set of pouches are. All pouches are interchangeable with all carriers.
  • Plate carriers can now put special plate carrier holsters in the pouch slot, if you'd rather have that. Three spare plate holsters have been mapped into the armory.

NeroCavalier updated:

  • Surface garden's doors are now symmetrical. The hydroponics crate is no longer blocking disposals.
  • Adds more lights to several dark areas in the station. Please ping me in discord if you want to add more lights somewhere.
  • Adds light switches to Bridge's entrance, Chapel's entrance, and by the stairs in interstitial Psychologist's area.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • The camera console & camera program's map mode is now updated to fit with the current map.

WickedCybs updated:

  • RFD-C's are no longer the sole means of removing floor underplating. You can now weaken it with a welder and pry it off with a crowbar.

13 September 2021

Desven updated:

  • Updated meat sprites.

Desven, 50N00b updated:

  • Added new tattoo body marks.
  • Skrell and Vaurcae can now select hair fade options.
  • Added ribbons as an accessory to the loadout.

Geeves updated:

  • Suit coolers now use charge a half the usual rate, doubling their lifespan.
  • You can now toggle a suit cooler on or near your person on-and-off by alt-clicking it.
  • Suit coolers now have on-mob sprites that reflect the current charge.
  • Suit coolers now have suit storage slot sprites too.
  • Added glare dampeners to the augment loadout menu, available to Engineers and Roboticists.
  • You can no longer remove corrective lenses by hand.
  • Refactored drone speech, affecting maintenance drones, construction drones, mining drones and the matriarch drone. Everything should still work as expected.
  • Maintenance drones laws have been modified, they are now allowed to interact with both maintenance and mining drones by law, now.
  • Spesscafe Dark Blend has been renamed to Ganymede Dark Blend, additionally the reagent container's name has been changed to 'jar of coffee beans.'

Lucaken updated:

  • Added a Vysokan flag and banner to the loadout.

Megarop updated:

  • Changed 'Failure is you will not tolerate' to 'Failure is something you will not tolerate' in the Zeng-Hu Pharmaceuticals description.

NeroCavalier updated:

  • Adds the normal baby penguin's name and desc to holodeck baby penguins.
  • You are now able to handcuff people being aggressively grabbed by other players.
  • Ports water coolers holding paper cups from bay. You can take out up to 12 cups from a water cooler by clicking on one with an empty hand.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The tesla spine cost has been reduced from four loadout points to two.
  • Adds a new hairstyle called the Tajaran Swoop as well as a few variations of it.

11 September 2021

NeroCavalier updated:

  • You no longer attack patients in surgery with tools if you are off HARM intent.
  • You can do surgery in DISARM or GRAB intent now.
  • You can now examine the patient monitoring console in the OR to see your patient's status instead of having to click on it with an empty hand.
  • Fixes grammar for rechargers.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Adds a new type of eyewear. Visor sunglasses. HUD variants are included and can be selected from the loadout.

10 September 2021

Connorjg1 updated:

  • Medical Cryogenics will now heal organ damage again.
  • Medical Cryogenics will heal genetics damage at a faster rate.

NeroCavalier updated:

  • Roller beds can be deployed on adjacent tiles by clicking on them with the roller bed in hand.

Omicega updated:

  • Split the integrated HUD sensors augment into an integrated security HUD and integrated medical HUD. Reduced loadout cost accordingly.

09 September 2021

Desven updated:

  • Updated the locker sprites.

TheGreyWolf & bunkyb updated:

  • A TCFL softcap has been added under the softcap selection in the loadout.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The dark green first responder jacket can now hold medical equipment in its suit slot. Both responder jackets can hold a helmet in the suit slot like the chest rig can, too.
  • Tweaked the side sprites of the open dark green first responder jacket as it was identical to how it looked when closed.
  • Condenses a lot of the common first responder suit wear, like the chest rig and vest into its own selection to tidy up the loadout a bit. Look for the medical outerwear selection to reselect stuff or browse the more expanded options. You will have to reselect your gear from the new selection.
  • Condenses the IAC suit gear into its own outwear catagory too. You will have to reselect your gear from the new selection.

08 September 2021

Connorjg1 updated:

  • Plasma Pistol can now be holstered.
  • Plasma Bolts now do more damage and should no longer be less useful then traditional projectiles.

Desven updated:

  • Updated the jukebox sprites.

07 September 2021

MattAtlas updated:

  • Ported Baystation's evacuation controller for eventual usage in the NBT. There may be some evacuation or transfer shuttle weirdness. Make sure to report it on GitHub.
  • The liver now only deals toxin damage to the rest of your body if you're intoxicated.
  • Increased the speed at which oxygen loss decays.

NeroCavalier updated:

  • Adds a gas mask and face mask to HoS's locker.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Fixes the eridani, rainbow, normal & colorable softcaps in the loadout.

WickedCybs updated:

  • RFDs can now build flooring on open spaces.

06 September 2021

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed some barsign icons not having all directional sprites.

Geeves updated:

  • Broken airlock electronics are now classified as trash, which means maintenance drones can decompile them.
  • Various stack items now make use of maptext to show how many things are left in the stack.
  • Activating a synthetic jetpack now activates both the thrusters and stabilizers.
  • Examining maintenance, mining, and matriarch drone flavor text will now give an expanded description of their duties and interactions.
  • You can now shut down mining drones by swiping your ID on them.
  • Construction and matriarch drones can now pull larger objects.
  • You can no longer swipe your ID on matriarch drones.
  • Drone grippers now have a blacklist rather than a whitelist of items it can hold, meaning they can interact with more objects.
  • Drone cameras should now be named properly.
  • Stationbounds and drones now get a Rebuild Overlays button in the Robot Commands tab that lets them cut and rebuild their overlays, helping with the stuck talking indicator problem.
  • Drone inventories have been reorganized to make more sense.
  • Drones now spawn with an engineering taperoll and an inflatables dispenser.
  • Construction and matriarch drones now spawn with a mining drill.
  • Drones can now activate disposal bins while sitting inside them.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The TCFL dress beret has been tweaked to be a paler blue, to fit more with the TCFL jackets available in the loadout

NeroCavalier updated:

  • Ports the Skrellian Helmet from bay. Security, HoP, and Captains will be able to get it in their loadouts under Xenowear - Skrell

WickedCybs updated:

  • Adds V-Neck dress shirts to the loadout.

04 September 2021

Shadow Quill updated:

  • AIs can control turret controllers with hotkeys again. (Ctrl+Click toggles activeness, Alt+Click toggles lethality)

03 September 2021

Desven updated:

  • Drinks now match their corresponding color when poured.
  • Added sprites for when holding V'krexi Snax.
  • Removed the butanol can from the softdrinks vendor.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Removed Blink from the Technomancer spells.
  • The Tesla armor now uses lower power lightning shocks if the armor isn't ready for another shock instead of using full power shocks.
  • Increased the Tesla armor recharge time by 5 seconds.
  • Fixed the Tesla armor lightning shocks not doing the tesla zap.

NeroCavalier updated:

  • Replaced Investigator's plate carrier with Officer's plate carrier.
  • Fixes refrigerator typo.

02 September 2021

Desven updated:

  • Added religion and nationality to the agent ID card.

Omicega updated:

  • Moved some first responder equipment (hypospray, helmet etc) from the roundstart spawn gear list into their locker instead.

Shadow Quill updated:

  • Account numbers will now wrap around to 111111 (plus a bit random) when they manage to exceed 999999.
  • Human mobs can no longer use the strip panel if they don't have working hands.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • The wristbound radio & double headset now have proper descriptions alongside a blurb on how they are different when examined.

WickedCybs updated:

  • A lot of Msai hairstyles had the ears pushed forward on the side sprites. They're now in line with how Taj ears usually are.
  • Also fixes the Msai inner ear colour gradient because it was designed around the pushed forward ears.

01 September 2021

Shadow Quill updated:

  • AIs will no longer be shot at by turrets set to eliminate silicons.
  • Punching bags now make sound when punched (again.)

31 August 2021

Alberyk updated:

  • Added a hair fade options to the Tajara.
  • Added abyss turfs. If you step on them, you fall to your death. They are not implemented anywhere yet.

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added new Schlorrgo mechanics.

Desven updated:

  • Updated the arcade sprites.
  • Updated the vending machine sprites.

Geeves updated:

  • Revenant night vision is now located in the top left, like other nightvision abilities.
  • Revenant night vision now properly works.
  • Mech mounted firearms have been buffed. They now deal more damage and pierce through more armor.
  • Projectiles hitting mechs now state which component they hit rather than using the humanoid limb naming system.
  • Implemented an IFF system, currently only mech mounted weapons can enable them by cntrl clicking the weapon in the hotbar. IFF weapons will never hit a friendly that has the same IFF ID as you.
  • Pipeguns now take a makeshift 5.56mm magazine, crafted with steel sheets under the Steel Weaponry tab. It holds 7 rounds.
  • Pipeguns can now be held on the suit storage slot regardless of what's in your suit slot.
  • Pipeguns can now fire three guaranteed shots before the chance of jamming sets in, per clean.
  • Cleaned up some funkiness with the jam mechanics, should feel nicer now.

Lucaken updated:

  • Added a Golden Deep logo for use in paperwork. Writing [logo_golden] will draw the image on any paper.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Kois products were removed from the ordinary lunchbox and instead added to a new vaurca specific one listed under the vaurca xenowear tab in the loadout.
  • Technomancer can no longer be the sole antagonist in secret if there is more than 15 players readied.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added a new hairstyle for humans, the Fingerwave.

WickedCybs, YourDaddy117 updated:

  • Added a long variant of the Fisanduhian bomber jacket. The Fisanduhian coats have been put into a selection in the suits section.
  • Added a green trenchcoat to the trenchcoat selection.

25 August 2021

Desven updated:

  • Greatly nerfed how the stage 4 of the black k'ois mycosis works. No more phoron flooding and puking spores everywhere.
  • Added a Lii'dra accent, called Lii'draic.
  • Added a voice changer version of the Vaurca filter port.
  • Added a black k'ois grenade.
  • Adds sprites for the ZH scanner when in your hand.
  • Changes the cat item icon when holding it so it actually looks like Bones now.

Desven & TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Adds paper bags, which are like one time lunchbag you can use to carry food around.
  • Adds an extra light fixture at the kitchen, also adds the paper bags to the kitchen.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Zeng-Hu Mobility Frames are now slower when running. Their actual speed is now on par with an M'sai Tajara when moving normally.
  • All IPCs now use additional power when sprinting. This is about 10 units of charge.
  • Zeng-Hu Mobility Frames use twice as much power for sprinting.
  • Zeng-Hu Mobility Frames use twice as much power when moving normally.
  • Zeng-Hu Mobility Frames may no longer be played in security roles.

24 August 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Airlock electronics now properly save their settings when you finish an airlock.
  • Inductive chargers now properly report when they don't find a cell to charge.
  • Using an inductive charger on a power cell or an APC will now properly charge it.
  • You can no longer line up multiple inductive chargers by spamclicking the target.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Limbs now have higher delimb threshold.
  • Increased the miss chance for arms, legs, hands and feet.
  • Security's default armor is now slightly better overall. Revolvers do 27 damage instead of 40, while assault rifles retain most of their damage.
  • Fixed some code that prevented melee delimbs under some circumstances.

Omicega updated:

  • Added hailers to the SecTech vendor.
  • Tweaked some security roundstart equipment and locker equipment for quality of life, mostly the HoS and warden's.

23 August 2021

Desven updated:

  • Fixes the pineapple can sound for real.

Omicega updated:

  • Fixed grey jeans shorts and grey jeans short shorts not having sprites, and also then made the loadout point at the right sprites too.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • It is no longer possible to use a species permitted gradient style for other species in char setup.

22 August 2021

Desven & BunkyB updated:

  • Adds V'krexi Snax, you can find them in the Getmore vendor.

Omicega updated:

  • The supply department can now spawn with hard hats from the loadout.
  • Gave Tajaran accents a minor resprite across the board. Amohda and Naziran Siik get new icons; several others get touch-ups to make the icons sharper.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Added some new Taj hairstyles and variations. Mainly variations.
  • A second preview that can be viewed in all different directions has been added to the tajara dmi. This is only really of interest to spriters.
  • A lot of the current taj alt hairs had their names changed to make it more clear what is similar in style. That means you might have to reselect them if you were using anything affected.

21 August 2021

Alberyk updated:

  • Walking over mining ores with an ore bag in your hands or pockets will instantly collect the ore now.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Removed the infiltration case from the antag uplink.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The t-shirt accessory would cover part a small corner of the hand sprite. That little bit was removed
  • Sidesprites for both binder options had a pixel that went down the chest removed. It was an element that was at odds with the front and back portions.

20 August 2021

Desven updated:

  • Fixes the pineapple rings having the same description and sounds than a regular box.

19 August 2021

Desven updated:

  • Vaurca can now select mechanical organs.
  • Vaurca now spawn with a filter port.

Geeves updated:

  • Engineering borgs and drones can now synthesize cloth.
  • When you join as a maintenance drone, construction drone, or mining drone, you will now be prompted to enter a tag, for example, 'MT' would appear as 'maintenance drone (MT-169)'.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Unzipping a hoodie and pulling the hood up would end up removing some pixels from the arms, exposing part of the body. That's been fixed

17 August 2021

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Certain weapons, such as cannons and the anti-materiel rifle, will do extra damage to mechas, structures, and synthetics.
  • Added two new anti-materiel weapons: the point entry anti-materiel cannon and the adhomian recoilless rifle.

  • Recolored the mercenary heavy armor.

  • Adds new watches to the loadout.

Geeves updated:

  • Turrets and solar panels now rotate to face a specific angle instead of hard directions.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Custom cakes are now sliceable.
  • Wiping cutlery with a rag now removes loaded food.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Wrist clothing and wrist radios now have a verb to change layer to be under suits and other outer wear.
  • Glasses will now instantly change layer.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Trimmed minor bits of the Taj Colour Patches pattern. It displayed a little oddly.

16 August 2021

Desven updated:

  • Added an SCC logo for paperwork. Simply write [logo_scc] to make it appear.
  • Fixes bites for the new k'ois food.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Eridani ERT responders got ID cards with no additional access added, which wasn't intentional. They get standard distress access now and the Lead can actually use their hardsuit.

13 August 2021

CodePanter updated:

  • Added a rainbow crayon to the vault maintenance area.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Hoodies now cover the hands less, to better show items on the wrist and let some other sprites shine trhough..

12 August 2021

Desven updated:

  • Added four new cocktails. Three alcoholic, one non-alcoholic. They are mojito, pina colada, Zavodskoi mule and Gibb Floats.
  • Added a fancy new sprite for the Space Cola and for Lean.
  • To account for the lack of pineapples, added the pineapple box to the Getmore vendor. Also, added a chocolate bar because it's really weird Getmore doesn't actually sell chocolates.

Omicega updated:

  • Updates the Crevan Creole accent tag to be a bit more thematic.

11 August 2021

Desven updated:

  • Added a huge red label to the Phoron punch. If you drink it it's 100% your fault now.

Omicega updated:

  • Adds general (hallway/lobby) access to the security, engineering, and research departments to first responders.
  • Allows crowbars and air bubbles to the list of items that can go into the emergency survival box.

WickedCybs updated:

  • Removed the extra buttons on the long blazer's open left facing sprite.
  • Changed the bishop frame sprite to not clip through clothing.
  • Changed the bishop frame panel patterns to not clip through clothing.

07 August 2021

Desven updated:

  • Added in-hand sprites for k'ois donuts.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Fixed item duplication/icon updating issues related to borg gripper interactions with vending machines, pipe dispensers, and light fixtures.
  • Borg players can once again click on the active gripper icon to activate the held item.
  • Stacks dropped or placed by borg grippers will no longer display the stack amount next to the icon.

Geeves updated:

  • You can now actually inhabit matriarch maintenance drones, if you have the command whitelist.
  • Matriarch drones that die without exploding now don't open a ghost spawner slot.
  • Dying as a drone will now not say died as drone in deadchat, instead just using the proper name.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Nanotrasen relations in the char setup has now been changed into economic status.
  • The NTCC report spawning in the bridge at roundstart has been removed.
  • Based on feedback, the frequency of the emotional manipulator's messages were toned back down a little.

06 August 2021

NiennaB updated:

  • Changes up the Synthetic Lore loading screens with modified ones by NiennaB in order to fit the UI better.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Cleared up the description of the Jaws of Life to indicate when it can be used.

05 August 2021

Alberyk updated:

  • Added some badlands space sectors.
  • Removed all dionae organs except the stomach.
  • Diona can never become full. They can eat as much they want

Alberyk, Dongwaiver updated:

  • Added a new asteroid dungeon.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Added another qipao to the loadout.

Geeves updated:

  • The RFD-C can now be used on non-station levels, but still not in Centcomm areas.
  • Empty magazines can now be recycled in an autolathe.
  • Added a new type of maintenance drone, called the Matriarch Drone. They're the leader of all the various maintenance drones across the station. You need a command whitelist to join as one. Ghosting out will allow someone else to join in.
  • Material sheets for robots now update according to their synthesizer values.
  • Speaking as a drone will now auto-capitalize and auto-punctuate your text, as well as having floating messages above you for those that can understand you.
  • Maintenance drones now start with more material in their synthesizers.
  • Cable coils will now display the amount you can lay down based on your cell's charge as a robot.
  • The drone control console can now be used to send drones to any station area on the current map, instead of a few choices.
  • Rezadone now repairs internal organs, restores blood, and restarts the heart.
  • RnD can now produce upgrades for the experimental welding tool, namely, an eyeshield and an overcapacitor. The eyeshield removes the need to wear protective welding gear, wile the overcapacitor increases working speed at the cost of fuel use.
  • Mining machines can now be constructed and deconstructed. The direction you make the machine face on the frame affects where the input and output is, whilst the consoles will get put onto a wall depending on where the frame faces.
  • Added a new mining machine category to the circuit imprinter.
  • The supermatter grid SMES now starts with four capacitance coils and two transmission coils, as well as full charge, max input, and 1.3 MW output.
  • The Aurora mining machines' input and output turfs are now set correctly.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • All types of flask in the loadout can now start with any reagent.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Investigators are now given an autopsy tray containing most tools needed for autopsies.
  • Medical & security autopsy now contains an autopsy tray, replacing the tools formerly located in those places.
  • Medical autopsy now has a sink too.

04 August 2021

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed carpet titles not updating their icons correctly when placed down.

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added new SCC themed shuttle walls and windows.

Desven updated:

  • Fixes the click and clack emotes for Vaurca being inverted.

Geeves updated:

  • Posibrains that get activated in the robotics lab now causes a broadcast on the science radio of doing so.

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • Removed the Golem Rune random event

The Stryker, thelancer updated:

  • Adds a Synthetic Residency Card for Republic of Biesel IPCs in the Xenowear - IPC tab.

WickedCybs updated:

  • The changeling hallucination sting will directly inject three units of mindbreaker into somebody instead of directly applying hallucinations that cannot be traced at all for upwards of twelve minutes. The new duration will be around three to five without medical attention, give or take as severity can be a bit random.

02 August 2021

CodePanter updated:

  • Fixed empty anomaly power utilizers being invisible.

Flpfs updated:

  • Adds two new vaurca emotes, click and clack.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Removed the goonchat toggle due to cache issues.

Pratepresidenten, TheGreyWolf, Kyres updated:

  • AI shells have been added. A special type of stationbound controlled directly by the AI and with limited tools, for use when it is really needed.
  • The new AI shell circuits can be created with level 6 data & engineering tech.
  • An AI shell has been added to the AI core.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • The coatrack can now hold most forensic coats along with the detective jacket.
  • The coatrack can now hold fedoras and several security berets & caps including idris variants of those.
  • Investigators are now given security labcoats that button all the way when closed.

01 August 2021

Sparky_hotdog updated:

  • The Adhomain Wool Coat and Raakti Shariim Coat are now both able to be toggled open. Their on-mob sprites should now look more like coats now too.

TheGreyWolf & Desven updated:

  • Sounds from the unathi hiss, vaurca chitter and the flamethrower has been removed due to license issues.
  • New sounds have been given to the vaurca chitter.

31 July 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Improved the sprites for impaired vision, most commonly from wearing welding gear or unactivated hardsuits.
  • Putting on or removing vision impairing equipment will now update it immediately, flipping welding mask/goggles will do the same. This also updates flash and welding protection.
  • You can now transfer lights between light replacers by clicking on one with another. The one in your active hand will receive the lights.
  • Advanced light replacers are now sized small, meaning they can fit in webbing and drop pouches.
  • Chemical dispensers like the soft drink dispenser and the alcohol dispenser can now be rotated with alt-click.
  • Basic living mobs now know who's speaking on the radio if they know the language.
  • Hardsuit AIs adjusting a weapon's firing mode will now properly alert the hardsuit wearer to the change.
  • Hardsuit AIs can now properly engage and toggle hardsuit modules.
  • You can no longer move while paralysed but when supported by a hardsuit AI. Hardsuit AIs can now move you when you're in paralysis crit.
  • Posibrain hardsuit AIs can now fire guns.
  • Posibrains now display the right icon state when searching or not.
  • Hardsuit AIs now only get notified that they can move their hardsuit host if AI control is enabled.
  • Spawning in as a posibrain now allows you to set your name.
  • Hardsuit AIs now display the floating text over their host when speaking.
  • Added long range holopads, compatible with overmap. Long range holopads can only communicate with other long range holopads. They need to be on different vessels to work.
  • Mapped long range holopads into the surface interview room, the bridge, the command conference room, the away shuttle, and the centre of the Centcomm intelligence area.
  • Holopads now have a Vueui menu that allows you to search through the list of available holopads.
  • Command authorization on holopads are now a holopad toggle, remember to toggle it off after making a forced call if you're command, lest there be shenanigans.
  • You can no longer phase through the backsides of comfy chairs/sofa, you need to leap over them by click dragging yourself onto the comfy chair/sofa.
  • Constructing multi-tile airlocks now properly sets the collision bounds.
  • You can now rotate airlock assemblies by alt-clicking on them.
  • Failed portals and teleportation attempts will now transmit you to a random level, instead of level 3 each time.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Corrective lenses have been added to the loadout under augments.
  • A new series of fluff based augments have been added to the loadout. They have no mechanical effect but allows their name and description to be set. Currently they exist for the head, upper body, left hand and right hand limbs.
  • Augments deploying something now only deploys it to the slot it is attached to. They can also retract it by hitting the action button again.
  • The sublevel crusher camera was moved up one to allow full view of the crusher contents.
  • Put the bar booth, brig shower and the lower hallway outside the diner's cameras on the proper networks.
  • Brig control room lights near the windoor was moved one to the right, and another added opposite from it.
  • Fixes being unable to hear comms through the wrist radio.

TheGreyWolf & Dronz updated:

  • Added wrist radios and headphone radios. The headphone radios gives the same muffled effect as earmuffs and wrist radios broadcasts everything heard to those next to the one carrying it as well.

30 July 2021

Desven updated:

  • Fixes Caprician coffee not showing its sprite and the filtered k'ois glass not showing its name.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The pain threshold has been reverted back to 200 damage.
  • Pain recovery is now slower when unconscious.
  • Nerfed arterial bleeding amount if the wound is open.
  • The liver now does significantly less toxin damage.
  • Having coffee in your system with damaged kidneys no longer does excessive amounts of toxin damage.
  • Painkillers have been nerfed across the board. Oxycomorphine has been left unchanged.
  • Arterial bleeding severity now depends on the organ hit. Arterial bleeding in legs and arms are less effective by 1/4. Arterial bleeding in hands and feet are less effective by half.
  • Humans now have a grace period of 2 minutes before taking oxygen damage if they cannot breathe if the lungs are undamaged.
  • Dexalin and dexalin plus now metabolize slower by 1/4.

29 July 2021

CodePanter updated:

  • Added crayons and canvases to the paperwork gripper.
  • Added inhalers and injectors to the medical grippers.

28 July 2021

listerla & Desven updated:

  • Added a Sedantis coffee cup to loadout.
  • Added recipes for k'ois burgers, muffins, donuts, and steaks.
  • Added Caprician Coffee, made with 2 parts coffee and 1 toothpaste.

27 July 2021

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Radiation storm lights will now end once the radiation is over.
  • Certain tajara markings will no longer show ears through headwear.
  • The emotional manipulator augment now properly gives the messages it should.

26 July 2021

Alberyk updated:

  • Bringing the remote controlled synthetics out of the brig's mining section should be way harder now.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • The vaurca mantle now actually shows up in the accessory slot.

24 July 2021

Geeves updated:

  • Mech ballistic and laser armor has been buffed, allowing them to function for longer in firefights. Combat armor melee armor has also been buffed.
  • Fixed analyzing mechs not giving the correct integrity values.
  • Hand-teles now operate differently. Ctrl-click it to set which station it links to, alt-click or use in-hand to deploy a portal.
  • The descriptions of hardsuit assemblies and their constructions have been overhauled.
  • Examining a hardsuit assembly will now provide a description and tell you at which step its at, what to do to go forward, and what to do to go back.
  • Holding shift and hovering over a hardsuit assembly when you are near it will provide a tooltip providing the step its at and how to continue.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed IPC subspecies having nutrition still.
  • Added a Goonchat preference to the Global tab. If this preference is off, Goonchat will not load. If you were using darkmode Goonchat, note that your accent icons will most likely not work until you restart the game.

23 July 2021

Alberyk updated:

  • Turrets now emit light when powered.

TheGreyWolf updated:

  • Vaurca mantles now has color selection in the loadout and are considered accesories that can go both on accessory slots and on suit slots.

listerla updated:

  • Added various Skrellian accents and religions.
  • Removed Skrell access to Konyanger accent, Islam, Christianity, and Tribunalist religions, and Dominian citizenship.

22 July 2021

Geeves updated:

  • All reagents processed in the body now get added to the bloodstream's trace chemicals. Trace chemicals decay at a rate ten times slower than normal blood metabolism.
  • Mass spectrometers now properly access the blood's trace chemicals.
  • Mass spectrometers no longer delete the sample after being analyzed.
  • Mass spectrometers will now show the correct color for the blood inside it.
  • Mass spectrometers now tell you when no trace chemicals are found.
  • Zombie Powder and Dextrotoxin no longer show up on normal mass spectrometers, only the advanced version will detect them.

MattAtlas updated:

  • IPCs no longer have nutrition, which means they will no longer randomly slow down towards the end of a round.

listerla updated:

  • Replaced bread, burger, and sausage sprites with sprites from tgstation.

21 July 2021

Geeves updated:

  • It is now possible to fireman carry someone, provided you have an aggressive grab or higher on them. Simply drag the grab in your active hand onto your sprite and wait for a bit. To release, drop the grab.
  • Pulling or grabbing someone and dragging them into a portal will now teleport it/them with you.
  • Added additional configuration options to buddy tags. You can also set their configs in the loadout menu now, where it will persist.
  • Contractors now spawn with their faction next to their job title on the manifest and in their records.
  • Updating someone's ID will now instantly update the crew manifest.
  • Contractors that have their ID assignment changed will no longer be shifted to the Misc category.
  • The Ghost Menu now sorts its output in this order: Antags, Alive, Dead, Observer, NPCs, Dead NPCs.
  • You can now make an easel out of 5 wood, and a canvas of various sizes out of cloth. To draw on the canvas, use a crayon on it, to clean, use soap or a rag. Using the canvas in-hand will completely clean it.
  • Bookcases now drop all the materials used to make them when dismantled.
