  • Added some Unathi shaman wrappings to the Xenowear tab.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added a system that allows the creation of armored accessories. Currently unused.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Unathi foot claws are now a pixel taller.

Pratepresidenten updated:

  • Given the roundstart tips some love.
  • De-memefies the Captain's laser gun.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Tweaks headset sprites - should be less visible from the back now.
  • Fixes spoon inhands.
  • Mops, rags, and soap should no longer spam logs as much anymore.
  • Yellow buttons on the paper shredder have been removed on account of looking too similar to a maintenance panel.
  • New animation for shredding different states of paper.
  • Justice hats have been fixed properly this time.
  • Cigar case has been made measurably smaller.
  • You no longer can eat soup with a fork. Weep and/or rejoice.
  • Drinking soup should display more correct messages and sounds.
  • Eating things with utensils will now properly spawns the trash item.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Limb attachment surgery now checks for presence of a suitable organ to attach it to.

29 January 2020

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Species that are gender neutral will now properly spawn with the neuter gender, and be neuter gender in the character setup.

28 January 2020

BoryaTheSlayer updated:

  • Fixes nanopaste not using charge when used for internal robotic repairs.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a default NTNet Relay IRC channel, for everyone to access and congregate at.
  • Removed the user has joined and user has left the channel messages, so you can freely move in the IRC without spamming people.
  • Added the IRC client as a default program to the Private enrollment preset, so you don't have to download it seperately.
  • Renamed the Computer Configuration Tool to Hardware Configuration Tool.
  • Added a basic laptop to the loadout.
  • Increased the DDOS program's DDOSing power a bit.
  • Added Sudoku to the CE's laptop.
  • Ports Bay Modular Computer component sprites.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Commune and Psiping no longer spam staff logs.

Pratepresidenten updated:

  • Added a portable organ cooler

mikomyazaki updated:

  • All guns (except mech guns) now have safeties. CTRL+Click to disable to safety. Firing on harm intent will automatically disable the safety.
  • Removes old pref-based gun safety system.

27 January 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed certains mobs being unable to smash wall girders.

Geeves updated:

  • Added the IAC response team.
  • Added an internals and suit sensors indicator to the strip menu.
  • Toggle internals in the strip menu now displays whether you're toggling it on or off.
  • Added an adjust mask and tank pressure check to the strip menu.

Leudoberct updated:

  • Adds Si'akh to the Unathi religion options.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Monkeys no longer throw or interact with stuff.
  • You can no longer trade easy to get items to Cyndie Kate for stupidly strong weapons.
  • Unathi can no longer swallow mobs or items whole.
  • Instead, they now have their old devour, still tied to a grab. You need a red grab now, however. It does not work on humans.
  • Unathi devour is now overall faster.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Dionae are now a bit slower.

PoZe updated:

  • Added new admin verb inside of Special Verbs called Load Template. It appears when you press Toggle Build Mode. This verb allows admins to load template maps into their current coordinates.
  • Added button to Build Mode buttons UI for load template.

25 January 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Modular Computer .dat files are now more space efficient.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The Medical Doctor role has been split up into two different roles.
  • Medical Doctor is now renamed to Physician and has four slots.
  • Surgeon is now its own standalone role. Two slots.
  • AIs are no longer invincible.
  • Contractor surgeons are now a possibility.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Fixes the classic cowboy boots being invisible.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • New sprites and inhands for glasses! You should see them when you're holding them in your hands, and changing your glasses mode will change the sprite too.
  • Adds new sprites and inhands for mesons. They should be more representative of what they actually do. (Try turning on mesons on and off in your hand and see the magic!)
  • You will no longer clumsily drop your glasses everytime you combine HUDs with them.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Fixed a bug where banning someone from Malf AI, Renegade, Asset Protection Specialist, Syndicate Commando, Highlander or Traitor would ban someone from all of those roles.

24 January 2020

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added new space ruin.
  • Space ruin ghost roles will now only open when the research shuttle is launched from the station.

Geeves updated:

  • Slimecode has been tweaked a bit to make it slightly better. Adult slimes will no longer have their babyname next to their name when they talk.
  • Golems have been added to the ghostspawner menu. You will be able to spawn as one when a golem rune is created.
  • Slime steroids now properly triple uses, like the message says it does.
  • Slimes have had their nutrition values fixed. They will now properly evolve and reproduce.
  • Stunbatonning a slime now has a reduced chance of making them go batshit.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You can now destroy girders and walls with powerful items. It might take some time, though, and you'll probably be better off deconstructing it unless your weapon is strong.
  • Two-handed weapons no longer have that awkward Wielded sticking in front of the name when you wield them.
  • Girders now report their damage status on examine.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds two kinds of recolorable pants, dress and striped, as well as a recolorable beret and an alt version of the casual skirt.
  • Adds a non la conical hat.
  • You can now get an armorless version of the TCFL flight jacket in the loadout.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Changelog Changelog - Fixed changelog wiki link.
  • Can no longer move buckled mobs into cryopods.

  • Lack of shoes no longer causes a slowdown.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Re-added more bloodpacks to medical. Two more O- ones in the ICU and Surgery, and a fridge of assorted bags in storage. Match blood types to patients or calculate compatible blood types, go nuts.

mikomyazaki updated:

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Offworlder pioneer scarves no longer prevent you from eating or drinking while worn, just like every other scarf.

Geeves updated:

  • Suit coolers now start with high capacity cells.
  • Suit coolers printed at autolathes have no cells.

Goret updated:

  • A phonograph and a cigar case have been added to the bar counter. The cake hat has been moved to the kitchen.
  • Briefcases update! More briefcases have been added to the loadout, and hand-sprites have been reworked. Thanks to Happy_Fox for the sprites and Mwahahahaha for the original code.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Now atmospheric control consoles (like tank and supermatter) numeric inputs set value on enter key press.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Nitroglycerin should no longer instantly explode. Oops.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • A vampire's blood drain will now work properly on Skrell who enter Srom during.
  • Skrell who are in Srom will now properly receive the alert about memory loss due to brain damage to their real body.
  • Fixed direction of a right-hand spoon icon.
  • Protolathe and Circuit Printer now properly check for adjacency when being filled with sheets.
  • The 'toggle visibility' verb will now work properly for manifested ghosts.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixes the Klaxan Kataphract not being selectable.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • You can now cop the TCFL field beret in the loadout.
  • To ensure equivalent exchange, it doesn't have armor anymore.

15 January 2020

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added two new guns; harpoon gun and foldable shotgun.
  • Added a new sprite and firing sound to the silenced pistol.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Added more detailed examine text to the industrial drills. Also clarified a warning message, and added more notifications regarding cell changing.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a bunch of descriptions to the traitor uplink so you can be more sure of what you're buying.
  • Added various new weapons, tools, and kits to the traitor uplink.
  • Various traitor items have had their cost tweaked to bring them into a tighter balance.
  • The Tommygun is now know as the Vintage Sub-Machine gun everywhere.
  • Manhacks are now called Viscerators everywhere.
  • Exosuit droppers and their equipment have both been given their own uplink catagories.
  • Remote IPCs are no longer selectable in the Character Creation menu.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Added verbs to ghost menu to submit pAI personality and revoke it.
  • Added new VueUI for pAI personality submission.
  • Fixed pAI preferences.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Mech examine now actually has colour and bolding.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Secuity records program now has a dropdown-menu for the criminal status options, instead of a text input field.
  • Cargo shuttle can now send NPC mobs if they are part of an active bounty.
  • Advanced pinpointer can now indicate z-direction toward its target with an overlay on the sides of the screen.

14 January 2020

Furrycactus updated:

  • Reishi mycelium and Ambrosia Vulgaris are now regularly available in the MegaSeed Servitor vendors, rather than being contraband, due to their legality. This means you can vend them in Hydroponics or purchase them in the surface garden without hacking the vendors.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed powered hammer sprites.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Borer has been added as its own gamemode, requiring 3 borer players and 20 people readied.
  • To be eligible as a borer host you now need the borer antag pref on. If a borer cannot find a suitable host, it will spawn in a randomly positioned landmark.
  • Zorch, the eye laser power, has been made into a lightning arc power instead. It works like before, except it shoots teslabolts.
  • Disable, the EMP ability, has been made into a localized EMP ability. It activates the EMP effect on items. You now activate it by targeting right hand and clicking on items.
  • Increased borer psi awakening chemical cost to 150.
  • Borer psi awakening is now a bit more painful.

mikomyazaki updated:

  • Adds an icon for the Internal Affairs stamp.

13 January 2020

Furrycactus updated:

  • Changed the Trauma Physician's uniform to be more in line with the fact that they are doctors and not paramedics. Puke jacket GET GONE.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a Frontier Cowboy gear crate, it's cheaper because it isn't EVA capable, nor has any armour.
  • Gave the whip a two tile hit radius.

Goret updated:

  • Add the flowercrowns to the loadout.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Fixes 'Track' button on suit sensors for AI.

SierraKomodo updated:

  • Renamed Emergency Physician to Trauma Physician, to better reflect their role as a doctor and not an emergency responder.

12 January 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Jetpacks now properly toggle flight capability when you press the action button.
  • Added a remote controlled Unbranded Frame to the command bunker.

Goret updated:

  • Added a cyborg recharge station in medical. It is located in the custodial closet.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Bluespace drives have been improved to prevent critical drive failure.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Renegades now spawn with the guns in their backpack.
  • Organs no longer pop out of the body when transplanted.
  • Redaction bone mend no longer mends the bones above the bone break threshold.
  • You can no longer put mobs in potted plants.
  • Monkeys no longer throw things while being held.
  • The silicon computer now starts with an advanced network card, which means much faster downloads.
  • Nerfed pressure damage a bit.
  • Orbital drops now work properly.
  • IVs now ping when the attached person is at less than 90% blood volume.
  • Ported over Bay's liver code. This means that you should no longer get demolished livers insanely fast.
  • Reduced zombie brain HP to 70.
  • The head is now easier to hit.
  • Nerfed the effects from getting hit in the brain while you have brain damage. They only occur at 66 brain damage now. The paralysis and stun inflicted are also gone.
  • Increased the blood loss that lasers deal and decreased the blood loss from fire.
  • Increased the toxin damage slimes give a tiny bit.
  • Succumbing is possible at 66 brain damage instead of 100 now.
  • Brain damage now gives you stuttering instead of slurring.
  • Fixed some pain messages.
  • Shrapnel now does external damage. Be careful, or pack a knife.

11 January 2020

Alberyk, Kyres updated:

  • Fixed TCFL rig shoes not displaying the correct sprites.

Skull132 updated:

  • Updated remote logging capabilities.

Wowzewow (Wezzy), Mwahahahaha updated:

  • Makes the Set Pose box retain its previously inputted information and turns it into a chunky message box instead of a skinny text box.

10 January 2020

Arturlang updated:

  • Fixes being able to tie your hair while unconcious or immobile.

Ferner updated:

  • Offworlder goggles will now apply the chosen loadout color properly.

Geeves updated:

  • Gemstones larger than small now properly spawn.
  • You can now flip your welding mask up and down even when buckled.

09 January 2020

Arturlang updated:

  • Fixes the bluespace borgs phase out procs typos.

Aticius updated:

  • Unathi Sprites have been given a brand new coat of paint and love; with gender based sprites.

Goret updated:

  • Replaced the bee smoker sprite by a new one, made by Happy_Fox.

08 January 2020

Geeves updated:

  • The HoP laptop now spawns with an ID Card Slot.
  • Added a new category to the traitor uplink, which is only available to revolutionaries.
  • Head Revolutionaries now spawn with an uplink that has 50 TC, they also get an alert telling them to not abuse it.
  • Revamped the drill dropper into a generic orbital dropper, capable of dropping ANY sort of item you wish it to.
  • Added a Mech orbital dropper. Added an Armory orbital dropper.
  • Made loyalty implants display their text correctly when they implant someone.
  • Added aggression implants, which makes whoever it is implanted into extremely aggressive. Quite useful for starting a revolution.
  • Added some description_antag to mercenary cipherkeys, informing the reader that the mercenary radio key is :t.
  • Added a gear crate (not for mercs) which is just six syndicate softsuits. Useful in a pinch.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Added multipurpose aprons to the loadout. They can come in any color you desire, and can hold several kitchen and bar items, such as the drink shaker, booze and condiment bottles, and knives.
  • Blue aprons are now called 'botanist aprons', to fit with their intended role as a botanist item.

Skull132 updated:

  • Projectiles will no longer lag the server to death if they reach the end of map.

07 January 2020

Aboshehab updated:

  • Fixes character set up issues for IPC's as a result of recent rework.
  • Change Zeng-Hu capability to use voidsuits and hardsuits machine version to human version until better implementation method is found.

Geeves updated:

  • Borers can no longer infest non-organics or dionae at roundstart.

Geeves and Kyres updated:

  • Gave the Kataphracts a new backpack, the Hegemony Satchel, which has slightly more than normal storage space.
  • Tweaked the Kataphract oxygen tank and magboots to fit the aesthetic some more.
  • Tweaked the colours of the underclothes the Kataphracts spawn with to be more easy on the eye.
  • Gave the Kataphract Klax a set of magboots.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Made sure suit sensor monitor always auto updates.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Bedhead 5 has been removed.
  • Fixes Pun Pun causing runtimes by knocking on windows.

06 January 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed age restrictions not working when jobs were restricted by species.

Aticius updated:

  • Removed DNAChange Effect from Artifacts.

Code by Geeves, Sprites by Kyres updated:

  • Added mech passenger compartments.

Geeves updated:

  • Examining yourself for injuries will now show you whether your limb is bleeding or not.

Leudoberct updated:

  • Adds a first aid kit to Red Dock.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Human NPCs and monkeys now have some more interactions.
  • Monkeys can now take items and throw them. Or shoot guns. Or activate things.
  • Borers no longer get teleported out of a host if they're manually removed after leaving the host.
  • Removed synaptizine from borer chems. Added dylovene, kelotane, norepinephrine instead.
  • You can now call ERTs on Bughunt.
  • Borers no longer have nutrition loss.

05 January 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Vampire blood draining should remove less blood, reducing the chances of brain damage due to low oxygen.

Geeves updated:

  • The AI can now hear and speak LOOC via its Eye as well as via its Core.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • The vampire Dominate ability now sends the command to the chat window too, so you can't lose it by accidentally closing the popup anymore.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Exosuits can now be built again.
  • AOOC has been fixed.

MattAtlas, Geeves updated:

  • Fixed bughunt for real.
  • Bughunt now tries to spawn four mercenaries and two borers.
  • Added some more intro text to Renegade.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Bowman headsets now appear in the Cargo lockers.

PoZe updated:

  • Carps and spiders no longer targe shields intentionally. They will attack shields only if adjacent or have to get to their target through shields.
  • All ranged hostile mobs will now shoot at shields, if their target is behind a shield.
  • Hostile mobs now try and attack you 10 tiles away. But ranged mobs will still have to get within 6 tiles to shoot.

04 January 2020

Geeves updated:

  • Tableslams now properly have cooldowns.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Suit sensor monitoring program ported to VueUI and ui compacted.
  • Added integrated computer device to borgs, AIs and pAIs.
  • Removed now reduandant subsystems.
  • Fixed integrated computing device hud icon not working.

Leudoberct1 updated:

  • Adds a new away site in the form of a Kataphract chapter with 7 playable ghost roles.
  • Adds the kataphract chapter map to the away site rotation.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed some more hard deletion bugs.

MattAtlas, Geeves updated:

  • Added three new gamemodes: Tower Defense, Bughunt, Spy vs. Spy.
  • Bughunt, mercenary and borer, needs twenty required players and five required enemies.
  • Borers have received some miscellaneous fixes and tweaks across the board. They should overall work better now.
  • Borers can now awaken psionics in their hosts. Maybe it's not a bad idea to get a brain slug after all...
  • Spy vs. Spy, traitor and renegade, needs four required players.
  • Changed how renegades work a bit. You're not traitors! You're paranoid people who smuggled a gun to work and are working to keep themselves safe. You can still murder given enough reasoning to.
  • Tower Defense, mercenary, heist and ninjas, needs thirty required players and ten required enemies. Good luck!

03 January 2020

Aboshehab updated:

  • Adjusted heat tolerances of all IPC species to differentiate between types, letting it be more forgiving.
  • Brute, resist and grab modifier changes to species dependant on type.
  • Moves IPC abilities to their own tab for visibility and ease of use.
  • Adds a crush verb that is usable by G2.
  • Implements a variety new attack options to IPC species.
  • Makes heat discomfort levels universally to be 100 units under the first heat level for all IPC species.
  • Sorts out issues with voidsuit/hardsuit for Bishops and Zeng-Hu.
  • Adjusts Zeng-Hu Frame speed to be more inline with their lore.
  • Adjusts Xion Frame speed to be slightly faster than the G1 and G2 to emphasize it being lighter.
  • Xions can now go EVA indefinitely.
  • Adjustments to fluff blurbs of IPC subspecies to account for mechanical changes.

Code by Geeves, Sprites by Kyres updated:

  • Fixed hoverthrusters having stepping sounds by giving them no sounds.
  • Adjusted hoverpod sidesprites, not sure what it really does but I trust Kyres.

Ferner updated:

  • Added a combat engineer role for the freelancer mercenary team.
  • Removed most of the station access freelancer mercenaries got.

Goret updated:

  • Ported the t-ray from Baystation. It should now give back an interest into using it, and now has a range of 7x7.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Low pressure screams shouldn't spam your chat anymore.

02 January 2020

Code by Geeves, Sprites by Kyres updated:

  • Fixed the powered hammer's sprites being duplicated instead of mirrored across hands, increased its chance to trigger by 5% (30%).
  • Added a Hegemony version of the powered hammer with orange lights and a 50% chance to trigger.
  • Made the powered hammer reset in 30 seconds instead of 45.
  • Kataphracts now have new voidsuits, no longer will they wear knight armour with ponchos.
  • Added new Unathi non-spaceproof body armour, which is ICly a new update to the old leather looking bodyarmour.
  • K'lax kataphracts share the abovementioned body armour, but now have special modified helmets for all four their eyes.
  • Buffed the K'lax helmet ever so slightly, to be on par with the new Unathi body armour.
  • Fixed the Jixizi dress to be back to its former beautiful glory.
  • Fixed Sinta Jumpsuits allowing you to roll down people's jumpsuits and sleeves from range.

Crosarius updated:

  • Adds checks to some machinery/airlocks/alarms/buttons to preclude forensics items from applying fibers/fingterprints BEFORE you take a sample.
  • Stops fire alarms and remote airlock/blastdoor/etc buttons from being triggered when you use a forensics item on them, in addition to the above changes.
  • Adds a check to the to preclude forensics items from applying fibers/fingterprints BEFORE you take the sample when you put an item in a bag.

Geeves updated:

  • Stationbounds have been added to the Crew Manifest in a Station Equipment catagory. They are not crew. It will also not appear on PDA's (yet).
  • Made the hoverpod torso a bit cheaper to produce. Since it's shit. You know.
  • Fixed the duplicate hoverpod torso entry in the mechfab.
  • Tabling isn't instant anymore, it now needs to timer on the grab to be full. (The action itself is still instant)
  • Clicking on a table with harm intent with a grab will now smash the person's face into the table.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Dionae now have a stomach organ, which means they can devour. It has a bigger capacity than usual.
  • Dionae can now devour big objects as well. Just pick them up and click on yourself while aiming mouth.
  • Unathi can now actually devour tiny items.
  • Unathi can now devour any mob smaller than them.

01 January 2020

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the brown hip holster having no icon.

Ferner updated:

  • The station's christmas decor has been removed, did some misc map fixes including adding some missing shutters, access and other things. Added a no-smoking sign to the kitchen.

Geeves updated:

  • Added a hoverpod mech.
  • Jetpacking downwards while in a mech no longer teleports you through the floor.
  • Mechs with hover thrusters can now float over open turfs, as well as move up and down z-levels.

Goret updated:

  • Cyborgs can now open body trays.
  • Medical cyborgs can now pick up virus samples with their gripper.
  • Added the roller bed rack from the rescue module to the standard medical module.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Robotic limbs now become nonfunctional at about the same health as human limbs.
  • Fixing them now takes more cable/fuel.

31 December 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • Station bounced radio can now be stored in most belts.

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the brown holster selection on the loadout not working.
  • Fixed corporate liaisons and consular officers not having access to employment records.
  • Fixed corporate liaisons and consular officers having a security cartridge on their pda.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Decreased the toxin damage threshold at which damage starts to cascade.

SueTheCake updated:

  • Added phonographs, directly imported from Adhomai. Enjoy the music, comrrrrade.

30 December 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • Both Atmospheric Technicians and Engineering Modules get an impact wrench.
  • Adds a new type of emergency lockers that specialize in inflatables.
  • Adjusted emergency locker types to accomdate the new type.
  • Changes the asset protection hardsuit sprites. Courtesy of Brainos.

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixes examining items not taking in consideration all possible extra examine information.

Geeves updated:

  • Fix Radio Jammers not jamming Vaurcaesian hivenet.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Shrapnel extraction surgery should be far less fucky now.
  • Extracting shrapnel with knives now works far better. It also loops, so you don't have to click extract shrapnel 6 times.
  • Shrapnel no longer contains the name of the weapon it came from in the name.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds the ability to change eye color to all robotic eyes, including IPCs.

29 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Mechs will now trample, dealing brute damaged based on their leg types, mobs that they run over.
  • Mechs can now push most mobs.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed the syndie voidsuit having the wrong sprite for humans.

Geeves updated:

  • Grabs have been lightly buffed across the board. It should be slightly more effective now. Choking does more oxygen damage.
  • It is now more difficult to resist out of grabs, and doing so while you're on the floor is much more difficult.
  • Various species has had their grab mod modified, making them easier or harder to grab.
  • You can no longer strangle people with airtight helmets. (voidsuits, rigs, etc)
  • A new species value, resist mod, has been added. Larger, stronger mobs are easier to grab, but they're much better at resisting out of grabs.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed some deletion problems with silicons.

Skull132 updated:

  • The greeting window no longer malfunctions.

28 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed gibbers, grinders and robotics fabricator not catching long hair.

Geeves updated:

  • Vaurca antennae no longer get pulled by machinery.

Leudoberct1 updated:

  • Replaces the pickaxes in research EVA prep with mining drills.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Cleaned up the backend limb code a bit.
  • Psiping is now activated by activating an empty hand.
  • Commune is now activated by clicking on someone while aiming for the mouth.
  • Cooldowns have been lowered for both.
  • Psiping and Commune no longer make sounds.
  • Toy figurines now only do the cool action when you activate them instead of when you click them, so you can actually remove them from your pockets.

27 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Diona can now change their skintone, to make their bark(?) ligther or darker.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixes suitstore being displayed twice in examine, fixes suit not being displayed.

Geeves and Mwahahahaha updated:

  • Items will now say whether they have extra examine info, and allow you to view them.
  • You can now examine people that are in exosuits.
  • You can now examine the stuff people are wearing and wielding by left clicking on the hyperlink on their examine.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Fixes computers so there main UI closes on shutdown.
  • Added printers to all modular consoles presets

MattAtlas updated:

  • The side effects from Bicaridine and Kelotane have been removed.
  • Forensics autopsies no longer show the exact name of the gun used to shoot someone.

Skull132 updated:

  • All CMCs are replaced with medical preset computers.
  • Replaced all records computers with modular computers. All heads of staff get their job specific version with employment records too.
  • Gave all heads of staff a command laptop with employment records.

26 December 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed the digsite dungeon's airlock air sensor having the wrong frequency.

Lady Fowl updated:

  • Refactors Frontier Alliance to Coalition namesake due to lore changes.
  • Remove ATLAS items from loadout/code due to lore changes.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Hydration and hunger slowdowns now only occur at lower stages.
  • Changed the regurgitate action button icon to a stomach.

Mwahahahaha updated:

  • Shaking people on the floor now has you offer a hand out to them like a true civilised person. The person on the floor must click on that civilised person with help intent to be helped up.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Tobacco products are now affordable and more numerous.

Skull132 updated:

  • Powered crossbow now properly consumes the energy cell when applied.

aleksix updated:

  • Integrated Circuit list elements can now be properly edited in-place

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixes the science armband icon.
  • Fixes the science armband not appearing on the player.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added a new modular psionics system ported from Baystation/Europa.
  • Skrell have lost their abilities tab. Instead, they now spawn as natural psionics. Shift click the psi hub on the right to find out how to use your power. Click the hub to activate them.

PoZe updated:

  • Big(14 tiles) explosions will no longer freeze the server.
  • During explosions Air, Processing, Machinery, Mobs AI subsytems are temporrary suspended until explosions processing is finished.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes missing shoes pixel properly this time.

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed white shoes missing their sprites.

  • Added record computer programs that can print records..
  • Yes, now you can print records again.

PoZe updated:

  • Added sounds to mech's punch. They are different for each mech arms type and volume depends on damage of arms.
  • Ripley's arms damage was increased to 40 damage.

  • Poll Window now uses VueUi theme/styles.

22 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed the highly lethal poison pen from the pen kit at the traitor uplink.
  • Added basic research access to the research shuttle.
  • Fixed heads and groins being nearly impossible to dismember.
  • Hands and feet can take more punishment before being dismembered.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed tcfl volunteers spawning without a rank prefix in their name.

Ferner, Kyres1 updated:

  • Replaced mech sprites with brand new ones by Kyres1.
  • Fixed an issue wherein built mechs didn't layer their parts properly.

Goret updated:

  • Removed remains of /tg/ and their nazi uniforms in our codebase.

Leudoberct1 updated:

  • Fixes a disconnected vent in the Xenoarch atrium, fixes an issue with the anomaly scanner in the pit, adds a bookcase.
  • Fixes the protection check in effect.dm to recognise nitrile gloves.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Stethoscopes have been made more modular. They also give better hints now.
  • Added a breathing sound in low pressure with internals active. Except for vaurca.
  • Low pressure damage is now split evenly across all bodyparts, which means it should be quite a bit more lethal.

Naelynn updated:

  • Added a new song to the Jukebox!.

PoZe updated:

  • Pipes no longer call hard delete when destroyed. This makes them not slowdown/freeze server during explosions due to them no longer being deleted immediately, but rather use queued delete.

Talkarcabbage updated:

  • Substantially decreased supermatter delamination rate in complete vacuum.

21 December 2019

Alberyk, Coalf, Kyres, Menown, Memescopemcgee and Suethecake updated:

  • Changed Tajara citizenship options to better represent the lore.
  • Added more loadout options to the Tajara Xenogear selection.
  • Added Adhomian cigarettes.
  • Tajara can no longer be Necropolis contractors.

Crosarius updated:

  • Bullet_act now passes on the fact that the weapon used is a bullet, as well as the weapon that fired said bullet. This means that autopsies will now show gunshot wounds.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed a specific cigar lacking a butt sprite.

Geeves updated:

  • Added indicators to a drill's health in the hardpoint display and drill examine.

Geeves and Scrambles300 updated:

  • The Bishop frame has been resprited.
  • The Bishop frame now has body markings called Bishop Lights, which is used to change the lights of the Bishop.

Leudoberct1 updated:

  • Resizes xenoarch to be larger, adds a chem dispenser, chem master, sink, another anomaly suit, portable scrubber, portable air pump, A/C heater. Moves a few things around too.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds two new masks - dust masks and cloth masks. They can be found in the loadout in a new tab. Sterile masks have been renamed to surgical masks to match their real-life counterpart.
  • Equipped masks in the loadout should spawn properly equipped on your character on spawn.
  • Grammar has been fixed with adjusting masks, and the top left action icon should update properly.
  • New sprites for breathmasks and gas masks.

20 December 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Added a public stairwell at the aft of the facility, connecting the main and surface levels.
  • Tweaked parts of maintenance.
  • Added a scanner bed to the ft's autopsy lab, added an additional cyborg analyzer to robotics. Security's and the captain's bathrooms can now be locked.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Fixed the advanced scanner not printing a brain activity result.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds chewing tobacco, rolling tobacco, rolling papers, cigarette filters to the cigarette vendors! (Note : these brands are provisional at the moment)
  • New sprites for cigarettes and related stuff.

Wowzewow (Wezzy), AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Tweaks various shoes sprites.
  • New Oxford shoes selection and Workboots selection : Check your loadout!
  • New toeless workboots.

19 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed the gear crates not showing up in the mercenary uplink.

Geeves updated:

  • Players with accounts too young to be antagonists now properly cannot select those roles. No more empty gamemodes.

Leudoberct1 updated:

  • Removes the potential for artifacts with the low level energy emissions or concentrated energy effects.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Devour and regurgitate are no longer verbs.
  • Devouring now depends entirely on the stomach.
  • Instead, to devour mobs, get a red grab on them and click on yourself while aiming for the mouth.
  • To throw up, you'll have an action button at the top left to empty your stomach. Keep in mind it'll be a forced action, so it won't look good.
  • You can now devour food items, too.

PoZe updated:

  • Mech printer now prints the right type of regular armor, instead of borg armor.
  • Mech's melee damage has been increased. It depends on manipulator type. Light: 15, Regular: 20, Combat 30, Heavy: 50.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • You can now wear the wet floor sign in your suit slot.
  • Adjusts the wet floor sign sprite.

18 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed mecha hoverpod chassis using the wrong material.
  • Fixed click and dragging causing weird behavior with drop pods.
  • Species job restrictions are now enforced in the occupation panel.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Emergency Maintenance can now be enabled/disabled from the command console.
  • Updates the Cargo Shipping Invoice for Cargo Oders.

Ferner updated:

  • Forensics equipment will no longer go invisible in some states.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixed Unathi clothing being slightly pink.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Security's base nonlethal equipment - tasers and rubbers - is now a bit better.
  • Fixed teargas doing practically nothing.
  • Fixed a lot of stuff not applying pain damage. Ow.
  • Fixed undefined values on the CMC.
  • Fixed dionae not regenerating damage.
  • You can now adjust more organs to be mechanical in character setup.

SonicGotNuked updated:

  • Borg Combat Module now unlocks with synthetic domination. It only activates on all the current borgs, not the later ones.
  • Removes code delta from elite encryption hack
  • Replaces code delta with code yellow
  • Borgs come out of the robot transformer hacked
  • Combat Borgs no longer have a laser cannon
  • Seperates traitor borg powers into a seperate verbs tab for you to actually know about
  • Autoborger now tells admins that it made a borg
  • You shouldn't know what the Autoborger is at a glance. It has a more descriptive description
  • It now tells players that they are lobotomized
  • Removes all borgs being emagged. Malf will have to manually hack each borg now.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • New sprites for holsters, ties, badges, press passes and offworlder accessories.
  • New selection of holsters and ties. Check your loadouts!

17 December 2019

Geeves updated:

  • The e-pistol now has seven shots, up from five.
  • The lethal e-pistol now does 35 damage, up from 30.

PoZe updated:

  • Mechs no longer runtime during destroy call.
  • Turrets and NPCS no longer target empty mechs.
  • Mechs no longer runtime during armor check. Mechs now use their armor and values for it. Before it would ignore them entirely and deal 100% damage.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Adds new forensic cards! Mark out your crimescene with these useless plastic cards! Can be found in boxes in Forensics.
  • Dropsounds. Again.
  • Tweaks some sprites regarding forensics.

16 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Pain should no longer create phantom wounds when examining yourself.
  • Mech moving and turning sounds nows depends on their leg type.
  • Ported the pod mech chassis from baystation.
  • Mech arms now overlay above their cockpit.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Cyborg rescue module now has adrenaline in its hypospray.
  • Chemistry gripper renamed to medical gripper since it's used for way more than just chemistry.
  • Medical grippers can now hold blood bags, med cups, and paper cups.

Geeves updated:

  • Falling down a z-level without rolling now has a chance to dislocate the limb you land on.
  • Kataphract K'lax now properly need a species whitelist to join.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Non-glass beakers no longer break when thrown. Additionally, glass beakers have been made more fragile, as they were nearly impossible to break by throwing.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Shells now have a heartbeat on the medhud.
  • Burns now evaporate people's blood. Lasers evaporate less as they are more concentrated, while wide burns evaporate more.
  • Adrenaline has been nerfed.

15 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed playable vox from the merchant and heist gamemode.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Removed both the side effects for bicaridine and kelotane and replaced them with a low drowsiness. Bicaridine metabolism rate reduced by 66% (REM * 0.5). Kelotane and Dermaline metabolism rate reduced by 90% (REM * 0.5). Atropine causes weakness and a heartrate increase. Atropine toxin damage increased from 1 to 2 per unit.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Removed K'ois delivery pods and other rare vaurca items from the christmas gifts. Why were those a thing.

Geeves updated:

  • Sinta Tunics can now be rolled down.
  • Tweaked unathi clothing colours to be properly recolourable.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • The AI start of round role info no longer references traitor AIs, which were removed months ago.

MattAtlas updated:

  • The cloning bay has been destroyed and rebuilt into a custodial closet. All cloning equipment is now gone from the NSS Aurora.
  • You can no longer print cloning circuit boards.
  • Skeletons are no longer immortal.
  • Removed leftover brain damage effects.

Naelynn updated:

  • Allows Vox spike throwers to be worn on the belt slot.

14 December 2019

PoZe updated:

  • Added yellow and green pens
  • Multi-color pens now also have yellow and green.
  • Added 4 special pens. Red pen - poison pen, blue pen - pacifier pen, green pen - healing pen, yellow pen - hyperzine pen.
  • Added 4 special pens kit to traitor uplink, random kit and special ops cargo.

aleksix updated:

  • Re-introduced the min/max circuits for integrated circuitry
  • Borgs ID access code has been refactored to the normal ID access code. Now they properly check for access in PDAs, hands and such.

13 December 2019

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Pets have more discipline regarding food. They will no longer beg for food, seek it out, run towards it, steal it, or eat like there's an endless void in their stomachs. They'll still eat food on their tile if sufficiently hungry, and you can still feed pets by hand, if you'd like. Chefs, rejoice!
  • Corgi stomach capacity adjusted to a way more sane level.
  • Removed guilty messages about pets starving when you examine them; they won't go hungry in a single shift, don't worry.
  • You can brush most friendly animals. Combs work for fuzzy and feathered animals, rags work on other ones.
  • There's a small chance that when you pet a guard dog (like Columbo) on help intent (and aren't his master), he won't immediately maul your face off; instead, he will growl at you to warn you not to do that. I still don't recommend it.
  • Like other pets, baby carp can eat now. But not a lot.
  • You'll no longer spray yourself with bottles or pepperspray when placing it into your bag, jacket, webbing, or a container you're holding, even with the safety off.

Ferner updated:

  • Flags can now be placed onto windows directly.
  • Bluespace technicians and newly spawned human mobs from ghostspawners for example will no longer start out hungry/thirsty.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added a fancy new health doll.
  • Organ scarring now shows on scanners.

Naelynn updated:

  • Fixed a rare bug making station safe impossible to crack.

12 December 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • Re-adds the old styled military jackets.

DanseMacabre updated:

  • Sprite changes for a number of guns, courtesy of AmoryBlaine.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Sterile gloves boxes have had their contents adjusted. Instead of 4x latex gloves and 3x nitrile gloves, they have 2x latex gloves and 5x nitrile gloves.
  • Added nitrile glove variants for Unathi and Tajara.
  • Replaced most instances of latex gloves with nitrile gloves, and made xeno variants far more accessible. Latex allergies are no joke, kids.
  • Changed the icon for the sterile gloves box to show a blue glove icon instead of white.

Leudoberct1 updated:

  • Fixes the airlock vents in the digsite unique dungeon to function properly.
  • Makes Vaurca tunnel cloaks colour customisable in the loadout screen.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Some tweaks to the Unathi bull horns sprite, as well as a longer version.
  • Slight fixes on the forward demon horns. My bad.
  • Implanters no longer require illegal tech.

aleksix updated:

  • Integrated Circuits pins will now accept lists.

10 December 2019

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Taking a drag of your cigarette now smokes it slightly faster. Good for finishing up a cig before going into medical.
  • Added a check to prevent spamming audio/message logs with taking a drag from a cigarette. You can still smoke it down by clicking fast, but it only displays the message/sound if it's been at least three seconds since the last one.

MattAtlas, MoondancerPony, Geeves updated:

  • An entirely new medical system! Holy balls that's a lot of changes.
  • Pain has been SUBSTANTIALLY changed. It now depends on total damage to all your limbs.
  • Traumas no longer happen due to oxyloss.
  • Inaprovaline has been renamed to norepinephrine and viceversa.
  • CPR has been fixed up a bit. It has a small chance to restart hearts and can work with or without mouth-to-mouth.
  • Humans no longer die when hitting 200 damage. Dionae, IPCs, grues and zombies are exceptions.
  • Humans now die when their brain dies. For the brain to die, it must not have oxygen for quite a while.
  • Suffocation damage is now a modifier to blood. If you don't have much oxygen, then you'll get the effects of low blood.
  • Toxins now directly target organs. They'll try to destroy the liver and kidneys first... then move onto other organs. Be careful.
  • All organs in the body now work towards making sure the brain lives. The liver filters toxins, the kidneys do the same, the lungs provide oxygen, the heart pumps blood and so on.
  • Humans now have two new stats: blood oxygenation and blood pressure, shown on sensors and scanners. Blood pressure depends on how well your heart is pumping your blood. Blood oxygenation depends on how well your blood is oxygenated.
  • Your heart can now stop when your pulse is too high. Your pulse depends on many factors - like pain or how much blood your brain wants. A heart in asystole cannot pump blood, meaning your brain will suffocate.
  • When your heart stops, you go into asystole, aka flatlining. This can be fixed with CPR. Make sure that you fix the causes first... or they'll just go into asystole again.
  • Norepinephrine stabilizes your heartrate. This is a VERY important fact, do NOT forget this. Norepinephrine will be your best tool!
  • Tricordazine recipe is now 1u epinephrine 1u dylovene.
  • Adrenaline has been added. Its recipe is 1u norepinephrine 1u hyperzine 1u dexalinplus.
  • Bicaridine recipe is now 1u norepinephrine 1u carbon.
  • Inaprovaline recipe is now 1u atropine 0.1u phoron 1u adrenaline.
  • Paroxetine recipe is now 1u mindbreaker 1u acetone 1u norepinephrine.
  • Nightlife recipe is now 1u methylphenidate 1u synaptizine 1u nitroglycerin.
  • RMT recipe is now 1u potassium 1u norepinephrine.
  • Ondansetron, a chemical that prevents vomiting and nausea, is made with 1u antihistamine 1u synaptizine 1u water.
  • Dexalin and dexalin+ no longer straight up heal oxyloss. Instead, they now fool your brain into thinking that it has 50% oxygen and 80% oxygen respectively.
  • Alkysine now only heals the brain if it's properly oxygenated.
  • Added a stomach organ. This controls reagent ingestion and food ingestion.
  • Added a stomach pump mode to sleepers to pump INGESTED reagents out of people's stomach.
  • Peridaxon now heals brain damage, if it's not damaged much at all.
  • Dylovene no longer outright heals toxin damage. Instead, it removes toxin reagents from the blood.
  • New side effects to most healing chems. Be careful.
  • Deltamivir now inflicts a fever. Be careful, going overboard with the dosage can give you a pretty bad one. Try not to go over 20 units at once.
  • Bicaridine now gives you muscle spasms.
  • Kelotane makes you drop your held items. Dermaline does the same, as it is now a subtype.
  • Throwing beakers now shatters them. Be careful.
  • Numbers have been deleted from scanners. Mostly. Stop using terms like brute and burn damage, boys.
  • Taking a good chunk of damage at once now produces adrenaline. Acts like a painkiller and raises your pulse. Might also restart your heart.
  • Soulstones work only when someone's in asystole.
  • Changed how getting organ damage works. Lasers now deal organ damage.
  • Most organs can now take more punishment.
  • The head is now harder to hit.
  • The organ damage dealt now depends on the size of the organ in the area you hit.
  • Surgery pain is MUCH higher if you're awake.
  • Self surgery works again.
  • Using a scalpel on necrotic organs now fixes the necrosis. However, it'll also lower the organ's max damage as well.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Circuitry goggles have a sprite again now.

09 December 2019

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Fixed an issue where players could not select individual pieces of the target doll, nor upgrade their grab strength by clicking.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Removes Soylent Green from the game.
  • Soylent Viridians has been changed to simply Soy Wafers.

08 December 2019

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • In order to facilitate holiday commercialism, you no longer need wirecutters in hand to wrap a gift. You also no longer need a table; the ground works just fine.
  • Tidied up description text when examining a roll of wrapping paper.
  • If you are on harm intent and click yourself with a bottle, there is now a popup that asks you to confirm if you really intended to smash it over your face, instead of just doing it.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed the mech rfd, and the extinguisher will now have a proper name.

Ferner, Leudoberct updated:

  • Added a new possible random dungeons, mapped by Leudoberct.

Geeves updated:

  • The safety timeperiod between entering cryo and being cryo'd has been changed from 10 minutes to 2 minutes, due to people not ghosting.
  • If you are in cryo for 5 minutes, you will be despawned even if you're still logged on.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • New sprites for money, lotto cards and chargecards.

07 December 2019

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Wallets can now hold rings.
  • Removes seasonal pumpkin spice lattes from the vendors, to return next year.
  • Crafted donut boxes can hold six donuts again.

Ferner updated:

  • Remapped the merchant shuttle and outpost.
  • Merchant assistants can now be from a wider range of species.

Geeves updated:

  • Gave Admins a gigashatter proc, which will fracture every single bone in your body. Fear the wrath of the redname.

JohnWildkins updated:

  • Ported BS12 fixes for visualnets.
  • Camera MIU and other non-AI eye mobs should no longer run into issues with obfuscation layers.

Leudoberct1 updated:

  • Removes the Ripley APLU construction guide in robotics due to being obsolete.

Naelynn updated:

  • Added bulk-buy function to the merchant. Less spamming click to buy things!

Nero-07 updated:

  • Added the ability to force a holocall if you have a head id. Forced calls automatically go through and can only be ended by the sender stepping off the pad.

kyres1 updated:

  • Added Freelance mercenary sprites and a cycler in their base.
  • Added the Rhino hardsuit, the freelancer's own hardsuit with roughly merc hardsuit statistics with some extra modules and modified resists.
  • Resprited all mercenary/syndicate gear, adopting a more rusty crimson color scheme over the former cartoonish neon red ones.

05 December 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • Fixes a minor sprite issue with the black Idris Duster Coat.
  • Fixed duplicate logs from going up and down z-levels.

Geeves, Wezzy, BRAINOS updated:

  • Added a Klaxan Kataphract Hopeful to the Kataphract response team.
  • The Kataphracts now start with better and more stylized gear.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Players will no longer eat mixed gemstone stacks when attempting to separate them. It was very unsanitary.

Nero-07 updated:

  • Fixed formatting and typo when examining mechas

ParadoxSpace & AmoryBlaine updated:

  • Adds some new Unathi horn styles.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • New bedsheet, lantern and penlight inhands.
  • Extinguishing cigarettes in the ashtray should play the sound properly now.
  • You can put cigarette butts in cigarette packets.
  • Tweaks power drill sprites.
  • Health analysers should show the proper inhands now.
  • Fixes some more drop sounds.

04 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Added the rosary to the loadout options.
  • The rosary no longer automatically spawns in holy books that have bible sprites.

03 December 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • TCFL are now properly inclusive. You can select any of the station species when joining as the TCFL.
  • You can now properly join freelancer mercenaries as an IPC
  • Added more options for IRU coats. There are now 3 different types either in black or brown.
  • Idris contractors can join forensic roles.
  • Added gasmasks to officer lockers.

Ferner updated:

  • Reworked the contents of the Legion's garages to work better with the recent mech updates.
  • Added some new exclusive weaponry for Legion combat ripleys.
  • Reworked the way mech decals are added so they get the proper colors applied to them.
  • Fixed some mech equipment that lacked an icon or had the wrong name set.

Geeves updated:

  • Unathi, Vaurca and Tajara no longer always spawn with sandals, loadout shoes will replace them properly.
  • The ninja's RIG is now DNA locked to that SPECIFIC ninja. If ANYONE else wears it, they will activate the anti-intrusion countermeasures.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Added a new chemical, dextrotoxin. It is made somewhat wastefully with carpotoxin, soporific, and phoron.
  • Dextrotoxin briefly makes it hard to walk straight before paralyzing you. People under the effects of dextrotoxin cannot move or use the radio, but can still speak.
  • Dextrotoxin replaces zombie powder in any antagonist item that previously contained it. Zombie powder is still possible to manufacture.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds five more loadout points. Spend them wisely.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes christmas lights north sprite flipping for no reason.
  • Adds a second bartender slot.

kyres1 updated:

  • Added a new set of R&D suits available in toxins, telescience and expedition prep on the sublevel.
  • Resprited the AMI suit.

02 December 2019

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Space A/Cs will now start with a heavy duty cell instead of a basic cell that dies in half a minute.
  • Space A/Cs now heat and cool slightly faster.
  • Space A/Cs can now be emagged, which increases the range they can heat and cool, as well as improving their efficiency. Temperature-sensitive species, Tremble!
  • Interacting with space A/Cs is slightly different. If the panel is closed and you click it, it brings up the interface menu, which allows you to turn it on and off, as well as adjust the temperature. Before, the panel needed to be opened for you to adjust the temperature.
  • Power cells in space A/Cs are no longer removed via menu; if the panel is open, you only need to click with an empty hand to remove it, or click with a cell in-hand to insert it.
  • Borgs should now be able to change the power cells of space A/Cs.

Ferner updated:

  • Fixed some animals missing their inhand sprites. Fixed some wizard familiars missing their sprites.

Geeves updated:

  • Surgery sites now have icon overlays, you can now physically see incisions and retracted ribcages.
  • Roller beds have been buffed to be 80% safe to operate on, up from 75%
  • Using surgery tools on unsafe surfaces (rollerbeds, tables) no longer ATTACKS the patient.
  • Fixed organ repair surgery not properly repairing the organ.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Xenos can now select colors for their footwraps, instead of just generic white.

MattAtlas updated:

  • You can no longer speak into a radio while restrained.
  • The icon of the device you're using to speak into a radio is no longer shown in a message.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Rechargers, including wall chargers, cyborg rechargers and heavy duty cell chargers - have had their recharge speed increased by 50%. Their power demand has been increased by the same proportion. Their energy efficiency is roughly the same, they are just faster.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes invisible surgeon shoes.
  • Fixes donut boxes examine not working properly, and surgery tray description being one of a donut box.

01 December 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed vox raiders not being given an ID and headset.

Arrow768 updated:

  • You are no longer able to join the game with unacknowledged warnings.
  • Fixes the MoTD not showing.

Furrycactus, Doxxmedearly updated:

  • The month of a certain over-commercialised holiday and tacky decorations has begun. NanoTrasen has seen fit to leave no public hall, break room, Head of Staff (+Quartermaster, how generous) office spared of holiday decor, and no Civilian department workspace bare of tacky flashing holiday lights. They even put a gaudily decorated tree in the bar, with gifts layed under it every shift, and all of the special grass and astroturf on the station has been replaced with Authentic(tm) Snow! Show some holiday spirit, and spend money on the newest flashiest devices for your friends and family.
  • Removed trash and added new items to list of contents for xmas gifts.
  • Cleaned up the list of gift givers by removing some memes and adding new names.
  • Gifts will spawn randomly as small, medium, or large.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Gemstones now spawn properly. Sorry.

30 November 2019

Aboshehab updated:

  • Manhacks no longer attack ninjas.
  • Fixed Idris caps not showing on mobs.

Doxxmedearly updated:

  • Allows players to cut down plastic flaps and curtains, using wirecutters or other cutting objects.
  • Allows you to construct all curtains (except plastic curtains) from cloth, requiring two pieces each.
  • Most curtains begin anchored (Medical curtains do not). You can anchor and unanchor curtains with a screwdriver.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Gemstones can now be found in mined rocks! They come in six different flavors and four sizes, with increasing rarity!
  • Gemstones can be sent to centcomm for extra cargo funds. For now, this is their only function.

SonicGotNuked updated:

  • Reduced Systemoveride time by half

Wowzewow updated:

  • Adds movement states for some animals, and improves sprites of some mobs.

28 November 2019

Ferner, Kyres1 updated:

  • Slightly tweaked the appearance of the legion rig's shoes.

Geeves updated:

  • The guest pass terminal can now give guest passes valid for up to an hour (up from 30 minutes).

MattAtlas updated:

  • Gasping no longer applies extreme amounts of losebreath. Aka, you should recover much much sooner from popped lungs after they're healed.
  • Pulse actually fixed now.

arrow768 updated:

  • The HoS has access to the maint tunnels again.

27 November 2019

MattAtlas updated:

  • Organ damage surgery works correctly now.
  • Dead people no longer have a pulse.

26 November 2019

  • No longer autospawns antagonists during gamemodes with autospawn enabled after a evac or transfer shuttle has been called.
  • Maint access has been tweaked to only allow engineers and heads of staff global access to maint.

Ferner updated:

  • The Republic of Biesel flags are now available in the loadout too.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added surgery goggles to the surgery ORs.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Echoes no longer have the mass warp ability.

25 November 2019

Geeves updated:

  • Standard Cardox grenades now produce a gas explosion, instead of foaming like a cleaner grenade.
  • Cardox now properly gets rids of K'ois and K'ois plants.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Several backend changes regarding human processing.
  • Your heart now handles your blood! If you have no heart, well... you're not gonna bleed, but you're gonna die fast.
  • Fixed a few runtimes.
  • Fixed a few issues with arterial bleeding.
  • Some pain messages have been tweaked.
  • You should now lose more or less blood depending on your pulse.
  • Losing your lungs and your heart is now more severe. Don't lose either one or you'll have a really hard time living.
  • Removed advanced operating tables. They didn't work.

Sue, Alberyk, Datamatt updated:

  • Modular mechs. They are very different than our old mechs, so expect fun things.
  • All old mechs (including tanks) and their equipment were removed.

Wowzewow (Wezzy) updated:

  • Fixes some PDA grammar.
  • You can now switch from writing in cursive to writing normally when using a fountain pen.

Geeves updated:

  • Fixes added Z-Level grab stuff.
