26 April 2019

PoZe updated:

  • KAs now account for atmosphere the shot is fired at. Reducing damage if inside of atmosphere. Maximum damage for KAs to living being is capped at 50 per shot.
  • KAs AOE now damages anything in its range. It looses 25% of damage per tile from the center out of center tile damage(100 -> 75 -> 50 -> 25 -> 0...).
  • Mechs KAs damage was increased, and AOE of 5(That is a lot!) tiles was added. Keep in mind that AOE will damage mech itself if in range. Regular mech KA damage is now 40 per shot. Burst KA damage is now 25 per shot(that is 75 in total).
  • Travis Byond version was bumped to 512.1467.

25 April 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Changes the YouTool in engineering to have a constant stock.
  • The fake, captain and AI announcer now have a larger window where you can enter your announcement.
  • Changes the rigs the heisters have available and adds one additional rig to their shuttle.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • The ability for changelings to stack Absorb DNA has been temporarily removed pending balance changes.

24 April 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Research cyborg's portable destructive analyzer can now only load items with research tech.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Fixes an issue where the emergency leap of the void projector would not teleport the user.

DrHobo2k15 updated:

  • Adds cable coil, destination taggers, hand labellers, engineering debuggers, and basic stock parts to autolathes. Also adds health, atmos and plant analyzers to the protolathe, and illegal implanters.

PoZe updated:

  • Simple mobs hunger values were rebalance to be more realistic. Mobs affected: cats, corgies, foxes, dogs, mice. Most animals would last 30-40 minutes, with exception of mice being 20 minutes. Mice king values progress as it levles up.
  • Simple mobs max nutrition values were reworked. No longer you need to feed IAN 6 steaks until its full.
  • Mob size values have been changed to more logical for following mobs: cat, corgi, fox, dog, pug.
  • When simple mobs nutrition is 5% or less, they will start seeking food. Even guarded dogs(because they are starving).
  • Penny's rest sprites have been fixed and work now.
  • Starving simple mobs will try and steal food from people's hands instead of begging. They will still beg if they are just hungry.

  • Fixed the vaurca clothes icon.

  • Zo'ra Soda drinks now have a higher overdose limit, allowing humans to drink them without great suffering. Sorry about that.

31 March 2019

PoZe updated:

  • Gravity generator now is affected by any power change in the area. Hence when APC looses power so does the gravity generator, and gains otherwise.
  • Gravity generator no longer process gravity change if no change happened. This will stop message appearing about gravity change when none happened.
  • Entering the area without gravity or losing gravity in the area now produces a notice message.

24 March 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Off-worlder loadout should be available now.
  • Off-worlder humans can now use robotic limbs.

PoZe updated:

  • Timers now have sanity checks, if wait time is negative or infinite. Or if there is no callback or if object is about to be deleted or already deleted. Gives call stack for negative wait time and deleted object. Crashes if wait time is infinite.
  • Beams now have sanity check if it was trying to call timer with infinite wait time.

Skull132 updated:

  • Off-worlders subspecies of humans are now playable. Please do read their lore though before playing!
  • Upped the amount of "sleep" a person is held at when under anesthesia. This should lessen the occurances of people waking up mid-surgery while under the gas.

23 March 2019

Ferner updated:

  • Added a simian testing pen to the upstairs virology lab. Fixed an unlabeled airlock. Emptied a filing cabinet in maintenance that contained the full crew medical records.

Founded by BurgerBB, tweaked and improved by PoZe updated:

  • Lighters can set people on fire when used if the person is covered in fuel. Towels can help extinguish flames slightly more effectively than patting people out.
  • Fire Extinguishers are good at taking out fires. Foam solution is 3 time stronger than water.
  • Drop rolling in extinguisher foam uses foam to extinguish fire.
  • Atmos suit max temperature threshold was increased from 30k to 40k. Atmos firefighter suit max temperature was increased from 30k to 45k. Heavy firesuit max temperature was increased from 30k to 55k. Same goes for their helmets
  • Firesuits and red/white/atmos hardhats no longer protect wearer from pressure. So people cannot use it in space. For areas with 2000+ KPa fire people need to use atmos voidsuit.
  • Cyborg recharge station now refills fire extinguisher in all cyborgs.
  • Fire now produces CO2 with rate varing by amount of fire.
  • Firesuit sprite has been updates to show gloves visually, since it covers gloves slot.

PoZe updated:

  • Due to recent change that makes fire produce CO2 SM waste handling system has been upgraded. It now has high volume pump to support high flow of waste. It also is connected to tha scrubbers network to dump waste directly into atmo's main filtering system. You can still use canisters if you want. Engineers are recommended to make waste system dump waste directly into scrubbers network for best result.
  • Fire no longer produces CO2 exponetially. Now linearly.

22 March 2019

Ferner updated:

  • The raider shuttle will no longer rip out parts of the floor in the engineering sublevel when departing from under the station.

21 March 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed an issue with some hardsuit and items missing their icons, such as the industrial and hazmat hardsuits.

WowzewoW updated:

  • Overhauls most food and drink sprites into one consistent artstyle.
  • Changed potted plant sprites to be more consistent across the board.
  • Adds flavortext to some plants.

ben10083 updated:

  • Replaced pens in IAA Office with mutlicolored ones.

20 March 2019

PoZe updated:

  • Robotics lab now can construct RIGs. Currently allowed designs are: EVA, CE, industiral, AMI, hazard(Security), combat, hacker(illegal), stealth(illegal, shitty ninja knockoff). The process of construction is similar to Mechs. Civillian RIGs require wires, central board, steel sheets. Combat(and illegal) RIGS require: wires, central board, control and targeting board, advanced scanning module, steel sheets, plasteel sheets. All circuit boards for RIGS are now in RND research designs. RIG assembly frames need to be researched prior to them showing up in fabricator. For more information check WIKI page about process and other things.
  • Hazard suit bullet and radiation armour is slightly increased.
  • Industrial suit bullet armour is slightly decreased.
  • Stealth suit now has slightly better armour than hacker suit.
  • Combat suit armour values have been slightly reduced to be lower than adminbus RIGS. Also Combat suit is not restricted only to Human species.
  • Combat suit sprite has been updated to match NT colouring for security. Thanks to Kyres
  • Rig modules now have categories. Each rig now has a list of allowed categories, so for example medical rig cannot have engineering or combat modules installed unless they were pre-installed. Antag rigs have no restrictions, same goes for HAPT.
  • ERT suits are now more specialized. Command suit is the only suit that can have any category installed. ERT security RIGs can only have general, combat, special modules. ERT engineering RIGs can only have general, combat, engineering, mining. ERT medical rigs can only have general, combat, medical modules. ERT janitor can obly have general, combat, jantor modules.

19 March 2019

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Made IPC antennae recolorable.

18 March 2019

Arrow768 & Ferner updated:

  • Removed the Virologist and Chemist. Replaced it with the Pharmacist and Biochemist
  • Renamed the medical chemistry to pharmacy
  • Remapped Virology and related areas

Drago updated:

  • Plushies are no longer impassable
  • Fixes recorders not being emagable
  • Teleportation trait now uses do_teleport instead of forcemove
  • Fixed the o2 medkit icon
  • Changelings can no longer be disarmed
  • APC's can no longer be placed in the explored mining areas
  • Add's the Quik-Pay transaction system to make civilian transactions easier.

PoZe updated:

  • Added Kinetic accelerator to mechs. RND can now research and make these Kinetc accelerators. There is a regular and a burst(3 shots) version. It will be better than average-decent man-held KA.
  • Added flamethrower for mechs. RND can now research and make this flamethrower. Works like man-held flamethrower.
  • Added flamethrower sound.
  • The LBX AC 10 "Scattershot" now uses shotgun sound effect.
  • Hermes mech armour values has beeen rework. No longer it has bullet protection of millitary grade mech, and brute protection of a baby. Bomb protection increased, and fire protection decreased.
  • Fixed fire spam of burst mech weapons. Before if you click fast enough you were able to bypass cooldown x number of times in a row for burst mech weapons.
  • Hydraulic clamp now loads all of the ores from a tile in one click into the box of mech. Just like mining satchel.

  • Fixes the berry muffin recipe.

  • Jump To Mob now works properly and let's you jump to any mob in the world.

  • Admin Jump to Mob was renamed, because byond confused with with player's Jump To Mob and was using it.

  • The chance to get a ERT or the TCFL is now based on the progression of the round.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Unathi now have the same list for facial hair and head hair. Enjoy any combination of flavors.

PoZe updated:

  • Space carp and shark sprites were replace by something less fishy. Wizard shark familiar still uses old sprites.
  • Space carp and shark now have resting sprites.

10 March 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Organized the occupation selection menu to better accommodate the intern positions.

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added some tajaran related gear to the merchant console.

PoZe updated:

  • Ranged hostile mobs now have a var that shows if they are smart. Smart ranged mobs check if they can hit their target avoiding friendly fire or obstacles.
  • Currently all ranged hostile mobs are designated as smart.
  • Hivebot spawn beacon has now chance of spawning different kinds of bots each cycle, and has a spawn delay between each.

09 March 2019

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds new duffelbag sprites. As well, they can now hold more at the cost of a slowdown.

05 March 2019

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Added 3 new hairstyles.

04 March 2019

LordFowl updated:

  • It is easier to grab Unathi, and harder to grab Skrell, Dionaea, and Vaurca Warriors.
  • Unathi and large species are more effective at headbutting.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Synthetic bipeds on the station can now use the Self-Diagnostics verb to check their health more accurately.

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Changed hugs on help intent to tapping. No more awkward hug misclicks.

01 March 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Aut'akh can now properly heal their chest, groin and head.

PoZe updated:

  • Tesla grounding rods now are accounted for how many miniballs can main Tesla have to be contained. Ratio is 1 rod can contain 4 miniballs. Once Tesla has more miniballs then rods can contain it will start to melt things in this priorty: coils, grounding rods, emitters. Each time Tesla melts one of these it will loose energy level and single miniball.
  • Tesla miniballs no longer zap. Instead they shoot main Tesla ball which shoots one single beamn, which accounts how much power each miniball produces.
  • Tesla now looses more and faster energy with number of miniballs it has. Energy loss changes after 12 balls and after 16 miniballs.

25 February 2019

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added more tajaran cuisine options.

ferner updated:

  • Partioned maintenance in several spots to help prevent maintenance wide loss of atmosphere, changed up cargo, medical, security and research maintenance a bit by adding some points of interest. Made some slight changes to the Supervised Living Center.
  • Added an emergency shower to chemistry, a cyborg recharger to the main level bathroom, a desk lamp to the psych office, an O2 locker outside the bar, a chess set and deck of cards to the dining room, tintable windows to the QM's office, additional vents to surface hallway aft, a chest drawer to the CE's office, and a chair to the CMO's office.
  • Improved the usability of the research request consoles by removing a few and making their tags more specific, added additional airlock access controllers to xenoflora as well as an atmospherics laptop, reintroduced huge air scrubbers to toxins and made those in communal usable from the warden's office.
  • Fixed medical maintenance exterior airlock. Removed the rock from on top of the telecomms solar arrays, fixed missing access requirements at Telescience, turned a steel wall at the kitchen into wood, fixed a button in the QM's office.
  • Fixed sublevel maintenance by separating it into three areas, instead of being a single disconnected area, added missing emergency shutters to the surface conference room and the library, fixed tinted windows in RD's office, added numerous air alarms to areas missing them.

Alberyk updated:

  • Aut'akh graspers can now be selected in the loadout.
  • Aut'akh limbs should behave in a more sane way when removed or replaced.

LordFowl updated:

  • Damage mods now only apply to positive damage. Ie a species that takes 2x damage is no longer healed twice as much also.

20 February 2019

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Those people wishing to use the explosive implant to truly cause some damage are now capable of it, due to increased yield potentional in the implant.

LordFowl updated:

  • It is now no longer to be electrocuted by merely clicking an exposed power cable with something conductive.
  • It is now possibly to sever a power cable by clicking on it with anything sharp or edgy. Doing so may electrocute you if that object is also conductive.

  • Added back access to unstable mutagen in Xenobotany.
  • Added latex gloves to research eva prep, changed the name of some airlocks to fit better.

  • Rotated the test range in the research sublevel so scientists can be less afraid about blowing up toxins when testing explosive weaponry.

  • HAPT rig armor values were bumped to military rig, plus it has 35 extra energy armor. HAPT rig is removed from rare loot spawn chance.

09 February 2019

Arrow768 updated:

  • Fixes voicechangers not working when used within rigs.

PoZe updated:

  • Skrell who are in shared dream no longer display as SSD.
  • Examining skrell physical body while they are in shared dream will display if their astral body is AFK/disconnected just like normal mob.
  • Shaking, punching, grabbing, pushing, throwing objects, shooting, attacking any carbon mobs while they are willingfully asleep wakes them up instantly. Skrell in a shared dream will recieve a message if their physical body is being disturbed, message will be different depending on severity of disturbance. If their health is below 50% and they are being attacked/shot/thrown stuff at, they will be forcefully woken up.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Fixes alignment and size disparity issues with Vaurca feet sprites.

31 January 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • Red nightshade should bess less lethal now.

30 January 2019

PoZe updated:

  • Tesla Engine SMES is now set to input/output by default, so that newly remapped APC doesn't run out of charge.

29 January 2019

Alberyk updated:

  • The tau ceti foreign legion should now have access to air alarms and most medical vending machines.
  • The tau ceti foreign legion base should now have a ChemMaster.

PoZe updated:

  • SMES can no be marked on map as critical, which will exclude them in power grid check event. Tesla and SM engine SMES are now marked as critical.
  • Blast doors can now be mapped as critical, which will prevent them from being affected if area lost power, they will remain in same state as they were.
  • SM emergency ventilation blast door is labeled as critical. Same goes for reactor blast doors. They are no longer affected by power loss.
  • Tesla Engine APC was remapped and is no connected to the Tesla Engine SMES instead of main SMES. Tesla Engine SMES max default input/output was increased by 150kW to account for the new APC connected, since PA eats lots of power.
  • Vrisk Serket Iced Tea, RD Root Beer, 4no Raisins, Scaredy's Private Reserve Beef Jerky, Razi Snack-corned Beef prices are increased by 100 credits.
  • Updated rust_g.dll and moved defines to rust_g.dm. log_topic() now includes game ID.

  • There is no max limit of balls, but if Tesla has 9 or more balls it will start melting down tesla coils and grounding rods. If Tesla has 10 or more balls it will start to target emitters and melt them as well.

29 December 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Bluespace inhibitors can only be attacked with your fists if you're on harm intent. Only humanoids can break bluespace inhibitors.
  • Emagging a bluespace inhibitor causes the EMP effect.

Conspiir updated:

  • Updates the recipes for birthday cake (now uses 1 candle instead of the hat), truffles (now uses 2 coco powder instead of 5 sugar), and pancakes (now accepts normal berries).
  • Cheese toast can now be made with nutri-spread from the biogenerator as well as butter.
  • The name of spaghetti and meatballs has been updated to not show spaghetti_meatballs.
  • You've mastered the art of cardboard folding. Donut boxes that are folded from a cardboard sheet now hold 6 donuts instead of 4.
  • You can now research Chemistry Heater circuitboards at R&D, meaning you can now make new Chem Heaters.
  • Ambrosia vulgaris and Reishi are now available in the hydroponics seed vendor. It's legal; go grow you some!
  • Replaced one of the hydroponics seed vendors with a garden seed machine.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Adjusts a power consumption anomaly with the burst-fire formula for the Lawgiver.
  • Changes the projectile the lawgiver uses from a stun-beam to electrode balls.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixed a money duplication bug that allowed you to double your money every 3-5 seconds. This bug existed for more than 2 years, by the way.

  • Survival boxes are now equipped with breath masks again, and not gas masks.

PoZe updated:

  • Fixes hostile mobs not attacking people. My fuckup!

16 December 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Added bluespace inhibitors, unique powered incredible fragile (destructible) machines that scramble bluespace outgoing and incoming signals in an 8 radius range. They can only be found in the vault, the armory, and the AI core. This affects features that involve bluespace, including wizard (not jaunt!) and ninja teleport.
  • EMPing a bluespace inhibitor can have some fun effects.
  • Wizards can no longer randomly teleport on openspace tiles.
  • Fixed an issue that would only allow extended to be chosen in secret. I hope you all enjoyed your RP.

PoZe updated:

  • Straighjacket escape progress is no displayed above mob.
  • Renamed cyborg Miner module into Mining.
  • Hostile mobs now check if they can see their target before moving towards or engaging.
  • Ranged hostile mobs no longer get in point blank range to shoot their target.
  • Security/Medical records sections max character limit was increases from 1024 to 3072, to keep it consistent with records in character setup.
  • Fixed turret sprites for Energy turret. Added lethal mode sprite and connected code wise to Ionrifle turret

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Ports three hairstyles from Baystation: Gentle 2, Gentle 2 (Long) and Donut Bun.

15 December 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixes an age-old bug that caused antags not to spawn despite meeting the requirements, and antags to spawn despite not meeting the requirements.

LordFowl updated:

  • Cosmic Echoes can no longer move through phoron walls/windows.
  • Bluespace Echoes now have special interactions with various species.
  • Will O'Wisps are now invisible.
  • Poltergeists now have amnesia, and ex-poltergeists cannot remember their time as ghosts.
  • Spirits are teleported randomly when they're seperated from their bodies.
  • Vaurca can no longer become or host specters.
  • Phantoms are no longer impeded by punctuation.

Menown updated:

  • Adds building planting beds with sandstone. Requires Three. Can be decontructed with a shovel or spade.
  • Altered spawn of soil plots, no longer spawns with water or nutrient. Hydroponics trays no longer require weeding. Lid-light for hydroponics trays set to a base of five, no more killing plants due to ignorance. Farmbots given new function to allow pest removal. Generates small amount of nutrient upon elimination.
  • Function specified to allow borgs to fill reagent containers from dispensors and sinks.

14 December 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • CORRECTION: The gamemode Ninja and the gamemode wizard will only be in secret rotation if there are LESS than 15 players.
  • Fixed autoinjectors not being in chemistry. Fixed autoinhalers not working.

12 December 2018

Alberyk, Wowzewow updated:

  • Added new sprites for some of the junk food selection.

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Various clothing additions, including bowties, cardigans and layerable t-shirts.

  • Winter boots have been reworked and added to the loadout, designed to match the winter coats. They also now have a super secret and probably useless advantage over other boot choices.

Alberyk updated:

  • Changed the possible contents of the random vault hardsuits.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Improved the gamemode start fail messages to better explain why a gamemode failed to start.
  • Ninja requires at least 15 players to start on secret. Wizard requires at least 15 players to start on secret as well.
  • Reworked atropine and epinephrine so it works as intended. Epinephrine overdose can now cause heart damage as well as hyperzine-like effects.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Fixes an issue with pins not spawning in the RD's firing pin box.

  • Asleep Skrell now enter a state of shared dreaming called the Srom.
  • Skrell Telepathy now correctly shows damage warnings to creatures who feel pain or bleed.

10 December 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Implements new gasmask sprites and replaces them with the breath mask in emergency boxes as well as some lockers.
  • Fixes viral announcements taking too long.
  • Added autoinjectors and autoinhalers to the chemistry closet. Autoinhalers, autoinjectors, inhalers, and inhaler cartridges can now be stored inside medical fridges and belts.
  • Tweaked chemistry to be a more spacious area.
  • Fixed various typos in injecting/inhaling messages.

DronzTheWolf updated:

  • Adds new gas mask sprites.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Fireaxes now attack much slower, but also no longer embed constantly in everyone you attack, or everyone nearby the general vicinity of your attack.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Removes Ligma.
  • Renames some diseases.

PoZe updated:

  • Farmbots now prioritize refilling their tank over attending to trays if their tanks are below 30%.
  • Moved hydroponics sink to a spot where farmbots will still see it while attending to trays. Remember that sinks must be in field of view for farmbots to use them.
  • Option to stop watering trays in farmbots interface now actually works.
  • Slimes will now ignore Skrell.

09 December 2018

LordFowl updated:

  • Telescience can now teleport up to a 7x7 grid of objects at once.
  • Windows and windoors now only have a 10% chance of interfering with teleportation.
  • Objects and mobs will now teleport randomly instead of being gibbed if they are teleported into a 3x3 space of ineligible turfs.

PoZe updated:

  • Rings can now get bloody and carry blood stains for forensic purposes.
  • All mobs can now be electrocuted. Especially you will notice simple mobs finally get damage from it.
  • Hostile mobs attack things that are in their way to their target. Mostly windows and grilles.

08 December 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Ported key and lock from baystation, you can place them in regular material doors to lock them.
  • Fixed material doors being nearly indestructible.

PoZe updated:

  • Ionrifle now has proper back sprites and updates it properly.

Scheveningen updated:

  • In accordance to Directive Four, Research Directors galaxy-wide now have obtained electronic firing pin boxes in their locker storage for facilitating weapons testing.
  • Pins can be removed from weapons with a 50/50 chance for breaking. Please don't abuse this.

07 December 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Coffee in coffee dispensers now spawn hot.
  • Dionaea can now be affected by most secret chems, including positive and negative ones.

06 December 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Significantly improved the wording of the virus event. Lethal viruses no longer occur if there is no virologist. Random viruses are now pre-generated with logical symptoms.
  • Fixes tempreature reagent issues caused by a previous fix.

PoZe updated:

  • Farmbot can finally be refilled properly.

05 December 2018

PoZe updated:

  • SMES now shows in their UI how much input they taken.
  • SMES and APC now show in UI how long it will take to charge/discharge.

04 December 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixed a bug that would cause runtimes with chemicals with low metabolism.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Removed the anomalous Medbay tile and Air Alarm in Space.
  • Put an Air Alarm and Fire Alarm in the Surface Checkpoint.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Trashcats and guwan can now look just as stupid in galoshes as everyone else. Janitors unite!

ParadoxSpace & Kyres1 updated:

  • Adds some Golden Deep garb, and some antenna options for IPCs, with big thanks to Kyres.

PoZe updated:

  • Farmbot now have their own harvest animation.
  • Farmbots now only have one water and use it(they had two because of stupid old code).
  • Merchant now can buy Ultra AC 2 and LBX AC 10 scatterbox instead of generic mech weapon(which doesn't exist)
  • Vendors now accept specific items. For example Chef' cleaver will not be treated as kitchen knife by the Dinnerware vendor.
  • Ghost cannot be teleported by the telescience.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Fixes an issue where certain R&D parts were not appearing in the protolathe to be built.
  • Fixes an issue where certain R&D parts had unobtainable research requirements.

03 December 2018

Furrycactus updated:

  • Altered Xenobotany so there is a bit more space to work with.
  • Added a crematorium to Xenobiology so corpses can be disposed of.
  • Xenobotany and Xenobiology both have emergency lockdown buttons now.
  • Tweaked EMT Bay layout again.
  • Added a substation and small maintenance area to Construction Level. Renamed the 'IT Department' airlock to 'Construction Site'. Made the area outside the airlock look more like a construction project.
  • Put a grinder and some extra gardening tools in a crate in the surface garden. Also added extra soil plots.
  • Put a cow crate back in the hydroponics maintenance area.
  • Added a pair of Tajaran and Unathi electrical gloves to Tech Storage.
  • Gave Miners access to the Surface Cargo airlock.

PoZe updated:

  • Ion rifle now has two firing modes: stun and lethal.
  • Ion rifle now is a weilded weapon.

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Added dress shirts to loadout. Are an accessory, recolorable, significantly resprited from chef's uniform. Also added dress shirts with rolled up sleeves.
  • Added a casual skirt and a long skirt to loadout. Both are recolorable.
  • Added recolorable suit jackets to loadout, resprited from IAA suit jackets.
  • Removed items made obsolete by these additions (khaki skirt, blue/purple suit jacket) from loadout. They still can be spawned in.

02 December 2018

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Fixed the sweater sprite, allowing it to be recolored correctly. Enjoy your hot pink turtlenecks. Don't forget to update your loadout if you want a darker color!

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixes ice having odd interactions with other chemicals. Fixes certain temperature-triggered chems from not triggering.

LordFowl updated:

  • Objects that phase into other objects during teleportation will now become damaged and emit energy as an explosion.

Alberyk updated:

  • You can now remove bayonets from guns using crowbars.

  • Adds two new headtail styles, three new headdress garments, and a bunch of cloths/bands.
  • Darkens and brings in line the Skrell sprite with every other species sprite. Colors will now be more accurate, and you can now actually find a good green.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Protolaser guns now have 2 more modifier slots for each of the various frames. Have fun!

28 November 2018

PoZe updated:

  • Show Player Panel transformation was reworked. Monkey, Xenos, humanoid races were all put into one button "Select Species", the button has all station races plus xenos, plus slime people an other adminbus mobs like zombies, etc.
  • Show Player Panel transformation now also has AI transformation option.
  • Developers are granted access to Game Panel(which is used to spawn things quickly)

22 November 2018

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Pink lemonade can now be made by mixing in grenadine to lemonade, if you want to make a girly fruit drink.

21 November 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixes thermal energy transfer issues with reagents, and makes it more like reality instead of uneducated science.
  • Increases the minimum explosion power of phoron salts from 1 to 3, equivalent to a 1 tile wide light explosion.
  • Those who voted for a round type are no longer drafted for antag status.

20 November 2018

LordFowl updated:

  • Blobs can no longer grow across space or open turf unless there is a lattice to support them.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds a few new Vaurca antennae sprites.
  • Fixes rogue genetic mutation allowing Vaurca warriors to grow four antennae.

19 November 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed cutlery allowing unrestricted food consumption.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • The promotional pumpkin spice items have been properly priced, and the donut no longer exists in a state of quantum flux yall.

PoZe updated:

  • Aribbubbles now have a intergrated cooling unit. It require a power cell to be attached either externally or internally by clicking on the bubble with power cell. The bubble cools down as fast as suit cooling unit and consumes 2 times less charge than a suit cooling unit.
  • Airbubbles now show the attached cell type and its charge when examined.

18 November 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Fixed DNA injectors working on species without DNA.
  • Added armored leg and arm guards to the armory, that come in riot, bulletproof and ablative variations.

17 November 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • The piano in the bar display case can no longer be played (For real this time).
  • Reduces maximum possible telecrystals in the vault from 75 to 45. Removes HAPT, military, and combat rigsuit from the vault.
  • Added one additional turret to the vault interior. Readds missing money freezer to the vault and improves its contents. Added a randomly spawned prototype gun/kinetic accelerator to the vault.
  • Fixes Mannitol and Epinephrine killing people instead of healing them.

10 November 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Added an alternative cryosurfactant reaction that can be triggered with ice instead of water.

  • Slightly buffs phoron salt explosion size.

05 November 2018

Arrow768 updated:

  • NanoTrasen Engineers have reevaluated their design and changed the networks of the cams in the bar/kitchen/hydro/library to service.
  • NanoTrasen Scientists have updated the L6-Saw to enalbe user to better determine how much ammunition remains.
  • CCIA has provided additional monkey cubes to xenobio in the hopes of reducing incidents where xenobiologists feed themselvs to the slimes.
  • NanoTrasen Scientists have found a way to increase the burn duration of the flamethrower.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixed inhalers not working. Fixed overmixing issue that caused issues with temperatures. Reduced burn damage from initial contact with hot reagents.
  • Fixed the station's roof to prevent non-sexual air suckage in the washroom.
  • Readds missing materials to research. Fixed infestation event false alarm announcement. Fixes xenobio + xenobot access issues. Fixes toxins external airlock missing an air sensor.
  • Readds the tajara erp enabler to the kitchen freezer.
  • Readds missing library equipment to the library. Adjusted tables in the bar to seem less uniform. Reduced the sizes of the booth as metacliques are only 4 players max in size. Fixes missing hydroponics glass. Adds missing hydroponics sink in hydroponics for real now.
  • Places Alberyk's slot machines in the bar.

PoZe updated:

  • Diona are no longer blind all the time.
  • Radium no longer spams messages to Diona.
  • Cyborgs, AI, PAI can now talk.

04 November 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Added an electric razor, you can find one in the locker room.
  • Added slot machines.

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Baseline frames can not wear regular voidsuits anymore, they now need to refit them using the suit cycler machine.
  • Added unique ipc voidsuit and hardsuit sprites.

Arrow768 updated:

  • AIs can no longer be traitors.
  • Added a new gamemode that combines a Malf-AI and a Traitor
  • NTs research department has developed amazing machine that allows to store food.
  • A $language variable has been added to NTSL

BurgerBB updated:

  • Changed the emergency firedoor airlock sprites to something more arousing.
  • Adjusted drone hatch sprites to be directional.
  • Firelock directions are now automatically generated on round start. Firelocks on windows do not have a maintenance hatch.
  • Completely overhauled the kitchen, bar, library, chapel, and hydroponics.
  • Remapped toxins. Added the tachyon-doppler array for epenis purposes.
  • Increased maximum hunger pool from 600 to 800. Nutrition reduction from blood loss significantly reduced.
  • Removed overhydration and overhydration penalties. Increased ydration loss from stamina regen. Hydration reduction from blood loss significantly reduced.
  • You can now stuff your face with food and become chubby again.
  • Renamed the owo daddy bar.
  • Added a new system that allows reagents to have their own temperatures. Includes a new unit test for devs.
  • Added a few new reagents; phoron salts, cryosufacant, pyrosilicate. Ice can be created by cooling water, and water can be created by heating ice.
  • Added a new chemistry heater that can cool or heat reagents between a range of a temperature. Vending machines and smartfridges have a temperature setting that can either heat or cool reagents; affected by manipulating wires. Ovens and microwaves automatically heat up the reagents to the recipe's requirement.
  • Crewmembers can spawn with either a heated or cooled vacuum flask.
  • Consuming hot reagents raise your body temperature. Cold reagents lower it. Extremely hot or extremely cold reagents can burn you when splashed.
  • Tricordrazine heals more brute and less burn when hot, and heals more burn and less brute when cold.
  • Updated clonexadone description to accurately describe what it does. Updated Peridaxon recipe to fix odd recipe logic.
  • Tweaked various antag and player requirements for gamemodes.
  • Fixed cargo access. Fixed hydroponics access. Added more candles to bar. Adding missing hydroponics and kitchen sinks. Fixed surface disposals. Fixed civilian powergrid. Fixed civilian substation door. Fixed ugly firedoors in some of the hallways.
  • Fixes inhalers not working.

Drago updated:

  • Added the ability to do plastic surgery to fix disfigured face's and for other purposes. Credit to MarinaGryphon for Assistance
  • Added a variety of IAC related sprites and made into items.
  • Adds IAC to loadout with medical restrictions.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Added additional gas canisters to engineering hard storage, so engineers don't need to break into atmospherics to set up the engine. New canisters include Phoron, Carbon Dioxide, and Nitrogen. Four of each.
  • Replaced the incomplete three-airlock way into the engine room with a proper cycling airlock, like the ones leading into Virology and Xenobiology.
  • Added a room on the surface level where the shields already start. They still need to be wrenched down and configured however, but no longer do engineers need to carry them up to the surface and build some space for them. Comes with its own substation and bypass.
  • Miners finally get magboots at roundstart now, since their whole job is going EVA, and they were the only job that didn't have roundstart access to them, despite needing them the most.
  • Improved the design of the construction level, adding atmospherics pipes and power cables to it from the cargo interstitial level airlock. Also gave it a new area designation, so it's not tied to the surface maintenance air and power alarm systems. Construction level and Cargo interstitial level airlocks made larger for the benefit of miners and engineers that need to move objects and machinery too.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Adjusted a couple of wizard spell's properties and descriptions to be more descriptive of what they actually do.
  • Made several spells a little more generally available to other spellbooks, reducing exclusivity.
  • The awful, jokey parrot transformation spell has been cut from wizard's spellbooks after an inquisition on quality control.
  • Pumpkins are now full of pumpkin pulp, instead of generic nutriment! This pulp can be mixed with spices to make a delicious seasoning, which can be put in coffee or mixed with more pulp to make a pie. No longer shall we have to shove a whole pumpkin into the oven to make pie.
  • Relatedly, Robust Coffee has released a limited edition Pumpkin Spice Coffee Drink and Donut series for the season!
  • An intense campaign of confidence boosting programs has finally allowed the Wizard Federation's members to cast without their lucky shoes.
  • The wizard's Stone to Flesh spell now last less time, but is also slightly longer range. Also, the Veil no longer protects one from Baleful Polymorphs.
  • Vampires now receive slightly more blood for their suck, thus making game progression not so slow.

Kyres1 updated:

  • Designed sprites for Head of Security voidsuit.

LordFowl updated:

  • Poor unfortunate souls afflicted by Black K'ois now have greater longevity and are in some cases more Vaurca than man.

MattAtlas updated:

  • Added a sound to the *clap emote.
  • Added a *golfclap emote, a clap but more disappointed. Has its own sound effect.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Virology symptom names are now suitable for a roleplaying environment. For example, 'Anima Syndrome' is now known as 'coughing'. If something doesn't make sense, just use WebMD or Google or something.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Due to a distinct lack of productivity, NanoTrasen has added a third Cargo Technician in hopes that warehouses will be sorted faster.
  • Adds flower crowns. Make a wood circlet out of wood, then apply sunflower/poppy/harebell seeds to make a flower crown.
  • Adds hair pins and bows, as well as three new flower pins.
  • Adds a Security cloak (for plebs and the HoS), and a department jacket.
  • Crafty NanoTrasen employees have finally located the buttons on their department jackets.
  • Actually adds the HoS cloak to the loadout. Sorry.

PoZe updated:

  • Diona no longer splits after loosing head. However without head their speech range is reduced to 3 tiles and is muffled, and they go blind.
  • When Diona Gestalt splits all their reagents are transfered equally among nymphs. Meaning if you had some reagents that killed you, your nymphs might die as well.
  • Diona nymph is not affected same way by Arithrazine, Hyronalin, Radium.
  • Radium now heals brute, burn, and toxin damage for Diona Gestalt and numphs.
  • Time to regrow a limb for Diona was increased from 1 minutes to 10 minutes, if all requirements are met.
  • Admin verb Create Object major flaw was optimized to display/search lists of all objects instantly, instead of freezing for 3-4 seconds.
  • Since Create Object is exteremely fast now there is no need for Quick Create Object. So I removed it.
  • Logging now is using fast RUST DLL which will reduce CPU usage and reduce lag during high player count rounds with bunch of logs.
  • Orion trails prizes have been tweaked. It now includes only cool stuff like syndicate fake items, fake weapons, eighballs. Flag gun was added to the list as well.
  • Clicking on the chessboard with a box puts any chess peices inside of the box on the board. Helps to fill board faster.
  • Clicking on the chessboard while in hand will prompt user to shake all pieces off the board. Easier to clean up after game.
  • Clicking on chess piece with a box will make box pick up all chess pieces of the same color as the box. Easier to clean up after game.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Added accuracy variables to most guns, buffing their minimum ranges upward where they have reliable accuracy.
  • Changed the accuracy formula that handles miss rate. Missing at closer ranges should be less common now.
  • Move_delay upon burst-firing an automatic weapon capable of such has been tuned down to buff automatic weapon users. They will be able to move sooner after firing a burst.

TheDocOct updated:

  • Slightly adjusted the command surface lobby and attached a study to it, for relaxing star-gazing isolation.
  • Removed the roof covering the asteroid between the departures airlocks, preventing circumventing the airlocks onto the ecsape shuttle without appropriate precautions.
  • NanoTrasen has begun issuing Head of Security staff with uniquely designed voidsuits for better identification during E.V.A. operations. A cycler has been provided for non-human head staff.

VTCobaltblood updated:

  • Added the cheap lighter to loadout.
  • Zippo messages are no longer red. The description has been updated to make it more clear that it has flavor messages.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Dionas now properly come from diona pods, instead of the legacy tag of 'replicant pods'.

PoZe updated:

  • Whitelist check is again enabled for nympth when they evolve into Gestalts. For some reason it was diabled experimentally bizzillion seconds ago.

Drago updated:

  • Fixed Hand Teleporter Price being 5 credits, it is now 1800.
  • Made the grinder be able to eject its contents and beaker without power.
  • Slimes that drink water now get major toxin damage, far more then a shower.
  • IPCs No longer vomit with seismic charges
  • Fixed Briefcase missing hand sprites
  • Hydrogen KA now loads properly
  • NTOS cannot be pirated anymore
  • Advanced batteries fit into laptops now

Arrow768 updated:

  • NanoTrasen Engineers have fixed issues such as missing holopads, newscasters, vents and access errors throughout the station
  • The skylight has been readded to the psych wing.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixed a typo that caused hunger related hell to be unleashed upon players when sprinting a lot.
  • Diona are no longer affected by thirst.
  • Adjusted starting hunger values so that people don't come to the station starving.
  • Increased the metabolism rate of Neurotoxin so it doesn't stun for 30 seconds when injected. Adjusted the injection strength of Doctor's Delight when injected.
  • Adjusted ramen and ice nutrition and hydration stats.

09 October 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixed forcefeeding logic in feeding people food.
  • Reverted nutrition loss from bloodloss changes to what it was before.

08 October 2018

PoZe updated:

  • Deleted wrong pipe below medical break room, it shouldn't shoot trash anymore.
  • Added one cryostatis bag into medica storage. And added a sink to the chemistry. Added disposal unit to EMT room.
  • Chemistry windoors access is fixed.
  • Regular ERT members no longer has access to Admin Shuttle(HAP) blast door remote button. ERT commander and CCIA are the only people whose ID has access to it.

07 October 2018

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixes shutters making everything look ugly.
  • Fixes disposals and cargo access.
  • Increase the metabolism rate of drinks and alcohol so they metabolize faster. Fixed incorrect metabolism rates for ethanol and butanol.
  • Reverted the default settings to the UI to reflect old settings.
  • Alcohol now properly gets people drunk. Adjusted the metabolism rate of ethanol/butanol.
  • Damage to slimes is now based on a percentage of the volume of that reagent on the slime, meaning more water kills slimes faster.
  • Hunger/thirst icons now scale to their hunger/thirst levels appropriately.
  • Fixed hunger/thirst penalty scaling.

06 October 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Added several material based golems, they can be created via xenobiology or by magic using ten units of any material stack.
  • Added some species related blood tracks.
  • Added zombies.
  • Added new options to the custom loadout; dresses and fannypacks.
  • Added medical gowns to medbay.
  • Ported the holodeck locking feature from baystation, heads of staff and the chaplain can lock and unlock the holodeck.
  • Added new vaurca custom loadout options.
  • Added a new hairstyle; the long braid 2.
  • Added magic eight ball and spirit boards.
  • Cult teleporting runes do not work on the central command z-level anymore.
  • You can not write runes on space or open spaces anymore.
  • Accepting a wizard apprentice contract will now create a set of wizard clothing.

Alberyk, AndurilFlame, Bauser, DronzTheWolf updated:

  • Added tajaran clothing options to the loadout.
  • Added a new tajaran hairstyle option.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Nanotrasen scientists have discovered possible applications for cortical stacks in science..
  • The staff of change takes longer to recharge and has a reduced amount of charges.
  • Airlocks now take a bit to weld and unweld..
  • Nanotrasen has decided to hire "Medical Interns" again.
  • The Leyon Gunsmithing LLC has reworked the "Everyman" to be targeted more towards civilians and was able to reduce the market-price of it.
  • NT has negotaited a contract for V'krexi cubes with a supplier.
  • The syndicate has managed to acquire some "state of the art" rifles from Adohmai and made them available to their operatives.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Event infestations can now target anywhere on the station, as long there are no occupents.
  • Removed yithians and diyaabs from infestation events and replaced them with slimes and hivebots.
  • Adds several new chocolate bars to the getmore chocolate vendor.
  • Added various menu settings for the general interface to allow more space.
  • Chefs now spawn with a box of 12 randomly spawned fruit/vegetables.
  • Added several new random dungeon spawns.
  • Removed the ODIN departures vending machines.
  • Remapped the cargo lobby. Remapped disposals/the crusher. Added a mail disposals room. Relocated main level cryo to the main level dorms.
  • Added hydration mechanics. Hydrate yourself by drinking beverages and water. IPCs do not have hydration mechanics, as they are machines.
  • Adds salt to various junkfood items. Salt reduces hydration.
  • Added various sources of lube and water for off-station antags. Increased the amount of watertanks in maintenance.
  • Added a new chemical, Potassium Hydrophoride, which hydrates the person directly through the bloodstream. These exist in most antag rig chem dispensers an can be made in chemistry.
  • Injecting yourself with beverages such as coffee or alcohol have their effects increased by 4, with the exception of nutrition and hydration gains. Enjoy IV drips filled with vodka.
  • Removed healing mechanics from tea, milk, and soy.
  • When thirsty, hungry, overweight, or overhydrated, you have a lower pain tolerance, and move slower. Maximum slow is 33%, and maximum pain increase is 100% at 0 nutrition and 0 hydration.
  • Hunger factor from moving reduced by half. Removed nutrition loss from sprinting, however not stamina regeneration.

Drago updated:

  • Ported Polaris Station evening gown, converted to greyscale.
  • Adds gown to loadout, color customization added.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Drastically increased the size of each Solar Array on the station so that they're actually useful. Enough to serve as backup power on high intensity rounds, or primary power on low intensity. A useful entry point for anyone that wants to learn Engineering.
  • Following through with the second stage of the Aurora Redesign Project, NanoTrasen has this time put its structural engineers hard at work to redesign the Medical Bay. Again. The architects have this time combined the positive design elements of the previous two layouts, combining them into an efficient and easier to navigate design. Hopefully this assists our doctors in doing their jobs better.

Lord Fowl updated:

  • Baton strikes directed to the head now disorientate instead of just causing 1.5x agony.
  • Most hats now cover the head and provide appropriate protections.

PoZe updated:

  • Shaking table now knocks things off
  • Big mobs now knock things off table if they walk or climb on it, this includes industrail IPC frames, Dionea, cows, etc. Other species will knock things off if they are not in help intent or if they are running.
  • As per privacy update all bathrooms on the station no longer have cameras installed in them, with the exception of the brig bathroom for prisoners.
  • Carps and giant spiders will now attack shields. If there are no other targets present they will target shields. If there are any mobs present they will try to reach them, and if there is a shield in the way they will destroy it.
  • Hostile mobs now have better search systems. They will prioritize any living mobs over other targets.

PoZe, ben10083 updated:

  • Nanotrasen has hired a designer to remake the interview room on the Odin.
  • ERT Cmdr's Spec Ops ready room button now does not include the Admin shuttle, the button for the Admin shuttle is now beside it's door. The Spec Ops button is also renamed.

  • Added a password protection system for files on modular computers.

  • HOP office disposal system is properly connected, so it can receive delivery and send trash properly.

  • Bishop and Zeng-Hu frames can now wear wizards and mercs voidsuits, making all IPC frame able to wear these antag voidsuits.

  • Personal closets can no longer be locked/unlocked from the inside.

  • The derelict shuttle will no longer show up on the power monitoring console.

  • Adds a check to the slime AI to loose interest in the current victim if they are dead.

PoZe updated:

  • Beepsky/ED209 no longer move around when turned off
  • Red track pants now spawn the right item(instead of blue)

  • Bar theater and Kitchen Pantry now have security cameras
  • ED209 no longer shoots far away, but gets closer into shooting range distance with its target

  • Blast doors and shutters no longer glitch when APC has no power(Or during grid check event).

  • Attack logs now show general regions if the limb itself is obscured by clothing.
  • Wound flavortext is now hidden if the limb is obscured by clothing.

  • Increases amount of energy and nutrition Diona need to do such. Eat up.

Alberyk updated:

  • Emag interactions with the ATM should work as intended now.
  • Welding fuel tanks should now explode when in contact with fire or rigged, as long they were open with a wrench.

  • Nerfs ZoRa Soda.

  • Balanced Battlemonster stats.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixed Battlemonster decks from being stuck in backpacks and pockets. Fixed some id names and card descriptions.
  • Added significantly more booster packs to Battlemonster Vendors. Added missing spell/trap cards.
  • Tweaked foodcode so there are no food related bugs possible ever again.
  • Reworked chip pickup so it works like paper bins.
  • Adjusted extinguisher fluid to be better at putting out fires on people.

02 September 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Burritos should now only require two meatballs to make.
  • Vegan burrits do not require cabbage and carrot anymore.
  • Added new chemicals.
  • You can now store more mining tools in the mining voidsuit and hardsuit suit storage slot.

Alberyk, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added a new set of sprites for the ninja hardsuit.

Arrow768 updated:

  • The janitor from the previous shift didnt refill all the vending machines. Ask your janitor for a refill.
  • By adding a secret additive to the food, NanoTrasen has increased the time it takes until food is burned in the cooking machines.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixed drinkable food... again.
  • Fixed multiple reagents having incorrect inhale metabolism values.
  • Overhauled the design of the kitchen and bar.
  • Fixed maintenance junk spawning from above.
  • Added a fun new card game; Battle Monsters. A vending machine that dispenses these cards and the rulebook can be found in the library.
  • Added a new holodeck preset: Battlemonsters Arena. Now you can duel it out like manchildren in the holodeck.
  • Added the ability to rename food and edit its description with a pen. Please don't make me regret this.

Furrycactus updated:

  • Sublevel has received some quality of life improvements for Engineers, predominantly involving Atmospherics, but also with the Tesla and airlocks.
  • Atmospherics was made larger, now has a large tank for N2O, and was also given a large tank for custom gas mixes. A gas heater was also added alongside the previous gas cooler, an engineering console with remote Air Alarm Control was added, Pipe Dispensers were added, and the overall roundstart efficiency of the setup was reduced in order to give Atmospheric Technicians more things to actually do.
  • The Tesla Engine was given a few tweaks to make it equally roundstart viable as the Supermatter. The Tesla Bay APC was given a super-capacity power cell in place of a regular power cell, and the Particle Accelerator components now start already in-place and in correct order. Wires were also tidied up and made neater; this should make setting it up more time efficnent. Tesla Grid SMES was upgraded to match the roundstart Supermatter Grid SMES so that it can output power on-par with the Supermatter. It is fully capable of powering the station on its own, and then some.
  • Sublevel airlocks have been connected to the station air supply line with a gas pump, like the airlocks in mining, solars, and the surface docks. They were very prone to becoming stuck due to a lack of air, this should help stop that and make using said airlocks more viable.

LordFowl updated:

  • Grenades can no longer be screwdriver'd for variable detonation.
  • Grenades now have a 3-second timer instead of a 5-second timer.

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Fixes calling transfer votes early.
  • Replaces all instances of world.time in SSVote with round_duration_in_ticks. This should result in more consistent behavior overall, but may result in unexpected issues. Please report any, if they occur.
  • Increases the metabolism rate of Cardox to .6u every tick (two seconds).

NortonDK updated:

  • Changed the name and description of the space heater(now space A/C), to better show that it can also cool

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds a few Zorane drinks. Safe for human and Vaurcan consumption alike.
  • Uproots and murders potted plant near Engineering for placement of Zo'ra Soda vendor.
  • Adds fingerless gloves, varsity jackets, new tracksuits, high-top shoes, departmental ponchos, beanies, departmental cloaks, departmental jackets, puffer jackets, a kimono, a new formal uniform, headphones, and military jackets.
  • Cloaks and ponchos can now be worn over suit-slot items and as jumpsuit accessories. Yes, even over spacesuits and armored vests.

PoZe updated:

  • Beepsky/ED209 now uses different method of movement. Making it waay faster at moving
  • Beepsky/ED209 now arrests/detains person who attacks them. Reporting arrest/detaintion, who attacked them, what weapon was used and location
  • Beepsky/ED209 uses better paths between beacons, so it moves faster. But it still moved between mostly two beacons, I will change it next dev cycle
  • ED 209 now listesn to verbal command such as 'stay', 'stop', 'arrest', 'detain', 'patrol'. So you can say something like 'ED, can you go on your damn patrol?!' or 'ED, arrest that scummbag Urist'. Also you do not need to give full First and Last name in order for ED to arrest/detain tha person, either first of Last works.
  • ED 209 now has a verb that lets you to set its nickname to which he will respond. So that you can call it something like 'ED', etc. It will not change its name however. Also only people with access and who are not set to arrest can use that verb.
  • IPC and Cyborgs surge prevention modules(EMP immunity) now give you 2-5 EMP protections which determined by RNG during installation of it.
  • IPC uplink surge prevention module(EMP immunity) cost reduced to 12 telecrystals.
  • Cyborgs surge prevention module(EMP immunity) gold and silver cost reduced by 50%. It is now 5000 gold and 7500 silver.

TheDocOct updated:

  • Updated the ERT Civil Protection helmets to look nicer, and added visor raising/lowering to them.

ben10083 updated:

  • Service Borgs can now produce Coffee and Espresso with their synthesizer.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Fixes miscalculation in heat reduction for fire extinguishers.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Added a reliable way to manually force send resources to client if asset manager fails.

05 August 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Added checkers and chess game kits to the custom loadout.
  • Added some random asteroid dungeons.
  • You can now build floors using some materials, such as silver, gold and diamond.
  • Added tajaran flags and banners to the custom loadout.
  • Added tobacco, peppercorn, onion and garlic seeds.
  • Added new cooking recipes.
  • Using arm blade or shield does not create gibs anymore.
  • Removed shotgun speed loaders.
  • Added unique sprites for shotgun shells boxes.
  • Added some loaded and unloaded sprites for some guns.
  • Sterile masks can now be adjusted, to either cover the face or hang on the neck.
  • Cutting any gloves fingertips will now reduce the insulation of the gloves in question.
  • Added a pair of tajaran and unathi insulated gloves to the chief engineer and electrical supplies closets.
  • Added a new unathi clothing to the loadout.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Centcom now pays for certain products shipped to them. Use the export scanners to determine what they would like to have and how much they pay for it.
  • Sometimes central requests special products to be shipped to them. Make sure to pay attention to the cargo consoles.
  • Invoices for shipments and orders can now be printed using the cargo control console.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Added Monoammonium Phosphate, a reagent that excels in extinguishing fires, and acts as a fertilizer. They are now found in fire extinguishers instead of water. Added Monoammonium Phosphate tanks around the station in place of some water tanks.
  • Added a new weak chem sprayer, 'Xenoblaster', which can be found in xenobiology for xenobiologists.
  • Fire extinguishers can be filled with any reagent using an extinguisher cartridge. Extinguisher cartridges can be ordered by cargo, or found in atmospherics.
  • Reagent dispensers, such as watertanks and beer kegs, can now be filled with any reagent. Fuel tanks are an exception.
  • Most mobile reagent dispensers can leak their contents if you use harm intent wrench on them. Changed how leaking works.
  • Reworked how reagent containers (glass beakers, drinks) behave on interaction. You can splash anyone with any container on harm intent, and drink/use them on other intents.
  • Added a fire storage area in atmospherics that contains firefighting equipment and Monoammonium Phosphate containers.
  • Lube and water can be spread to other tiles if there is too much water or lube on one tile.
  • Adds several new and unique kinetic accelerator parts that can only be found in warehouse or in abandoned crates.
  • Kinetic Accelerators can now be held with two hands for a recoil reduction, accuracy increase, and slight firerate increase. Some high-end kinetic accelerators require two hands to fire, and all kinetic accelerators require two hands to pump.
  • Adds a kinetic analyzer, a device that can be purchased from cargo that analyzes kinetic accelerators, displaying useful data about the assembly.
  • Remapped Xenobiology to be worthy of a research station.
  • Stunbatons have a 95% chance to pacify slimes. 5% chance to make them rabid.

Fire and Glory updated:

  • Vendor K'ois bar packaging has been changed to make it easier for new crew to understand its toxicity

Flamingo updated:

  • Adjusted roof solar wiring to (hopefully) fix the roof solars power routing bug.

Karolis2011 updated:

  • Removes Topic() rate limiting. This should make HTML UIs more responsive.
  • Added completely new Vueui HTML interface system. It should bring more responsive UIs.
  • Added user prefrence for UI theme. At this moment this applies only to Vueui interfaces.
  • Made photocopier and fax machines use Vueui.
  • Made Air control consoles use Vueui.

LordFowl updated:

  • Airlocks will now open when out of power and blast doors will close.
  • Crowbars can no longer open unpowered blast doors.

ParadoxSpace updated:

  • Adds HUD aviators for each kind of HUD, also adding night/thermal versions to the uplink.
  • Adds civilian sunglasses to the loadout, they do not protect against flashes.

PoZe updated:

  • Hyronalin now causes Diona to receive toxin damage. For reference 10 units will get Diona into cirtical state within 3:30 minutes. 15 unit will kill.
  • Arithrazine now causes Diona to receive deadly toxin damage. Even 5u will kill Diona within 1:03 minutes
  • Tea now causes Diona to receive toxin damage. Tiny bit more then how it cures radiation for other species.
  • Radium now cures toxin damage for Diona. You would need at least 1/3 more of it to cure same amount of Hyronalin effect.
  • Adds cyborg surge prevention upgrade module. It is an upgrade that makes cyborg being immune to 1-3 EMP pulses. Can be constructed by robotics, but is expensive and high tech. After being fried, module can be replaced with new module
  • Adds IPC surge prevention module. Available only via traitor uplink, costs 14 telecrystals. Just like cyborg module it make user immune to 1-3 EMP pulses. Comes in from uplink as modified nanopaste that is one time use(doesn't heal user). Module can be repaired with another traitor nanopaste

TheDocOct updated:

  • Added a conference room to the public surface level, with a bridge-access bolt button.
  • Moved the surface level atmospherics equipment into the surface engineering storage room, and adjusted it accordingly.
  • Renovated the surface command 'Head of Staff Preparation' room into 'Command Dock Monitoring'.

Alberyk updated:

  • Removed the thermal drill dispersion, making it a more effective mining tool.
  • Added siik'tau as an alternative language.
  • Bicaridine does not heal lung damage anymore when inhaled.
  • Removed the telebaton stun when aiming for the legs. The telebaton will now deal halloss, pain damage, when attacking in disarm intent
  • Pepperspray does not stun when hitting someone without face protection anymore, it will now cause moderate pain instead.
  • Merchant's pet sellers should sell more mudane animals, and buy more exotic ones, also fixing an exploit with buying and selling animals.
  • Merchant should not be able to buy flags or other objects that can not be moved anymore.
  • Vampires can't bite people wearing airtight helmets due to their necks being protected anymore.
  • Vampires can now drink blood from drinking glasses and etc to gain usable blood.

Arrow768 updated:

  • Adds a Notification System to send notifications to players.
  • A borgs voice is now garbled if its damaged too much.

  • The taser cooling module can be applied to sec borgs again.
  • Injecting armored targets with the hypospray now takes a while.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Kinetic Accelerators can no longer dig holes. Improved warehouse and abandoned crate loot chances of getting kinetic accelerators. High level kinetic accelerators can now be found.
  • Added a random dungeon framework. Mappers can make their own dungeons and submit them to Github.

LordFowl, BygoneHero, Kyres1 updated:

  • Added the Sedantis flag.
  • Added Vaurca variants of softsuits.
  • Changed Vaurca vision to use client colors.
  • Added climbing. Click on a wall/open turf to climb. Large and/or anchored items increase your ability to climb. Small items decrease your ability to climb.
  • Humans and Vaurca are fastest at climbing, and Unathi and Dionaea are the slowest at climbing.
  • Made Vaurca natural climbers, meaning they can never fail.
  • Added various event-orientated Vaurca items.
  • Vaurca can now wear specially modified softsuits.
  • Added cleave to energy glaives.
  • Changes the sprites of all organs in Vaurca to be more alien.
  • Tweaked client colors, fixing inaccuracies in colorblindedness.
  • Cardox no longer acts as an acid, no longer affecting mobs on touch.

18 June 2018

Alberyk updated:

  • Added new tajaran related accessories options to the custom loadout.
  • Added new tajaran related cuisine options.
  • Added a gatling machine gun to the syndicate uplink.
  • Added bayonets.
  • Changed how stuttering is handled in game, it should be less ridiculous overall.

Arrow768 updated:

  • The Tau Ceti Daily Grand Slam Lottery has filed for bankruptcy and has been relaunched under new management.
  • Resourceful employees have found a way to hide things inside of potted plants.

BurgerBB updated:

  • Removed basic kinetic accelerators from code. Replaced them with customizable kinetic accelerators with a robust array of customization. Weaker custom kinetic accelerators can be purchased from the mining vendor or found randomly in cargo, while the stronger variants can be researched and produced by science.
  • Added traitor kinetic accelerators to uplink. These ones shoot laser beams, and can accept custom accelerator parts.
  • Gave wrenches to mining drones and mining cyborgs, so synthetics can tinker with custom KAs.
  • Improved the shuttle and docks design.
  • Users will now be automatically threatened with a day ban if they mention the phrase 'Organ Damage'.
  • Fixed library books spawning outside of shelves.
  • Fixed kinetic accelerators displaying an error when equipped on the waist.
  • Balances kinetic accelerator research to prevent easy research exploit. Balances traitor kinetic accelerator to be less powerful.
  • Tweaked the new library to be more aesthetically pleasing. Removed empty mediwall from the command section of the shuttle. Removed floating light near departures and on the shuttle. Removed pointless holopad on the evac shuttle.

Code - PoZe, Sprites - DronzTheWolf updated:

  • Adds airbubble(oxyball) into the game. It is used to protect user inside from decompressed environment for 30 minutes. Has an air tank attached to it that can be replaced.
  • Adds airbubble to every emergency locker
  • Mercenaries have their own air bubble with special sprites, for kidnapping. Mercenaries have two airbubbles, Heist shuttle has three as they are pirates.

Kaedwuff updated:

  • Librarians now also get a service headset at start.
  • Cyanide no longer makes you instantly pass out, allowing you a precious half minute to say your final goodbyes (or taunts to security) before you die horribly.

LordFowl updated:

  • Sprinting no longer deals oxygen damage unless you have asthma, a coughing disability, or damage to your lungs.
  • Adds the asthma disability to chargen, which reduces your ability to sprint and your ability to naturally regenerate oxygen damage.
  • Adds a new mental disability - Love.

LordRaven001 updated:

  • Ports mixing bowls from Baystation
  • Removed butcher knives from the contraband section in the vendor, added them to the normal vendor.
  • Balanced the Kitchen Vendor around 2 Chefs

MoondancerPony updated:

  • Tweaks a lot of things to do with newscasters. Maybe there will be a fancy new UI soon? Who knows.
  • Removes the Journalist alt-title from Librarian.
  • Adds the Corporate Reporter job and the Freelance Journalist alt-title. Corporate Reporters have more liability and responsibility, but have greater access and legitimacy. Freelance journalists have no such restrictions, but are all on their own. To add to this, there are now two press passes- a normal and a corporate one. These do not guarantee you anything from Security or Command, however, so be warned!
  • The merchandise store has been replaced with a brand-new journalist's office, set up for interviews and writing. Journalists also get their own pet.
  • You can now comment, like, and dislike newscaster stories. PDAs can see, but not interact with, the new newscaster functionality. PDA news features may expand or be removed in the future.

PoZe updated:

  • IPCs can not be convertable to cult.
  • IPCs can no longer draw runes, since they have no blood. They still can use talismans
  • Cultist IPCs are immune to cultist EMP from runes or talismans.
  • Fixed Journalist Office missing power cables.
  • Journalist Office is now connected to the bridge subgrid, instead of main grid.
  • Shuttle wall structures that are on the corners have been moved one tile in different directions, so that it looks good.

Scheveningen updated:

  • Blinding sources are significantly increased in duration.
  • Direct flashes no longer stun those who are -not- sentient trees, robots, or bugpeople.
  • Changed how flash break mechanics work. Crappy budget NT tech is more likely to break from overuse.

ben10083 updated:

  • Following multiple security breaches and thefts from the vault, NanoTrasen has increased security in the main vault.

  • ID Cards ejected from modular computers are no longer ejected onto the floor.
